period hereunder occurs on a day that is not a Business Day, then such payment or expiration of time period shall be made or occur on the next succeeding Business Day, and such extension of time shall in such cases be included in computing interest or fees, if any, in connection with such payment.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower understands and agrees that DOE and FFB are agencies or instrumentalities of the United States and that all payments hereunder or under the Financing Documents are payable, and shall in all cases be paid, free and clear of all Taxes.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 3.02</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338284"></a><a name="_Toc187350957"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Maturity and Amortization</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Maturity Date</u>. The Borrower shall repay the outstanding Guaranteed Loan and all accrued and unpaid interest in full on the Maturity Date.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref123197018"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Payments</u>. The FFB Note shall: (i)&#160;be stated to mature in consecutive quarterly installments of principal (each, a &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FFB Note Installment</b>&quot;) payable on each Payment Date, commencing on the First Principal Payment Date (or, if not a Business Day, the next Business Day, unless such next Business Day is one of the last two days of the applicable month, in which case it shall be the immediately preceding Business Day) in the amounts set forth in the amortization schedule set out in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 3.02</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Amortization Schedule</i>); provided that Payment Dates shall not occur on the last two days of any month; and (ii)&#160;provide for the capitalization and payment of interest in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Interest Provisions Relating to All Advances</i>) and the FFB Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 3.03</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338285"></a><a name="_Toc187350958"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Evidence of Debt</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">The entries made in the internal records maintained by or on behalf of DOE, respectively, &#160;evidencing the amounts from time to time: (i)&#160;advanced by FFB under the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and the FFB Note; or (ii) paid by or on behalf of the Borrower from time to time in respect thereof, shall constitute, absent manifest error, evidence of the existence and amount of the FFB Note Obligations of the Borrower as therein recorded.</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 3.04</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref235599866"></a><a name="_Toc142338286"></a><a name="_Toc187350959"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Interest Provisions Relating to All Advances</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref106913447"></a><a name="_Ref140233494"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Interest Amount and Interest Computations</u>.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>Interest shall accrue on the outstanding principal amount of each Advance from the date such Advance is disbursed to the Borrower pursuant to the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and the FFB Note, to the date such Advance is due, in each case, at a rate <i style="font-style:italic;">per annum</i> as specified in the FFB Documents. Except as provided in clause (ii) of this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.04(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Interest Amount and Interest Computations</i>), interest accrued on the outstanding principal balance of each Advance shall be due and payable on each Payment Date beginning on the first Payment Date to occur after the date on which such Advance is made, up through and including the Maturity Date. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><a name="_Ref130494263"></a><a name="_Ref140233396"></a> For each Advance made prior to the First Interest Payment Date, the amount of accrued interest on the FFB Note that would otherwise be due and payable on each Payment Date to occur before the First Interest Payment Date shall be capitalized on the respective Payment Date and be added to the principal amount due under the FFB Note,<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font>and interest shall thereafter accrue on the sum of the </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">15</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">outstanding principal (including such capitalized interest) at the rate established for such Advance in accordance with paragraph 6 of the FFB Note; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that the aggregate amount of accrued interest that may be capitalized for any Tranche shall not exceed the Maximum Capitalized Interest Amount for such Tranche and shall not cause the total outstanding amount under the FFB Note to exceed the applicable Maximum Tranche Amount or to exceed the Maximum Guaranteed Loan Amount. &#160;The amount of interest that shall be capitalized on each Advance shall be determined as set forth in the FFB Note.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>Without limiting the foregoing, all Overdue Amounts shall: (A)&#160;accrue interest at the Late Charge Rate through the date of payment; and (B)&#160;be payable by the Borrower in accordance with the FFB Documents. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>The Borrower hereby authorizes FFB to record in an account or accounts maintained by FFB on its books: (A)&#160;the interest rates applicable to all Advances; (B)&#160;the date and amount of each principal and interest payment on each Advance outstanding; and (C)&#160;such other information as FFB may determine is necessary for the computation of interest and the Prepayment Price payable by the Borrower under the FFB Note. &#160;The Borrower acknowledges and agrees that all computations of interest and the Prepayment Price by FFB pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Interest Provisions Relating to All Advances</i>) and the FFB Note shall, in the absence of manifest error, be evidence of the amount thereof. &#160;All computations of interest shall be made as set forth in the relevant FFB Document.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Interest Payment Dates</u>. Subject to the terms of the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and the FFB Note, the Borrower shall pay accrued interest on the outstanding principal amount of each Advance: (i) on each Payment Date, as and to the extent specified in Section 3.04<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(a)</u> above; (ii) on each prepayment date (to the extent thereof); and (iii) at maturity (whether by acceleration or otherwise). </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 3.05</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref98491018"></a><a name="_Toc142338287"></a><a name="_Toc187350960"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Prepayments</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Terms of All Prepayments</u>.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>With respect to any prepayment of any Advance, whether such prepayment is voluntary or mandatory, including a prepayment upon acceleration, the Borrower shall comply with all applicable terms and provisions of this Agreement and the FFB Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><a name="_Ref130505794"></a>All prepayments of the FFB Note shall be: (A) applied to Advances as specified in the relevant Prepayment Election Notice; and (B) due in an amount equal to the Prepayment Price calculated by FFB in accordance with the terms of the FFB Note. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>The Borrower may not re-borrow the principal amount of any Advance that is prepaid, nor shall any such prepayment create availability for further borrowings during the Availability Period.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>If the Borrower shall fail to make a prepayment to FFB on any Intended Prepayment Date in accordance with this Agreement and the FFB Note, the Borrower shall pay FFB a Late Charge on any Overdue Amount from such Intended Prepayment Date to the date on which payment is made, computed in accordance with the provisions of the FFB Note.<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font><a name="_Ref142650251"></a>Any prepayment made pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.05</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> </u>(<i style="font-style:italic;">Prepayments</i>) shall be applied: (A) on a <i style="font-style:italic;">pro rata </i>basis to each Tranche (unless otherwise elected by the Borrower); (B) to the specific Advances identified by the Borrower in accordance with the FFB Documents; and (C) in the inverse order of maturity among the outstanding principal amounts of such Advances, or as otherwise specified by the FFB Note or by DOE (and agreed by the Borrower); provided that the Borrower may elect to which Advances (either in part or in full) any prepayment shall be applied. </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">16</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vi)</font>In the event of any prepayment in part or in full of all outstanding Advances under a Tranche in full pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.05</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Prepayments</i>), the remaining Loan Commitment Amount for such Tranche shall be deemed to be reduced to zero Dollars ($0), unless otherwise agreed to by DOE. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vii)</font>Simultaneously with all prepayments of an Advance under the Guaranteed Loan, whether voluntary or mandatory, the Borrower shall pay all accrued and unpaid interest and other fees, costs, expenses and other Secured Obligations then due and payable under the Financing Documents. Any prepayments of the Advances under the Guaranteed Loan in full shall require payment in full of all other Secured Obligations then outstanding.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref127927922"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Voluntary Prepayments</u>. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref123239167"></a>Subject to clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(ii)</u> below, the Borrower may at any time and from time to time prepay all or any portion of the outstanding principal amount of any Advance under the FFB Note, upon prior submission of a Prepayment Election Notice by the Borrower to DOE and FFB (with a copy to the Collateral Agent) not less than ten (10) Business Days prior to the Intended Prepayment Date in accordance with the terms hereof and the FFB Note. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><a name="_Ref123239130"></a>The Advances may only be prepaid under clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(i)</u> above<i style="font-style:italic;"> </i>if either such prepayment includes prepayment in full of all outstanding Advances and all other Secured Obligations under all Tranches, or if in part as follows: &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>to the extent that such prepayment is made prior to the expiration of the Availability Period for the Relevant Tranche, (1) such prepayment includes prepayment in full of all outstanding Advances and all other FFB Note Obligations with respect to such Tranche, or (2) such payment includes a partial prepayment of the outstanding Advances and other FFB Note Obligations with respect to such Tranche; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that DOE has provided its prior written consent and the remaining Loan Commitment Amount is reduced to zero Dollars ($0); or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>to the extent such prepayment is made after the expiration of the Availability Period for the Relevant Tranche, the Borrower has demonstrated to the satisfaction of DOE that, immediately following such prepayment:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(1)</font>each Reserve Account has been fully funded to its required balance in accordance with the Accounts Agreement; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(2)</font>if the Physical Completion Date has not yet occurred, the Physical Completion Date is expected to occur on or before the Physical Completion Longstop Date;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(3)</font><a name="_Ref123250176"></a>if the Project Completion Date has not yet occurred, the Project Completion Date is expected to occur on or before the Project Completion Longstop Date, and the total funding committed and available to the Borrower is sufficient to pay all remaining Project Costs in accordance with the then-applicable Construction Budget, Project Schedule and Base Case Financial Model; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(4)</font>the total funding available to the Project is sufficient to pay all Operating Costs in accordance with the then-applicable O&amp;M Budget and Base Case Financial Model; and</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">17</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 0pt 70.6pt;">in each case of <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">clauses (A)</u> and <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(B)</u>, no Default or Event of Default has occurred and is continuing, or could reasonably be expected to occur as a result of such prepayment.</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref98490877"></a><a name="_Ref140242504"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Mandatory Prepayments</u>.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref130674215"></a><a name="_Ref140234243"></a><a name="_Ref123234149"></a>Subject to the provisions of the Intercreditor Agreement and any pro rata payment treatment therein, unless otherwise instructed in writing by the DOE, the Borrower shall prepay the Advances upon the occurrence of any of the following events (each, a &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Mandatory</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Prepayment Event</b>&quot;) and in the prepayment amounts set forth below (such amounts, the &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Mandatory</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Prepayment Amounts</b>&quot;): </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font><a name="_Ref140236941"></a>with the amounts received by the Borrower of any performance liquidated damages paid under any Major Project Document that exceed the amount required, as reasonably determined by DOE, to pay to construct, repair or restore the Project, to the extent required to achieve the Debt Service Coverage Ratio set forth in the Execution Date Base Case Financial Model; &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>with the amounts received by the Borrower in respect of any of delay liquidated damages paid under any Major Project Document that exceed the amount required, as reasonably determined by the Borrower and agreed by DOE, to pay Project Costs, Operating Costs or Capital Expenditures during the period of the applicable delay, such excess amount, but solely to the extent such excess amount is greater than one million Dollars ($1,000,000) individually or five million Dollars ($5,000,000) in the aggregate in any Fiscal Year; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font><a name="_Ref130768846"></a>with the amounts received by the Borrower constituting Loss Proceeds, to the extent (and promptly following determination that) prepayment is required in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Event of Loss</i>), such required amount;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>with the amounts received by the Borrower of any amount as a result of the termination or repudiation of any Major Project Document that exceeds the reasonable out-of-pocket costs incurred by the Borrower to replace such Major Project Document, such excess amount, but solely to the extent such excess amount is greater than one million Dollars ($1,000,000); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(E)</font><a name="_Ref140236949"></a>with the amounts received by the Borrower of any amount as a result of a breach of any Project Document (other than termination or repudiation) that exceeds the amount reasonably necessary to remedy the breach, such excess amount, but solely to the extent such excess amount is greater than one million Dollars ($1,000,000); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(F)</font>with the amounts received by the Borrower in respect of any Permitted Disposition in a single transaction or a series of related transactions, that portion of the Net Amount of the proceeds of such Permitted Disposition that is not applied (or reasonably expected to be applied) to the acquisition of replacement assets, but solely to the extent such excess amount is greater than one million Dollars ($1,000,000) individually or five million Dollars ($5,000,000) in the aggregate in any Fiscal Year; &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(G)</font>at the discretion of DOE, on any Payment Date, all funds on deposit in the Restricted Payment Suspense Account if no transfer or distribution of such funds has occurred in the preceding four (4) consecutive Payment Dates;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font Payment Date, the percentage specified below of all funds on deposit in the Excess Cash Account prior to </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New as of such Payment Date (such funds, &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Excess Cash</b>&quot; and such prepayment, the &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Cash Sweep Mandatory Prepayment</b>&quot;), corresponding longstop dates, the amount required such that the Debt Service Coverage Ratio is equal to or greater than 1.70:1.00;<a name="_Ref140236977"></a><a name="_Ref131526195"></a></div><div Advances or maintain the Guaranteed Loan or any portion thereof, or DOE to guarantee or commit to guarantee FFB the amount of any Advance or to reimburse FFB pursuant to the FFB Documents, or otherwise renders unlawful the performance by DOE or FFB of their respective obligations under the Financing Documents, a sum equal to all outstanding Advances and all other Secured Obligations under the Guaranteed Loan; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Dollars ($5,000,000) during any Fiscal Year, a sum equal to such Extraordinary Amount; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(O)</font>if the Base Case Financial Model shows that a portion of the Guaranteed Loan is required to be prepaid in order for the Debt Sizing Parameters to be satisfied immediately upon Project Completion, the Borrower shall prepay such portion of the Guaranteed Loan in the amount necessary to satisfy such parameters; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided, however</i> that (i) the Project Completion Date shall not occur until the Borrower has made this prepayment; and (ii) any prepayment pursuant to this clause (i) will reduce the Base Equity Commitment (other than to the extent of pre-completion costs projected to become due and payable up to the Project Completion Date) and, to the extent that the available amount of the Base Equity Commitment is not sufficient to make the required prepayment, the Contingent Equity Commitment, in each case, to the extent of the funds actually contributed to the Borrower to fund such prepayment; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(P)</font>upon the occurrence or non-occurrence of any event the result of which is that a project that was previously an Eligible Project no longer qualified as an Eligible Project the Borrower shall prepay such portion of the Guaranteed Loan in the amount equal to the sum of the disbursements to the Borrower related to such project plus </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p and costs incurred by DOE related to such project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New made on the Intended Prepayment Date set forth in the relevant Prepayment Election Notice delivered pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.05</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Prepayments</i>), which Intended Prepayment Dates shall be the date required for such Mandatory Prepayment pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.05(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Mandatory Prepayments</i>) but in no event later than fifteen (15) Business Days after the occurrence of such Mandatory Prepayment Event (unless DOE otherwise consents). &#160;</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>With respect to any Mandatory Prepayment Event, at any time prior to Project Completion or, following Project Completion, to the extent that the Restricted Payment Conditions are not satisfied as of the immediately preceding Payment Date or are not expected to be satisfied as of the next Payment Date, during the period commencing on the date DOE received notice of such Mandatory Prepayment Event and ending on the Intended Prepayment Date, DOE may direct the Borrower in writing to transfer funds equal to the corresponding Mandatory Prepayment Amount due and owing to the Prepayment Reserve Account to be utilized in accordance with the Accounts Agreement, and upon such transfer the obligation of the Borrower to make such prepayment shall be waived up to the amount of such transferred funds. <a name="_Ref140336698"></a><a name="_Ref235083315"></a>DOE may at any time, in its discretion, elect to apply funds on deposit in the Prepayment Reserve Account to prepayment of the Guaranteed Loan in accordance with the Accounts Agreement.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';white-space:nowrap;">Article IV</font><a name="_Ref142646345"></a><a name="_Ref130493072"></a><a name="_Ref130493101"></a><font Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:0.25pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin:12pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;"><a name="_Ref142646517"></a><a name="_Ref142646521"></a><a name="_Toc142338288"></a><a name="_Toc187350961"></a><b style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-weight:bold;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</b></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 4.01</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref98491182"></a><a name="_Toc142338289"></a><a name="_Toc187350962"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall pay to DOE the Facility Fee on or before the Execution Date. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall pay to DOE (i) the initial Maintenance Fee on or before the Execution Date, and (ii) each subsequent Maintenance Fee on or before January 1 (or if not a Business Day, the first Business Day thereafter) of each year after the Execution Date until the date on which the Guaranteed Loan has been paid in full; provided, that the Maintenance Fee shall be pro-rated for any partial calendar year.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall pay to DOE (or, to the extent applicable, reimburse DOE), or such other Person as DOE shall direct in writing, as follows:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref130502367"></a>a sum, in Dollars, equal to the total of all amounts payable by DOE to FFB pursuant to the DOE Guarantee (a &#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOE Guarantee Payment</b>&#8221;) which relate to, or arise out of, the FFB Documents or FFB providing or having provided financing under the FFB Note (such amounts, &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Reimbursement Amounts</b>&quot;), which Reimbursement Amounts shall be due and payable to DOE by the Borrower as of the date on which DOE makes the DOE Guarantee Payment to which they relate; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>all documented Secured Party Expenses paid or incurred in connection with:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>whether or not the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or the Financing Documents are consummated, the due diligence of the Borrower, the other Borrower Entities and the Project, and the preparation, negotiation, drafting, execution and recording of this Agreement, the other Transaction Documents and any other documents and instruments related to this Agreement or thereto (including legal opinions);</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">20</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>any amendment or modification to, or the protection or preservation of any right or claim under, or consent or waiver in connection with, this Agreement or any other Transaction Document, any such other document or instrument related to this Agreement, such other Transaction Document or any Collateral; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>the administration, preservation in full force and effect and enforcement of this Agreement, the other Transaction Documents and any other documents and instruments referred to herein or therein (including the fees and disbursements of counsel for DOE and travel costs);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>the servicing, administration and monitoring of the Project throughout the term of the Guaranteed Loan, including in connection with any difficulty experienced by the Project relating to technical, environmental commercial, financial or legal matters or other events&#8212;included in such expenses shall be the fees and expenses of DOE&#8217;s independent consultants and advisors (including legal counsel), to the extent that such fees and expenses are incurred directly by DOE and to the extent such third parties are not paid directly by or on behalf of the Borrower; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(E)</font>any foreclosure against, sale or other disposition of any Collateral securing the Secured Obligations from time to time, or pursuit of any other remedies under any of the Financing Documents, to the extent such costs and expenses are not recovered from such foreclosure, sale or other disposition; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>to the extent permitted by Applicable Law, interest on any and all amounts described in this Article IV (Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations) (other than Financing Document Amounts, interest on which shall accrue and be payable only to the extent (including subject to any conditions provided for therein and any defenses of the Borrower thereunder or in respect thereof), at the times, in the manner and in the amounts provided for in the Financing Documents (excluding this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.01</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> (</u><i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">)</u>)) from the date payable by DOE under the Program Financing Agreement until payment thereof in full by the Borrower, at the Late Charge Rate.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>Upon any Event of Default (and after the expiration of any applicable cure period), in the reasonable discretion of DOE, interest shall accrue on the outstanding principal amount of the Guaranteed Loan at the rate of up to two percent (2.0%) per annum over and above the Interest Rate specified in the FFB Note (the &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOE Default Interest Rate</b>&quot;), payable to DOE on each Payment Date during the period commencing on the date of such Event of Default until the date such Event of Default is cured or waived in writing and is no longer continuing. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>If an amendment, modification, consent, waiver or change to or in respect of any provision of this Agreement or any other Financing Document constitutes a &quot;modification&quot; (as defined in Section&#160;502(9) of FCRA) increases the amount of the Credit Subsidy Cost (as calculated in accordance with FCRA and OMB Circular A-11), and as determined by OMB in its sole discretion), such amendment, modification, consent, waiver or change shall be subject to the availability to DOE of funds appropriated by the U.S. Congress or, to the extent permitted by Applicable Law, payment by the Borrower to meet the amount of any such increase in the Credit Subsidy Cost prior to such amendment, modification, consent, waiver or change pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">11.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Waiver and Amendment</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>In accordance with Section 609.13(a) of the Applicable Regulations, the Borrower shall not: &#160;(i) request that any Guaranteed Loan or any portion or proceeds derived thereof be used; or (ii) use any other funds obtained from the U.S. federal government or from a loan or other instrument guaranteed by the U.S. federal government, in either case for the payment of any costs, fees or expenses payable under </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">21</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">this Section 4.01 (Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations), except to the extent explicitly authorized by the U.S. Congress.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>The Borrower shall pay to DOE any fees that DOE may assess or incur from time to time in connection with any amendment, consent or waiver in connection with this Agreement or any other Financing Document.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font>All fees payable to DOE hereunder shall be paid on the dates due, in immediately available funds in Dollars to DOE and shall be non-refundable upon payment.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>All amounts payable to DOE hereunder, including Reimbursement Amounts, shall be paid without counterclaim or set-off (unless otherwise specified herein) by wire transfer to the following account, or to such other account as may be specified by DOE from time to time:</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"> <font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">ABA No. [***]</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"> <font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 4.02</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123207841"></a><a name="_Toc142338290"></a><a name="_Toc187350963"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Subrogation</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. In furtherance of and not in limitation of DOE&#39;s right of subrogation, the Borrower acknowledges that, to the extent of any payment made by DOE of Reimbursement Amounts, DOE shall be fully subrogated to the extent of any such payment, and any additional interest due on any late payment, to the rights of FFB under the FFB Note, the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and any other Financing Documents. &#160;The Borrower acknowledges and agrees to such subrogation and shall execute such instruments and take such actions as DOE may reasonably request to evidence such subrogation and to perfect the right of DOE to receive any amounts paid or payable thereunder. &#160;If and to the extent that DOE shall be fully and indefeasibly reimbursed in cash or immediately available funds by the Borrower pursuant to </font><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.01</u><font style="font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">) in respect of any payment made by DOE of Reimbursement Amounts, such reimbursement shall be deemed to constitute an equal and corresponding payment in respect of DOE&#39;s rights of subrogation hereunder in respect of such payment of Reimbursement Amounts.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 4.03</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338291"></a><a name="_Toc187350964"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Obligations Absolute</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The obligations of any Borrower entity under this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Article IV</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>) shall be absolute and unconditional, and shall be paid or performed strictly in accordance with this Agreement under all circumstances irrespective of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>any lack of validity or enforceability of, or any amendment or other modifications of, or waiver with respect to the FFB Note, this Agreement or any other Financing Document;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>any exchange or release of any other obligations hereunder;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>the existence of any claim, setoff, defense (other than a defense of payment or performance), reduction, abatement or other right that any Borrower Entity may have at any time against DOE or any other Person;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>any document presented in connection with any Financing Document proving to be forged, fraudulent, invalid or insufficient in any respect or any statement therein being untrue or inaccurate in any respect;</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">22</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>any payment by DOE pursuant to the terms of the Program Financing Agreement against presentation of a certificate or other document which does not strictly comply with terms of such Program Financing Agreement;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vi)</font>any breach by any Borrower Entity of any representation, warranty or covenant contained in any of the Financing Documents;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vii)</font>except to the extent prohibited by mandatory provisions of Applicable Law, status as, and any other rights of, a &quot;debtor&quot; under the UCC as in effect from time to time in the State of New&#160;York or under the Applicable Law of any other relevant jurisdiction;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(viii)</font>any duty on the part of DOE to disclose any matter, fact or thing relating to the business, operations or financial or other condition of any Borrower Entity now known or hereafter known by DOE;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ix)</font>any disability or other defense (other than a defense of payment or performance) of any Borrower Entity or any other Person;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(x)</font>any act or omission by DOE that directly or indirectly results in or aids the discharge of any Borrower Entity or any other Person, by operation of law or otherwise;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(xi)</font>any change in the time, manner or place of payment of, or in any other term of, all or any of its obligations or liabilities hereunder or any compromise, renewal, extension, acceleration or release (other than a release of such obligations of the Borrower under this Article IV (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>)) with respect thereto, any change in the Collateral securing its obligations or liabilities hereunder or any other Financing Document or any amendment or waiver of or any consent to departure from any other guarantee for all or any of its obligations or liabilities hereunder or any other Financing Document;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(xii)</font>any change in the corporate structure or existence of any Borrower Entity;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(xiii)</font>any exchange, taking or release of Collateral;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(xiv)</font>any application of Collateral to the Secured Obligations; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(xv)</font>any other circumstances or conditions, foreseen or unforeseen, now existing or hereafter occurring, that might otherwise constitute a defense available to, or discharge of, any Borrower Entity in respect of any Financing Document (other than a defense of payment or performance).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower and all others who may become liable for all or part of the obligations of the Borrower under this Agreement agree to be bound by this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Article IV</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>) and, to the extent permitted by Applicable Law:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>waive and renounce any and all redemption and exemption rights and the benefit of all valuation and appraisement privileges against the indebtedness and obligations evidenced by any Financing Documents or by any extension or renewal thereof;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>waive presentment and demand for payment, notices of non-payment and of dishonor, protest of dishonor and notice of protest, except as expressly provided otherwise in this Agreement;</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">23</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>waive all notices in connection with the delivery and acceptance hereof and all other notices in connection with the performance, default or enforcement of any payment hereunder except as required hereby or by the other Financing Documents;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New
