style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>waive all rights of abatement, diminution, postponement or deduction, and any defense (other than a defense of payment or performance), that any party to any Financing Document or any beneficiary thereof may have at any time against DOE or any other Person, or out of any obligation at any time owing to DOE or FFB;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>agree that its liabilities hereunder shall be unconditional and without regard to any setoff, counterclaim or the liability of any other Person for the payment hereof;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vi)</font>agree that any consent, waiver or forbearance hereunder with respect to an event shall operate only for such event and not for any subsequent event;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vii)</font>consent to any and all extensions of time that may be granted by DOE or FFB with respect to any payment hereunder or other provisions hereof and to the release of any security at any time given for any payment hereunder, or any part thereof, with or without substitution, and to the release of any Person or entity liable for any such payment;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(viii)</font>waive all defenses and allegations based on or arising out of any contradiction or incompatibility among its obligations or liabilities hereunder and any of its other obligations;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ix)</font>waive, unless and until its obligations or liabilities hereunder have been performed, paid, satisfied or discharged in full, any right to enforce any remedy that DOE or FFB now has or may in the future have against any Borrower Entity or any other Person;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(x)</font>waive any benefit of, or any right to participate in, any guarantee or insurance whatsoever now or in the future held by DOE or FFB;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(xi)</font>waive the benefit of any statute of limitations affecting its liability hereunder; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(xii)</font>consent to the addition or release of any and all other makers, endorsers, guarantors and other obligors for any payment hereunder, and to the acceptance or release of any and all other security for any payment hereunder, and agree that the addition or release of any such obligors or security shall not affect the liability of the parties hereto for any payment hereunder.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall remain liable for its reimbursement and other payment obligations under this Agreement and the other Financing Documents until such obligations have been irrevocably paid or otherwise satisfied and discharged in full in accordance with this Agreement and the other Financing Documents, and nothing except irrevocable payment, satisfaction or discharge in full thereof in accordance with this Agreement and the other Financing Documents shall release the Borrower from such obligations.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>Except as expressly provided herein, the obligations and liabilities of the Borrower under this Agreement or the other Financing Documents shall not be conditioned or contingent upon the pursuit or exercise by DOE, FFB or any other Person at any time of any right or remedy (nor shall such obligations and liabilities be affected, released or modified by any action, failure, delay or omission by DOE, FFB or any other Person in the enforcement or exercise of any right or remedy under Applicable Law) against any Person that may be or become liable in respect of all or any part of the obligations and liabilities of the Borrower under this Agreement or the other Financing Documents.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">24</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 4.04</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123207798"></a><a name="_Toc142338292"></a><a name="_Toc187350965"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Evidence of Payment</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. In the event of any payment by DOE that is required to be reimbursed or indemnified by the Borrower, the Borrower shall accept written evidence of billing and payment by DOE as evidence, absent manifest error, of the existence and amount thereof. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 4.05</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref98491198"></a><a name="_Toc142338293"></a><a name="_Toc187350966"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Payment of Financing Document Amounts</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>Anything in this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Article IV</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>) to the contrary notwithstanding, including <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Evidence of Payment</i>):</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>amounts payable by the Borrower pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>) in respect of payments made or required to be made by DOE to FFB on account of Financing Document Amounts shall be payable by the Borrower only to the extent (including subject to any conditions provided for in the Financing Documents and any defenses of the Borrower under the Financing Documents), at the times, in the manner and in the amounts that such Financing Document Amounts would otherwise have been payable by the Borrower under the Financing Documents (including, for the avoidance of doubt, on an accelerated basis following the occurrence of an Event of Default);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>amounts payable by the Borrower under <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>) shall be without duplication of any amounts payable by the Borrower pursuant to: (A)&#160;this Agreement; (B)&#160;the FFB Note; (C) the FFB Note Purchase Agreement; (D) the subrogation rights referred to in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.02</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Subrogation</i>); or (E) the provisions of <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">11.07</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Indemnification</i>); and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>no amount shall be payable by the Borrower under <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>) in respect of payments made or required to be made by DOE to FFB in respect of any liability, loss, cost or expense relating to or arising out of any sale, assignment or other transfer of the FFB Note or portion thereof by FFB to DOE, except during the continuance of an Event of Default.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>If an event permitting the acceleration of any Advance and/or the FFB Note shall at any time have occurred and be continuing, and such acceleration of any Advance and/or the FFB Note shall at such time be prevented by reason of the pendency against the Borrower or any other Person of a case or proceeding under a bankruptcy or insolvency law, the Borrower acknowledges and agrees that, for purposes of this Agreement and its obligations hereunder, in respect of any payment made by DOE to FFB, such Advance and/or the FFB Note shall be deemed to have been accelerated with the same effect as if such Advance and/or the FFB Note had been accelerated in accordance with the terms of the FFB Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';white-space:nowrap;">Article V</font><a name="_Ref142650419"></a><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:0.25pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin:12pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;"><a name="_Toc142338294"></a><a name="_Toc187350967"></a><b style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-weight:bold;">Conditions Precedent</b></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 5.01</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref235964629"></a><a name="_Toc142338295"></a><a name="_Toc187350968"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent to the Execution Date</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The obligation of DOE to execute this Agreement and deliver to FFB the Principal Instruments in accordance with Section&#160;4.2 of the FFB Note Purchase Agreement required for FFB to purchase the FFB Note on the Execution Date, and the obligation of FFB to thereupon deliver an acceptance notice pursuant to Section 5.1 (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Acceptance or Rejection of Principal Instruments</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">) of the FFB Note Purchase Agreement shall be subject to the prior satisfaction (or waiver in writing) of each of the following conditions precedent as of the Execution Date (the &quot;</font>Execution Date Conditions Precedent<font style="font-weight:normal;">&quot;) as determined by (x)&#160;in all cases, DOE; and (y)&#160;with respect to any documents or instruments addressed to FFB or to which FFB is a party, FFB: </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref127928576"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Due Diligence Review</u>. Completion by DOE of its due diligence review of the Borrower Entities, the Project and all other matters related thereto, including evidence that no material issues </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">25</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">exist with respect to the Project under the laws of the State of Montana or any subdivision or local jurisdiction thereof.</font></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">KYC Requirements</u>. Receipt by DOE of: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>evidence that the Borrower Entities have established proper operating and credit policies and procedures (including, &quot;know your customer&quot; and anti-money laundering policies) to ensure, inter alia, proper credit, risk and conflicts of interest management;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>all documentation (including taxpayer identification documents) and other information in respect of: (A) any Borrower Entity; (B) any Person holding, directly or indirectly, ten percent (10%) or more of the Equity Interests of the Borrower (other than a Qualified Public Company Shareholder or any person holding Equity Interests through a Qualified Investment Fund) or any other Major Project Participant (the &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">KYC Parties</b>&quot;) to the extent required by any Secured Party to enable it to be satisfied with the results of all &quot;know your customer&quot; and other requirements (including, the Anti-Money Laundering Laws); and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>confirmation by each Secured Party of the completion of its respective &quot;know your customer&quot; diligence in respect of each KYC Party. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref130495182"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Consultant Reports</u>. Receipt by DOE of a report addressed to DOE from each of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the Independent Engineer; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>the Market Consultant; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>the Environmental Consultant;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>the Financial Advisor; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>the Insurance Consultant; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vi)</font>any other Secured Party Advisor required by DOE.<sup style="font-size:8.25pt;vertical-align:top;"> </sup></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><a name="_Ref127933201"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Transaction Documents</u>. To the extent not already delivered, receipt by DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>fully executed originals (in sufficient counterparts for each of DOE, FFB and the Collateral Agent), or copies thereof if permitted by DOE, of each applicable Financing Document; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><a name="_Ref140243464"></a>fully executed copies of each Major Project Document and each other Project Document that is in effect at such time, together with a certificate of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, certifying that: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>the copies submitted are true, correct and complete (including all schedules, exhibits, attachments, supplements and amendments thereto and any related protocols or side letters);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>no term or condition thereof has been amended from that delivered pursuant to this clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(ii)</u>;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>each such Project Document is in full force and effect; and</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">26</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>all conditions precedent to the effectiveness of each such Project Document (if any) have been satisfied (or waived in accordance with their terms).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Borrower FFB Documents</u>. and such schedule as may be modified from time to time as provided hereunder, the &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Project Milestone Schedule</b>&quot;), in scheduled chronological order, that the Borrower will need to satisfy in order to achieve the Project Completion Date, together with the anticipated completion dates for each of the Project Milestones and the anticipated costs and expenses that the Borrower expects to incur in connection with, and upon the completion of, each of the Project Milestones. </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">28</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(k)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Construction Budget</u>. Receipt by DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>true, correct and complete copies of each policy of Required Insurance then required to be in effect in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.03</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Insurance</i>) and <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 7.03</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Required</i> <i style="font-style:italic;">Insurance</i>), each in full force and effect and compliant with such other requirements regarding coverage, deductibles, exceptions and premiums as set out in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 7.03</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Required</i> <i style="font-style:italic;">Insurance</i>); Receipt by DOE of evidence that:</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">31</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>each Borrower Entity and each Major Project Participant that has executed Direct Agreements, in each case that is non-U.S. domiciled, shall have irrevocably appointed an agent for service of process as required pursuant to the relevant Financing Documents to which it is a party; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>such agent has been duly appointed and holds such appointment without reservation until earlier of (A) six (6) months after the Maturity Date and (B) for Major Project Participants, six (6) months after the scheduled term of the applicable Major Project Document (or such earlier date as may be agreed by DOE); and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>all fees of such agent have been paid in full through the term of the engagement.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(aa)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Representations and Warranties</u>. Each of the representations and warranties made (or deemed made) by any Borrower Entity or Major Project Participant<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font>in any Transaction Document are true and correct in all material respects (except to the extent any such representation and warranty itself is qualified by &quot;materiality,&quot; &quot;material adverse effect&quot; or a similar qualifier, in which case it is true and correct in all respects) as of such date, except to the extent such representation or warranty is made only as of a specific date or time (in which event such representation or warranty is true and correct as of such date or time).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(bb)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Material Adverse Effect</u>. No event (including a change in law) shall have occurred that has or could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(cc)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Certain Events</u>. (i) No Default, Event of Default, Event of Force Majeure or Event of Loss has occurred and is continuing or would reasonably be expected to occur as of the Execution Date and (ii) no default, event of default or condition that with notice or the passage of time would become a default or event of default exists and is continuing under the Permitted Indebtedness.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(dd)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">SAM Registration</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence of the registration by the Borrower in SAM.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ee)</font><a name="_Ref140247948"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Lobbying Certification</u>. Receipt by DOE of each Borrower Entity&#8217;s completed &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Disclosure Form to Report Lobbying</b>&quot; (Standard Form LLL).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ff)</font><a name="_Ref140332057"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Environmental Review.</u> <font style="white-space:pre-wrap;"> </font>DOE shall have completed its environmental review and related consultation under NEPA and shall have received:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>evidence that the Borrower has provided all environmental analyses and other information needed for the satisfactory completion of the environmental review pursuant to NEPA; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>a bring down report and related reliance letter, acceptable in scope and content to DOE with respect to any of the issues, conditions, or concerns identified in the January 2023 ERM Report, the Health, Safety, and Environmental Assessment Report Part 1 &#8211; Asset Integrity, Process Safety Management, Air Compliance, and Environmental Liability dated March 20, 2020, or the Health, Safety, and Environmental Assessment Report Part 2 &#8211; Management Systems, Storm Water, Wastewater, DOT, Safety &amp; Security, and Waste Management dated April 21, 2020.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(gg)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Davis-Bacon Act</u>. &#160;Receipt by DOE of a certificate from the Borrower certifying that (A) the clauses set forth in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit G</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act Contract Provisions</i>) and the appropriate wage determination(s) of the Secretary of Labor have been included in each Davis-Bacon Act Covered Contract existing as of the Execution Date; and (B) the Borrower and each DBA Contract Party under each Davis-</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">32</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">Bacon Act Covered Contract existing on or prior to the Execution Date have taken all necessary steps to comply with and are in compliance (including retroactive compliance) with the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(hh)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Program Requirements</u>. Receipt by DOE of one or more action memoranda executed by the Secretary of Energy approving and authorizing: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the execution by DOE of the Financing Documents to which it is a party and the transactions contemplated thereby;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>any provisions in the Transaction Documents that constitute material changes to the terms and conditions set forth in the Term Sheet; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>the apportionment of the Credit Subsidy Cost.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(jj)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Credit Subsidy Cost</u>. Receipt by DOE of a final credit rating for the Project at least equal to the initial credit rating for the Project in connection with the Application (or an equivalent rating) at least 30 days and not more than 90 days prior to the Execution Date from a nationally recognized statistical rating organization.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(oo)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">[Reserved].</u></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(pp)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Changes</u>. There have been no material changes to the terms and conditions contained in the Term Sheet other than those changes agreed to by DOE, and the Financing Documents reflect those terms and conditions.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(qq)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compliance with Laws</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence that each Borrower Entity shall have complied with all Applicable Laws relating to the development, construction, completion, ownership, operation, and maintenance of the Project (including Environmental Laws, Davis-Bacon </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">33</p></div></div></div><hr 1954, as amended, Foreign Asset Control Regulations, Sanctions, Anti-Money Laundering Laws and Anti-Corruption Laws and all state and local licensing requirements).</div><div style="font-family:'Times style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>all existing Indebtedness of the Borrower (other than Permitted Indebtedness) has been repaid in full, and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New review of the Base Case Financial Model and ongoing diligence.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 5.02</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123205966"></a><a name="_Toc142338296"></a><a name="_Toc187350969"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent to FFB Purchase of the </b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">FFB Note</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The obligation of FFB to deliver an acceptance notice pursuant to Section&#160;5.1 (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Acceptance or Rejection of Principal Instruments</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">) of the FFB Note Purchase Agreement to purchase the FFB Note is subject to the prior satisfaction (or waiver in writing) as determined by FFB of each of the following conditions precedent as of the Execution Date and as of each First Advance Date:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent in the FFB Documents</u>. Each condition precedent under the FFB Documents to the purchase of the FFB Note by FFB shall have been satisfied in the sole determination of FFB.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Receipt of the Principal Instruments</u>. FFB shall have received from DOE each of the Principal Instruments. &#160; &#160; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Representations and Warranties</u>. Each of the representations and warranties made by the Borrower in or pursuant to the Financing Documents shall be true and correct in all respects on and as of such date as if made on and as of such date (or, to the extent such representations and warranties expressly relate to an earlier date, on and as of such earlier date).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 5.03</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref127923876"></a><a name="_Ref127923887"></a><a name="_Toc142338297"></a><a name="_Toc187350970"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent to the First Advance Date</b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> Under Tranche 1</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The obligation of DOE to deliver an Advance Request Approval Notice pursuant to </font><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 2.04(a)(ii)</u><font style="font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Advance Request Approval Notice</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">) directing FFB to make the First Advance under Tranche 1 in accordance with the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and the FFB Note shall be subject to the prior satisfaction (or waiver in writing) of each of the following conditions precedent as of the date of the Advance Request and to their continued satisfaction on the First Advance Date for such Advance, in each case, as determined by (a)&#160;in all cases, DOE; and (b)&#160;with respect to any documents or instruments addressed to FFB or to which FFB is party, FFB: </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Due Diligence</u>. DOE&#8217;s completion of a satisfactory bring-down of due diligence of the Borrower Entities, the Project, and all other matters related thereto.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Execution Date Conditions Precedent</u>. The Execution Date shall have occurred, and each of the Execution Date Conditions Precedent shall continue to be satisfied as of the First Advance Date. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>[Reserved].</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">First Advance Longstop Date</u>. The First Advance Date for such Tranche shall occur no later than the First Advance Longstop Date for such Tranche.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">34</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font><a name="_Hlk187406847"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Base Equity Funding Commitment; Adequate Project Funding</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence that:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the Sponsors have funded the total amount of the Base Equity Commitment required as of such date, &#160;including the funding in cash of one hundred fifty million Dollars ($150,000,000) in equity from the Sponsors; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>simultaneously with the funding of the First Advance under Tranche 1 there will be at least one hundred million Dollars ($100,000,000) in cash on deposit in the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">First Advance Date Certificates</u>. Receipt by DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>a Closing Certificate of each Borrower Entity (in the case of the Sponsors, in the form set out in the Sponsor Support Agreement), dated as of such First Advance Date; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>Tax Certificate of the Borrower, dated as of the First Advance Date or a certificate of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, certifying that each statement in the Tax Certificate of the Borrower delivered in accordance with the Execution Date is true and correct in all material respects as if made on such First Advance Date<i style="font-style:italic;">.</i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">[Reserved].</u> <font style="margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Construction Budget</u>. Receipt by DOE of an updated Construction Budget for Phase 2 in form and substance acceptable to DOE including any certifications requested by DOE from the Independent Engineer or a certification from the Borrower and the Independent Engineer that: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>there have been no changes to the Construction Budget with respect to amounts reflected therein or the timing of the payments, since the last Advance (except for those changes previously approved in writing by DOE);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>the Project has not incurred, and is not reasonably expected to incur, any Cost Overruns (except for Cost Overruns previously identified, agreed in writing by DOE, and reflected in the then-current Construction Budget); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>the aggregate amounts to be expended for each category of Project Costs do not exceed the aggregate amounts budgeted for such costs in the then-approved Construction Budget (unless covered by subclause (iv)); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>Cost Overruns in any category of Project Costs are sufficiently covered by available contingency in the Construction Budget; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>the proceeds of such Advance shall be used solely for payment or reimbursement of Eligible Project Costs.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref127933968"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project Milestone Schedule</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">; </u>Receipt by DOE of a certification from the Borrower and Independent Engineer that there have been no changes to the Project Milestone Schedule, except for those changes previously approved in writing by DOE.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Consultant Reports</u>. Receipt by DOE of a certificate from the following Secured Party Advisors, dated as of the date of the Advance Request, substantially in the form of <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit&#160;H</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form </i></div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">35</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div addressing such other matters as DOE may request and, to the extent required, an updated copy of the report delivered as of the Execution Date: </font></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Receipt by DOE of either:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>a certification from the Borrower that:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>there are no material changes to the Original Base Case Financial Model, or updated Base Case Financial Model, as applicable; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>there are no material changes to the assumptions therein, accompanied by a certificate from the Financial Advisor concurring with the Borrower&#8217;s assessment and assumptions set out in its certification; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>calculations demonstrating that both before and after giving effect to the Advance, (1) the Debt to Equity Ratio does not exceed the Maximum Debt to Equity Ratio and (2) the Borrower is in compliance with the Debt Sizing Parameters; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>a certified updated Base Case Financial Model demonstrating the Debt Sizing Parameters equal to or better than the then-current Base Case Financial Model for each consecutive twelve (12) month period ending on each Calculation Date set out therein, accompanied by:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>a certificate from the chief financial officer or similar officer of the Borrower that includes a written explanation from the Borrower of all variances from the Base Case Financial Model then in effect; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>a letter from the Financial Advisor confirming:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(1)</font>the mathematical accuracy of the computations therein;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(2)</font>the consistency in all material respects of the Base Case Financial Model with the Construction Budget and the Project Milestone Schedule; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(3)</font>that such updated Base Case Financial Model demonstrates the required financial ratios as set forth above; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(4)</font>calculations demonstrating that both before and after giving effect to the Advance, (I) the Debt to Equity Ratio does not exceed the Maximum Debt to Equity Ratio and (II) the Borrower is in compliance with the Debt Sizing Parameters.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">36</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(l)</font><a name="_Ref130495576"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Intellectual Property</u>. Receipt by DOE of: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref130495567"></a>a complete and correct copy of each further or amended Project IP Agreement between Borrower or a Borrower Entity (as applicable) and confirmation that the licenses included in all Project IP Agreements between Borrower or Borrower Entity remain in full force and effect; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><a name="_Ref140244403"></a>evidence that: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>the Borrower exclusively owns all Project IP, or has rights to use all Project IP pursuant to a Project IP Agreement (other than any Project IP Agreement contemplated in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;5.03(n)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Intellectual Property</i>)), and confirmation that the licenses included in such Project IP Agreement remain in full force and effect;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>the Borrower and, to the extent applicable, each Borrower Entity has caused each licensor of rights to Project IP under a Project IP Agreement existing at such time to grant, or otherwise permit to grant to, Secured Parties a Secured Parties&#39; License and confirmation that such license remains in full force and effect; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>that each Borrower Entity has caused each licensor of Project IP to, grant to the Secured Parties, effective (i) during the continuance of an Event of Default; (ii) upon an enforcement and transfer of ownership in the Borrower; or (iii) upon any bankruptcy or insolvency action by the Borrower or DOE, an irrevocable, non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, fully paid-up and royalty&#8211;free right and license, for no additional consideration, to use and sublicense such Project IP included in the Collateral and such other rights as are necessary to practice, reproduce, distribute, modify, improve, disclose, compile, execute, make, display, perform and create derivative works of any and all software source code or to access and utilize the Project IP.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(m)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Required Approvals</u>. the Collateral;</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p
