and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><font style="white-space:pre-wrap;"> </font>(A)&#160;reimbursement of all fees and Secured Party Expenses of any Secured Party Advisors incurred in connection with the Project and invoiced prior to the date of such Advance; or (B) confirmation that such fees and Secured Party Expenses have been paid directly, in each case from funds other than the proceeds of the Guaranteed Loan. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(z)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project Accounts</u>. All Project Accounts (including all Reserve Accounts) shall have been funded in full to the then-applicable funding requirement as of the date of such Advance pursuant to the Accounts Agreement.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(aa)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Mitigation Action Plan</u> Receipt by DOE of an updated status report regarding compliance with the Mitigation Action Plan.<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Additional Conditions Precedent</u>. Additional conditions precedent, if any, to be included following review of the Base Case Financial Model and ongoing diligence.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 5.04</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187350971"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent to the First Advance Date Under Tranche 2</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The obligation of DOE to deliver an Advance Request Approval Notice pursuant to </font><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 2.04(a)(ii)</u><font style="font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Advance Request Approval Notice</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">) directing FFB to make the First Advance under Tranche 2 in accordance with the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and the FFB Note shall be subject to the prior satisfaction (or waiver in writing) of each of the following conditions precedent as of the date of the Advance Request and to their continued satisfaction on the First Advance Date for such Advance, in each case, as determined by (a)&#160;in all cases, DOE; and (b)&#160;with respect to any documents or instruments addressed to FFB or to which FFB is party, FFB: </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Due Diligence</u>. DOE&#8217;s completion of a satisfactory bring-down of due diligence of the Borrower Entities, the Project, and all other matters related thereto.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent in the FFB Documents</u>. Each of the conditions precedent (other than delivery of the Advance Request Approval Notice by DOE) to such Advance under the FFB Note in accordance with the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and such FFB Note have been satisfied.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">First Advance Longstop Date</u>. The First Advance Date for such Tranche shall occur no later than the First Advance Longstop Date for such Tranche.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Base Equity Funding Commitment; Adequate Project Funding</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence that:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the Sponsors have funded the total amount of its Base Equity Commitment required as of such date; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>(a) total amount of the Base Equity Commitment required to be contributed as of such date has been contributed to the Borrower and applied towards Project Costs, and any portion thereof not yet applied to Project Costs shall have been funded in cash into the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account; (b) the total amount of the Contingent Equity Commitment required to be funded as of such date has been funded in cash into the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account; and (c) each of the Borrower and the Independent Engineer have provided a certification and supporting information that (1) the Project has not incurred Cost Overruns in excess of the Budgeted Contingency, or to the extent any such Cost Overruns have been incurred, such Costs Overruns have been paid in full by the Sponsors from proceeds of additional equity contributions; and (2) the Guaranteed Loan plus the remaining Base Equity Commitment (including amounts projected to be paid from the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account pursuant to the latest Base Case </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">41</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">Financial Model) plus the remaining Contingent Equity Commitment plus any amounts on deposit in the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account in excess of $80 million and Construction Account, taken together, without double counting, will be sufficient to achieve Physical Completion by the Physical Completion Longstop Date and Project Completion by the Project Completion Longstop Date; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>(A) a Tax Certificate of the Borrower, dated as of such First Advance Date or (B) a certificate of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, certifying that the information of the Borrower in the Tax Certificate most recently provided to DOE under and in accordance with this Agreement is true and correct in all material respects as if delivered on such First Advance Date<i style="font-style:italic;">.</i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">[Reserved].</u> <font style="margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Construction Budget</u>. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>the Project has not incurred, and is not reasonably expected to incur, any Cost Overruns (except for Cost Overruns previously identified, agreed in writing by DOE, and reflected in the then-current Construction Budget); and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>the proceeds of such Advance shall be used solely for payment or reimbursement of Eligible Project Costs.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project Milestone Schedule; Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">; &#160; (1) </u>Receipt by DOE of a certification from the Borrower and Independent Engineer that there have been no changes to the Project Milestone Schedule, except for those changes previously approved in writing by DOE and (2) a Primavera P6 Level 3 schedule (or such other compatible schedule with a sufficient level of detail as agreed in writing by DOE in consultation with the Independent Engineer) and spending plan for the development and construction of the Project (the &#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan</b>&#8221;).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Base Case Financial Model</u>. Receipt by DOE of either:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>a certification from the Borrower that:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>there are no material changes to the Original Base Case Financial Model, or updated Base Case Financial Model, as applicable; </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">42</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>there are no material changes to the assumptions therein, accompanied by a certificate from the Financial Advisor concurring with the Borrower&#8217;s assessment and assumptions set out in its certification; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>calculations demonstrating that both before and after giving effect to the Advance, (1) the Debt to Equity Ratio does not exceed the Maximum Debt to Equity Ratio and (2) the Borrower is in compliance with the Debt Sizing Parameters; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>a certified updated Base Case Financial Model demonstrating Debt Sizing Parameters equal to or better than the then-current Base Case Financial Model for each consecutive twelve (12) month period ending on each Calculation Date set out therein, accompanied by:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>a certificate from the chief financial officer or similar officer of the Borrower that includes a written explanation from the Borrower of all variances from the Base Case Financial Model then in effect; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>a letter from the Financial Advisor confirming:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(1)</font>the mathematical accuracy of the computations therein;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(2)</font>the consistency in all material respects of the Base Case Financial Model with the Construction Budget and the Project Milestone Schedule;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(3)</font>that such updated Base Case Financial Model demonstrates the required financial ratios as set forth above; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(4)</font>calculations demonstrating that both before and after giving effect to the Advance, (I) the Debt to Equity Ratio does not exceed the Maximum Debt to Equity Ratio and (II) the Borrower is in compliance with the Debt Sizing Parameters.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Required Approvals</u>. Receipt by DOE of a Required Approvals Schedule and fully executed copies of all applicable Required Approvals set forth in the Required Approvals Schedule and (if requested by DOE and solely to the extent not previously provided) all such other Required Approvals required to be obtained for the ownership, commencement and completion of construction, operation and maintenance of the Project (except (x) any Required Approvals that by their nature are no longer needed for the construction, completion, ownership, operation or maintenance of the Project, or (y) those approvals that, by their nature, cannot be obtained at the current stage of the Project, provided that the failure to obtain any such permit is not related to any act or failure to act by or on behalf of the Borrower), together with a certificate of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, certifying that: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the copies submitted are true, correct and complete (including all schedules, exhibits, attachments, supplements and amendments thereto and any related protocols or side letters); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>no term or condition thereof has been amended from that delivered pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 5.04(k)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Required Approvals</i>); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>each such Required Approval has been validly issued, is in full force and effect and Non-Appealable; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>all conditions precedent to the effectiveness of each such Required Approval has been satisfied (or waived in accordance with its terms).</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">43</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(k)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Representations and Warranties</u>. Each of the representations and warranties made (or deemed made) by any Borrower Entity or Major Project Participant<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font>in any Transaction Document are true and correct in all material respects (except to the extent any such representation and warranty itself is qualified by &quot;materiality,&quot; &quot;material adverse effect&quot; or a similar qualifier, in which case it is true and correct in all respects) as of such date, except to the extent such representation or warranty is made only as of a specific date or time (in which event such representation or warranty is true and correct as of such date or time).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(l)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Transaction Documents</u>. To the extent not already delivered, receipt by DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>fully executed originals (in sufficient counterparts for each of DOE, FFB and the Collateral Agent), or copies thereof if permitted by DOE, of each Financing Document; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>fully executed copies of each Major Project Document and each other Project Document that is in effect at such time, together with a certificate of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, certifying that </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>the copies submitted are true, correct and complete (including all schedules, exhibits, attachments, supplements and amendments thereto and any related protocols or side letters);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>no term or condition thereof has been amended from that delivered pursuant to this clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(ii)</u>;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>each such Project Document is in full force and effect; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>all conditions precedent to the effectiveness of each such Project Document (if any) have been satisfied.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(m)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Litigation</u>. Receipt by DOE of an Officer&#8217;s Certificate of the Borrower or Borrower Entity, as applicable, certifying that there is no pending or, to the Borrower&#39;s or such Borrower Entity&#39;s Knowledge, as applicable, threatened (in writing) Adverse Proceeding, that relates to (i) the legality, validity or enforceability of any of the Transaction Documents or the ability of any Secured Party to exercise any of its rights under any of the Financing Documents or the remedies in respect of the Collateral pursuant to the Security Documents; (ii) any transaction contemplated by any such Transaction Document; or (iii) the Project or any Borrower Entity except, solely for this clause (iii), an Adverse Proceeding that is immaterial to the Project or such Borrower Entity.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(n)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Material Adverse Effect</u>. (B) the Borrower and each DBA Contract Party under each Davis-Bacon Act Covered Contract existing on or prior to such Advance Date have taken all necessary steps to comply with and are in compliance (including retroactive compliance) with the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">44</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(p)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Security</u>. All Security Documents continue to be in full force and effect, properly perfected, filed and registered or recorded in any jurisdiction and with any Governmental Authority where perfection, filing and registration or recordation is required, as applicable, and all liens or pledges in favor of the Secured Parties continue to be properly registered or recorded in favor of such Secured Parties. First Priority Lien on Borrower&#8217;s interest in the BNSF Property subject only to Permitted Liens, including all endorsements and affirmative coverages required by DOE and which are reasonably actively contesting in accordance with the Permitted Contest Conditions; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>each contractor or supplier under any Construction Contract, or their subcontractors, to be paid with the proceeds of such Advance and funds of the Borrower, has conditionally (or if applicable, finally and unconditionally) waived on terms satisfactory to DOE and released all Liens, </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New subcontractors may have or acquire on the Collateral or the Project with respect to work completed prior to its last submission for payment, such Lien waivers to be in form and substance prescribed by Applicable Law in the State of Montana.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compliance with Laws</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence that each Borrower Entity shall have complied with all Applicable Laws relating to the development, construction, completion, ownership, operation, and maintenance of the Project (including Environmental Laws, Davis-Bacon Requirements, Patriot Act, the Cargo Preference Act of 1954, as amended, Foreign Asset Control Regulations, Sanctions, Anti-Money Laundering Laws and Anti-Corruption Laws and all state and local licensing requirements).<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">IE&#8217;s Certificate</u>. &#160;Receipt by DOE of certifications from the Independent Engineer no more than ten (10) business days prior to the requested Advance date, (a) that the following funds available to the Borrower are (or, in the case of the Base Equity Commitment, will be) sufficient to achieve Project Completion by the Project Completion Longstop Date: (i) the amount of the requested Advance; (ii) the undisbursed amount of the Guaranteed Loan after giving effect to such Advance; (iii) the remaining Base Equity Commitment (including amounts projected to be paid from the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account pursuant to the latest Base Case Financial Model), (iv) the remaining Contingent Equity Commitment (in the amounts and at the times required pursuant to the Sponsor Support Agreement) and (iv) any amounts on deposit in the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account in excess of $80 million and Construction Account; (b) the Project is on schedule to achieve (i) Physical Completion in accordance with the Project Milestone Schedule; and (ii) Project Completion by the Project Completion Longstop Date; and (c) as to such other matters as required herein or as DOE may reasonably request.<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Legal Opinions</u>. Receipt by DOE and the other Secured Parties of executed copies of the following legal opinions (including originals thereof, as required) in respect of the Borrower and each Major Project Participant, dated as of the Execution Date and addressed to the Secured Parties: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>legal opinions in respect of any amendment, modification, termination or entry into any new Transaction Document that has been executed and delivered after the previous delivery of an applicable legal opinion, in each case, dated as of the Requested Advance Date, addressed to each Secured Party and from legal counsel satisfactory to DOE; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>to the extent that, since the date of the previous delivery of an applicable legal opinion furnished hereunder, there has been a material change in circumstances on any matter covered by such legal opinion, supplemental legal opinions with respect to the possible legal consequences of such changed circumstances, dated as of the Requested Advance Date, addressed to each Secured Party, and from legal counsel satisfactory to DOE; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>a legal opinion in respect of the Borrower in form and substance acceptable to DOE (A) that the Borrower has received the Governmental Approvals required for the construction, operation, maintenance, and ownership of the Project, except those Governmental Approvals that, by their nature, cannot be obtained at the current stage of development of the Project as of the date of such legal opinion (and provided that the failure to obtain any such Governmental Approval &#160;as of such date is not related to any act or failure to act by or on behalf of the Borrower), and (B) identifying all Governmental Approvals required to be obtained after the date of such legal opinion, and, in the case of each of (A) and (B), other than Governmental Approvals of a routine and immaterial nature that can be obtained in the Ordinary Course of Business.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Fees and Expenses</u>. Receipt by DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>payment in full or reimbursement of all fees required to be paid on or prior to the date of such Advance and all Secured Party Expenses and other fees or expenses (if any) then due and payable in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">4.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>); and </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">46</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>(A)&#160;reimbursement of all fees and Secured Party Expenses of any Secured Party Advisors incurred in connection with the Project and invoiced prior to the date of such Advance; cost management; procurement management; Project scope management; schedule management; quality management; risk management; and organizational management (including qualifications of key personnel).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Reserve Account as and when necessary, in order to ensure that the amounts on deposit therein or credited at any time are not less than $80 million (which commitment shall be capped at the difference between: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(1)</font>the then-forecasted amount of equity to be contributed to reach the Commercial Operations Date for Phase 2 of the Project (calculated, in a manner approved by DOE, as the then-forecasted remaining capex (excluding contingency) necessary to reach the Commercial Operations Date <i style="font-style:italic;">less</i> the then-forecasted amount the Borrower will receive through Advances under the Guaranteed Loan forecasted to be used for capex (for the avoidance of doubt, excluding that portion of such Advances forecasted to be used to fund reserves or contingency)) and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(2)</font>the amount of cash on hand at that time in the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account, such amount, the &#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Phase 2 Equity Cap</b>&#8221;); </div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:2.1pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 105.9pt;"><i style="font-style:italic;">provided,</i> that on a future date following the delivery of the Phase 2 Equity Instrument, upon the delivery by the Borrower to DOE of a certificate (which shall be delivered within 30 days following a Calculation Date) demonstrating, to the satisfaction of DOE, that the Phase 2 Equity Cap, if it were calculated on such future date, would be less than the Phase 2 Equity Cap under the as-delivered Phase 2 Equity Instrument, the Phase 2 Equity Cap shall be reduced by an amount equal to 10% of the difference between the Phase 2 Equity Cap under the as-delivered Phase 2 Equity Instrument and the calculation of the Phase 2 Equity Cap on such future date.<sup style="font-size:8.25pt;vertical-align:top;"><a style="vertical-align:super;" href="#footnote-3">1</a></sup></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(dd)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Cost Estimate</u>. The Base Case Financial Model achieves a cost estimate class of &#8220;Class 3&#8221; based on an all-in total project weighted basis.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ee)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Additional Items</u>. Receipt by DOE of such other documents, certifications or consents relating to the project, any Borrower Entity, any Major Project Participant or the matters contemplated by the Transaction Documents as it may reasonably request.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ff)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Additional Conditions Precedent</u>. Additional conditions precedent, if any, to be included following review of the Base Case Financial Model and ongoing diligence.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(gg)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Aggregate Advances</u>. Receipt of evidence by DOE that the aggregate principal amount of all Advances, after giving effect to the Advances to be made on such Requested Advance Date, </div><div style="margin-bottom:5pt;margin-top:15pt;width:25%;border-bottom:1px solid black;"></div><a name="footnote-3"></a><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><sup style="font-size:7.5pt;vertical-align:top;">1</sup> <a name="_Hlk183436782"></a>For the avoidance of doubt, below is an illustrative example.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">If: </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">(1) [***] in total capex (without contingency) to reach COD; </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">(2) DOE Advances are [***] (calculated for this example as 55% of total capex costs, not including DSRA funding or contingency); </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">(3) total forecasted equity required to reach COD is [***]; </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">(4) cash on hand is $[***]. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">Then the Phase 2 Equity Cap would equal [***]. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">If on a future date the calculation of the Phase 2 Equity Cap would be equal to [***], then the Phase 2 Equity Cap would be decreased by the product of [***] (the difference between the Phase 2 Equity Cap as originally calculated and the calculation of the Phase 2 Equity Cap on such future date) and 10%. </p></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">49</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">do not exceed the Maximum Guaranteed Loan Amount or the Maximum Tranche Amount for the Tranche under which such Advance is being made.</font></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(hh)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Use of Proceeds</u>. Receipt by DOE of (i) evidence that the proceeds of the requested Advance will be applied in accordance with Section <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">2.04(e) </u>(<i style="font-style:italic;">Disbursement of Proceeds</i>); and (ii) invoices or other documentation evidencing the incurrence of such Eligible Project Costs. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Judgment Liens</u>. No judgment Lien exists against any of the Borrower&#8217;s property for Indebtedness owed to the United States of America or any delinquent federal, state or local Indebtedness, including tax liabilities, except for balances or claims in the normal course of business that the Borrower is actively contesting in accordance with the Permitted Contest Conditions.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(jj)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Program Requirements</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence that the Borrower is in compliance with or shall have satisfied, as applicable, all requirements and approvals pursuant to the Program Requirements.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(kk)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Payment of Fees</u>. Receipt by DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>payment in full of all fees required under the Financing Documents to be paid on or prior to the Requested Advance Date, and all Secured Party Expenses and reimbursement of all fees and Secured Party Expenses of any Secured Party Advisors, incurred and invoiced prior to the Requested Advance Date; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>confirmation that all such fees and Secured Party Expenses have been paid directly to the relevant Secured Party Advisors.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ll)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Environmental Compliance</u>. Receipt by DOE of a written certification by the Borrower that the Borrower is and has been, in all material respects, in compliance with all applicable Environmental Laws and all Required Approvals thereunder, and has and maintains in full force and effect all Required Approvals applicable to the construction and operation of the Project as of the date of such Advance under any applicable Environmental Law. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(mm)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Violation</u>. The making of the requested Advance shall not result in a violation of any Applicable Law, Transaction Document, Governmental Approval, or any other agreement or consent to which any Borrower Entity is a party, or any judgment or approval to which any Borrower Entity is subject.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(nn)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Offtake</u>. Receipt by DOE of Phase 2 offtake agreements covering at least 50% of the Phase 2 production capacity as described by the Base Case Financial Model &#160;reasonably acceptable to DOE and, in the case of any such offtake agreement that is a Major Project Document, such agreement shall be in form and substance either (a) substantially similar (or better) to the existing offtake agreements of the Borrower that are Major Project Documents or (b) otherwise reasonably acceptable to DOE.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(oo)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Debt to Equity Ratio.</u> Both before and after giving effect to the Advance, the ratio of (a) the aggregate principal amount of Advances outstanding under the Guaranteed Loan (including all interest that has been capitalized or that shall be capitalized pursuant to the FFB Note) to (b) the aggregate amount of Base Equity Contributions made as of such date (the &#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Debt to Equity Ratio</b>&#8221;) shall not exceed 55:45 (the &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Maximum Debt to Equity Ratio</b>&quot;).</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">50</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 5.05</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc175842072"></a><a name="_Toc175842333"></a><a name="_Toc175842592"></a><a name="_Toc175842073"></a><a name="_Toc175842334"></a><a name="_Toc175842593"></a><a name="_Toc175842074"></a><a name="_Toc175842335"></a><a name="_Toc175842594"></a><a name="_Toc175842075"></a><a name="_Toc175842336"></a><a name="_Toc175842595"></a><a name="_Toc187350972"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent to Each Subsequent Advance Date Under Tranche 2</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The obligation of DOE to deliver an Advance Request Approval Notice pursuant to </font><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 2.04(a)(ii)</u><font style="font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Advance Request Approval Notice</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">) directing FFB to make the an Advance under Tranche 2 in accordance with the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and the FFB Note shall be subject to the prior satisfaction (or waiver in writing) of each of the following conditions precedent as of the date of the Advance Request and to their continued satisfaction on the First Advance Date for such Advance, in each case, as determined by (a)&#160;in all cases, DOE; and (b)&#160;with respect to any documents or instruments addressed to FFB or to which FFB is party, FFB: </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Advance Request</u>. Receipt by DOE from the Borrower of an Advance Request and a Borrower Advance Date Certificate pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">2.03(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Advance Requests</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Conditions Precedent in the FFB Documents</u>. Each of the conditions precedent (other than delivery of the Advance Request Approval Notice by DOE) to such Advance under the FFB Note in accordance with the FFB Note Purchase Agreement and such FFB Note have been satisfied.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Representations and Warranties</u>. Each of the representations and warranties made by any Borrower Entity in or pursuant to any Financing Document shall be true and correct in all material respects (except (i) such representations and warranties that by their terms are qualified by materiality or Material Adverse Effect, and (ii) in the case of the Borrower, the representations and warranties set forth in Sections <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.23</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Anti-Corruption Laws</i>),<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.24</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Environmental Laws</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.26</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> </u>(<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.28</u> <i style="font-style:italic;">(Sanctions and Anti-Money Laundering</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.29</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Cargo Preference Act</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.30</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Lobbying Restriction</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.31</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Federal Funding</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.32</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">No Federal Debt Delinquency</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.33</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">No Tax-Exempt Indebtedness</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.35</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Use of Proceeds</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.36</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">No Immunity</i>), and <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">6.37</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">No Fraudulent Intent</i>), which representations and warranties shall, in each case, be true and correct in all respects) on and as of such date as if made on and as of such date (or, to the extent such representations and warranties expressly relate to an earlier date, on and as of such earlier date), before and after giving effect to the extensions of credit requested to be made on such date.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Debt Sizing Parameters</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence that the Borrower shall be in compliance with the Debt Sizing Parameters after giving effect to the Advances to be made on such Requested Advance Date.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Due Diligence</u>. DOE&#8217;s completion of a satisfactory bring-down of due diligence of the Borrower Entities, the Project, and all other matters related thereto.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Base Equity Funding Commitment; Adequate Project Funding</u>. Receipt by DOE of evidence that:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the Sponsors have funded the total amount of its Base Equity Commitment required as of such date; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>(a) the total amount of the Base Equity Commitment required to be contributed as of such date has been contributed to the Borrower and applied towards Project Costs, and any portion thereof not yet applied to Project Costs shall have been funded in cash into the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account; (b) the total amount of the Contingent Equity Commitment required to be funded as of such date has been funded in cash into the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account; and (c) each of the Borrower and the Independent Engineer have provided a certification and supporting information that (1) the Project has not incurred Cost Overruns in excess of the Budgeted Contingency, or to the extent any such Cost Overruns have been incurred, such Costs Overruns have been paid in full by the Sponsors from proceeds of additional equity contributions; and (2) the Guaranteed Loan plus the remaining Base Equity Commitment (including amounts projected to be paid from the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account pursuant to the latest Base Case Financial Model) plus the remaining Contingent Equity Commitment plus any amounts on </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">51</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">deposit in the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account in excess of $80 million and Construction Account, taken together, without double counting, will be sufficient to achieve Physical Completion by the Physical Completion Longstop Date and Project Completion by the Project Completion Longstop Date. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Receipt by DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>an Advance Request and Borrower Advance Date Certificate of each Borrower Entity, dated as of the relevant Advance Date under Tranche 2; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>(A) a Tax Certificate of the Borrower, dated as of such Advance Date or (B) a certificate of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, certifying that the information of the Borrower in the Tax Certificate most recently provided to DOE under and in accordance with this Agreement is true and correct in all material respects as if delivered on such Advance Date<i style="font-style:italic;">.</i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">[Reserved].</u><font style="margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Construction Budget</u>. Receipt by DOE of an updated Construction Budget for Phase 2 in form and substance acceptable to DOE including any certifications requested by DOE from the Independent Engineer or a certification from the Borrower and the Independent Engineer that: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>there have been no changes to the Construction Budget with respect to amounts reflected therein or the timing of the payments, since the last Advance (except for those changes previously approved in writing by DOE); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>the Project has not incurred, and is not reasonably expected to incur, any Cost Overruns (except for Cost Overruns previously identified, agreed in writing by DOE, and reflected in the then-current Construction Budget); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>the aggregate amounts to be expended for each category of Project Costs do not exceed the aggregate amounts budgeted for such costs in the then-approved Construction Budget (unless covered by subclause (iv)); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>Cost Overruns in any category of Project Costs are sufficiently covered by available contingency in the Construction Budget; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>the proceeds of such Advance shall be used solely for payment or reimbursement of Eligible Project Costs.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project Milestone Schedule</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">; Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan.</u> Receipt by DOE of a certification from the Borrower and Independent Engineer that there have been no changes to the Project Milestone Schedule or Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan, except for those changes previously approved in writing by DOE.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(k)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Base Case Financial Model</u>. and</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">52</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>calculations demonstrating that both before and after giving effect to the Advance, (1) the Debt to Equity Ratio does not exceed the Maximum Debt to Equity Ratio and (2) the Borrower is in compliance with the Debt Sizing Parameters; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>a report from the chief financial officer of the Borrower confirming:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(1)</font>the mathematical accuracy of the computations therein;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(2)</font>the consistency in all material respects of the Base Case Financial Model with the Construction Budget and the Project Milestone Schedule;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(3)</font>that such updated Base Case Financial Model demonstrates the required financial ratios as set forth above;
