style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>DOE&#8217;s execution and delivery of this Agreement and issuance of the Loan Guarantee, and any determination by DOE that any Project Costs are Eligible Project Costs, in each case, (i) does not prejudice or otherwise have any binding effect with respect to any determination by the Internal Revenue Service, the U.S. Department of Treasury or a court of law as to the tax basis of the Project or any part thereof under the Code, (ii) does not constitute a determination regarding, and is unrelated to whether the Borrower or such other Borrower Entity or the Project has complied or will comply with Federal tax law and (iii) will not be used to demonstrate or prove that the Borrower or such other Borrower Entity or the Project complied with the requirements to claim a tax credit or other amount under the Code in an administrative or judicial proceeding. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.12</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338314"></a><a name="_Toc187350988"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Financial Statements</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>Each of the Historical Financial Statements and each Financial Statement of the Borrower, Direct Parent and Sponsors (to the extent required) delivered to DOE pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Financial Statements</i>) is complete and correct, has been prepared in accordance with the Designated Standard and presents fairly, in all material respects, the financial condition of the Borrower or such Sponsor, as applicable, as of the respective dates of the Financial Statements for the respective periods covered therein. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>Such Financial Statements reflect all liabilities or obligations of the relevant Borrower Entity of any nature whatsoever for the period to which such Financial Statements relate that are required to be disclosed in accordance with the Designated Standard. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>As of the Execution Date or the date of delivery of such Financial Statements pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Financial Statements</i>), as applicable, or the respective date of such Financial Statements, whichever is earlier, none of the Borrower, the Direct Parent, such Sponsors and the applicable Borrower Entities has incurred or assumed any liabilities or obligations that would be required to be disclosed in accordance with the Designated Standard and which are not reflected in such Financial Statements or the notes thereto.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.13</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338315"></a><a name="_Toc187350989"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Business; Other Transactions</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">62</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower has not conducted any business other than the business contemplated by the Transaction Documents and such other business as may be related to the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower is not a party to, or bound by, any contract other than those contracts permitted under the Financing Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>Except as provided in the Financing Documents, the Borrower has not executed and delivered any powers of attorney or similar documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower has not paid or become obligated to pay: (i) any fee or commission to any broker, finder or intermediary for or on account of arranging the financing of the transactions contemplated by the Transaction Documents, or (ii) any contingency fee (computed as a percentage of any amount of the Guaranteed Loan) to any financial or other professional advisors of the Borrower.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>Except as set forth on <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 6.13(e)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Affiliate Transactions</i>), the Borrower is not a party to any contract or agreement with, and does not have any other loan commitment to, any Affiliate.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>The Borrower has not: (i) entered into any transaction or series of related transactions with any Person (including any Affiliate) other than in the Ordinary Course of Business and on an arm&#39;s length basis; or (ii) entered into any transaction whereby the Borrower might pay more than the fair market value for products of others.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>The Borrower has not made any Investments other than Permitted Investments. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font>The Borrower has no Subsidiaries and does not legally or beneficially own any Equity Interests of any other Person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>Each of the Project Milestone Schedule and Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan, as amended or supplemented in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement: (i)&#160;is complete and based on reasonable assumptions made in good faith; and (ii)&#160;is consistent with the provisions of the Transaction Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font>The Borrower has maintained adequate internal controls, reporting systems and cost control systems that are designed to ensure that the Borrower satisfies its obligations under the Financing Documents. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.14</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338316"></a><a name="_Toc187350990"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Accounts</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. As of the First Advance Date under Tranche 1, the Borrower does not own or maintain any accounts with a bank or financial institution other than the Project Accounts and the Company Account. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.15</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338317"></a><a name="_Toc187350991"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Property</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Title to Collateral </u></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 6.15-1</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Phase 1</i> <i style="font-style:italic;">Project Site</i>) identifies the land comprising the Phase 1 Project Site. <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 6.15-2 (</u><i style="font-style:italic;">Project Site</i>) identifies the land comprising the Project Site &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>As of the Execution Date, the Borrower has valid leasehold, subleasehold, and easement interests in the Phase 1 Project Site free and clear of any Lien of any kind, except for Permitted Liens, and other than Permitted Liens, no contracts or arrangements, conditional or unconditional, exist for the creation by the Borrower of any Lien on any property, other than the Security Documents; and none of the Permitted Liens, individually or in the aggregate, would materially impair the development, </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">63</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">construction, operation, or use by (or for the benefit of) the Borrower of the Phase 1 Project Site for Phase 1. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>As of the First Advance Date under Tranche 1, the Borrower has valid leasehold, subleasehold, and easement interests in the Project Site, or irrevocable options to obtain such interests in, the Project Site, free and clear of any Lien of any kind, except for Permitted Liens, and other than Permitted Liens, no contracts or arrangements, conditional or unconditional, exist for the creation by the Borrower of any Lien on the Project Site, other than the Security Documents; and none of the Permitted Liens, individually or in the aggregate, would materially impair the development, construction, operation, or use by (or for the benefit of) the Borrower of the Project Site for the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>As of the First Advance Date under Tranche 1, all easements, leasehold and other Real Property interests and utility and other related services, means of transportation, facilities, other materials and Real Property rights that can reasonably be expected to be necessary for the construction, completion and operation of the Project in accordance with Applicable Laws and the Transaction Documents have been procured under the Major Project Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Leases</u>. Any Leases material to the Project in existence on the date of this representation and under which the Borrower is a lessee, sublessee or licensee are valid and subsisting, the Borrower is not in default under any of such Leases, the Borrower enjoys peaceful and undisturbed possession of the Real Property subject to such Leases, and the Borrower has the right to continue to enjoy such possession during the time when such Real Property is necessary for the Project. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref127934583"></a><a name="project_Site"></a><a name="_Ref140333819"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project Site</u>. The Project Site is sufficient and appropriate in all respects for the development, siting, design, engineering, construction, ownership, operation, maintenance and use of the Project as contemplated by the Transaction Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Boundaries</u>. &#160;Except as shown on the Site Map (or the BNSF Site Map, if applicable), all of the improvements on the Project Site lie wholly within the boundaries and building restriction lines of the Project Site, and no improvements on adjoining properties encroach upon the Project Site, and no improvements on the Project Site encroach upon or violate any easements or other encumbrances upon the Project Site, in each case, so as to materially impair the development, construction, operation, or use by (or for the benefit of) the Borrower of the Project Site for the Project, except those which are insured against by title insurance. To Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, the Site Map (or the BNSF Site Map, if applicable) does not fail to reflect any material matter affecting the Project Site or the title thereto.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Condemnation</u>. &#160;No condemnation or adverse zoning or usage change proceeding has occurred been threatened against any of the Real Property that could materially impair the development, construction, operation, access to or use by (or for the benefit of) the Borrower of the Project Site for the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.16</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338318"></a><a name="_Toc187350992"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project Milestone Schedule and Construction Budget; Operating Forecasts and Base Case Financial Model</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Construction Budget, the Project Milestone Schedule, Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan and the Base Case Financial Model:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>are complete and based on reasonable assumptions;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>are consistent with the provisions of the Project Documents related thereto;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>have been prepared in good faith and with due care; and</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">64</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>fairly represent the Borrower&#39;s expectation as to the matters covered thereby as of any date on which this representation is made or deemed made.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Project Milestone Schedule accurately specifies in summary form the work that each Construction Contractor and Equipment Supplier proposes to complete on or before the deadlines specified therein. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Construction Budget represents the Borrower&#8217;s best estimate of Total Project Costs anticipated to be incurred to achieve the Project Completion Longstop Date. &#160;The Construction Budget has not been amended or changed in any material respect other than to reflect changes resulting from Approved Construction Changes.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower&#8217;s good faith estimate and belief is that the Project Completion Date will occur no later than the Project Completion Longstop Date.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>The Borrower believes that it is technically feasible for the Project to be constructed, completed, operated and maintained so as to fulfill in all material respects the design specifications and requirements contained in the Major Project Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.17</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338319"></a><a name="_Toc187350993"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Intellectual Property</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 6.17(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Intellectual Property</i>) identifies all of the Project IP and all of the Project IP Agreements. The Borrower exclusively owns, or has a valid and enforceable license or right to use, all Project IP.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>Neither the Borrower nor any other Borrower Entity is in breach of or default under any <a name="_9kR3WTr2667ABVIgdp4wtvQTB3w4yq6P7zpqMLC"></a><a name="_9kR3WTr2667B9SIgdp4wtvQTB3w4yq6P7zpqMLC"></a>Project IP Agreement then in effect. &#160;To the Borrower&#8217;s Knowledge, there are no facts or circumstances that would be reasonably expected (after the giving of notice, the lapse of time, or both) to give rise to any revocation or termination of any Project IP Agreement, or the Borrower&#8217;s rights or licenses to Project IP thereunder.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>Borrower&#39;s right, title and interest in and to the Project IP owned by Borrower is free and clear of all Liens, except for Permitted Liens. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.18</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338320"></a><a name="_Toc187350994"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Infringement; No Adverse Proceedings</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>Neither the Borrower, its respective businesses, nor the development, design, engineering, procurement, construction, starting up, commissioning, ownership, operation, use or maintenance of the Project infringe upon, misappropriate or otherwise violate the Intellectual Property of any Person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>There is no objection to, challenge to the validity of, or any Adverse Proceeding past, present, or pending to which Borrower or any other Borrower Entity is a party, and no Adverse Proceeding threatened in writing and no written objection (including any demand to take a license to Intellectual Property) against the Borrower or any other Borrower Entity: (i) alleging any infringement, misappropriation or other violation of the Intellectual Property of any Person: (A)&#160;by the Borrower; or (B)&#160;with respect to the development, design, engineering, procurement, construction, starting up, commissioning, ownership, use or maintenance of the Project; or (ii)&#160;challenging the validity, enforceability, ownership or use of any Project IP owned by Borrower. &#160;There are no facts or circumstances that would be reasonably expected to give rise to any such Adverse Proceeding.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>No Person is infringing, misappropriating or otherwise violating any Project IP owned by the Borrower or any other Borrower Entity. &#160;There is no Adverse Proceeding pending to which </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">65</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">the Borrower is a party or threatened in writing by the Borrower or any other Borrower Entity, alleging such infringement, misappropriation or other violation.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.19</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338322"></a><a name="_Toc187350995"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Amendments to Transaction Documents</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. None of the Transaction Documents to which the Borrower is a party has been amended, modified or terminated, except in accordance with or as permitted by this Agreement or as disclosed to DOE and consented to in writing by DOE.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.20</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338324"></a><a name="_Toc187350996"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compliance with Laws; Program Requirements</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower is in compliance with, and has conducted and is conducting its business in compliance with, (a) all Applicable Law (including all Program Requirements with respect to the Project), (b) in all material respects, all Required Approvals and (c) its Organizational Documents.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.21</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338325"></a><a name="_Toc187350997"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Investment Company Act</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower is not an &quot;investment company,&quot; or a company &quot;controlled&quot; by an &quot;investment company,&quot; within the meaning of the Investment Company Act, or subject to regulation thereunder.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.22</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338326"></a><a name="_Toc187350998"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Margin Stock</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. No part of the proceeds of any Advance, and no other extensions of credit under the FFB Documents, will be used, directly or indirectly, to purchase or carry any margin stock within the meaning of Regulation T, U or X of the Board, or any regulations, interpretations or rulings thereunder, or for any purpose that violates any regulation of the Board.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.23</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref143911751"></a><a name="_Ref130502128"></a><a name="_Ref130502134"></a><a name="_Toc149993000"></a><a name="_Toc187350999"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Anti-Corruption Laws</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>Each Borrower Entity and its directors, officers, employees and, to such Borrower Entity&#39;s Knowledge, agents, are, and for the last five (5) years have been, in compliance with all Anti-Corruption Laws. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>There are no Adverse Proceedings pending or, to the Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, threatened against or affecting any Borrower Entity or their respective directors, officers or employees regarding any actual or alleged non-compliance with any Anti-Corruption Laws.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>No Borrower Entity, nor its directors, officers, employees nor, to such Borrower Entity&#39;s Knowledge, agents, has made, offered or promised to make, provided or paid any unlawful contributions, entertainment or anything of value to any local or foreign official, foreign political party or party official or any candidate for foreign political office:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>in order to influence any act or decision of any foreign official, foreign political party, party official or candidate for foreign political office in his or her official capacity, including a decision to fail to perform his or her official functions;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>to secure an unlawful or improper advantage; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>with the intent to induce the recipient to misuse his or her official position to direct business wrongfully to any Borrower Entity or any of its Affiliates or to any other Person, in violation of any applicable Anti-Corruption Law.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.24</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref130497571"></a><a name="_Ref130497578"></a><a name="_Toc142338328"></a><a name="_Toc187351000"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Environmental Laws</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>All Required Approvals for the Project relating to (i)&#160;air emissions; (ii)&#160;discharges to surface water or ground water; (iii)&#160;noise emissions; (iv)&#160;solid or liquid waste disposal; (v) the use, generation, storage, transportation or disposal of toxic or Hazardous Substances or wastes; or (vi) otherwise required under applicable Environmental Law have been obtained and are final and Non-Appealable.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">66</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower has not received, and the Borrower does not have Knowledge of any facts, circumstances, conditions, actions, activities, or events that have resulted or could reasonably be expected to result in any, Environmental Claim against or affecting the Project, or the Project Site that is, or could reasonably be expected to become material.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>There is not and has not been any condition, circumstance, action, activity or event with respect to the Project, the Borrower or the Project Site that could reasonably form the basis of any violation of any Environmental Law or that could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect or result in material harm to environmental, health or safety matters. &#160;The Borrower is and has been in compliance with all applicable Environmental Law.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>None of the Borrower, any Borrower Entity nor, to the Borrower&#8217;s Knowledge, any other Person, has used, generated, manufactured, produced, stored, transported or Released, on, from, under or about the Project Site or transported thereto or therefrom, any Hazardous Substances in any manner that violates Applicable Law or violates the terms and conditions of any Required Approval and could reasonably be expected to (i) form the basis of an Environmental Claim; (ii) cause the Project to be subject to any restrictions arising under Environmental Laws; (iii) have a Material Adverse Effect; or (iv) result in material harm to the environment, health or safety.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>The Borrower is in compliance with the Mitigation Action Plan.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.25</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338329"></a><a name="_Toc187351001"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Employment and Labor Contracts</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>As of the Execution Date:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>with respect to the Project, the Borrower is not or has not been within the past two (2)&#160;years (A) a party to or bound by any collective bargaining or similar agreement with any union, labor organization or other bargaining agent; or (B) subject to any labor disputes, strikes or work stoppages, requests for arbitration, grievance proceedings or union negotiations or organizational efforts; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>to the Borrower&#8217;s Knowledge, with respect to the Project, there has not been in the past three (3) years, any organized effort or demand for recognition or certification or attempt to organize employees of the Borrower by any labor organization.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>There are no strikes, slowdowns or work stoppages ongoing or threatened in writing by the employees of any of the Borrower or, to the Borrower&#8217;s Knowledge, any Major Project Participant that have caused or could reasonably be expected to cause a Material Adverse Effect.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.26</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131017593"></a><a name="_Toc142338330"></a><a name="_Toc187351002"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Davis-Bacon Act</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower Entities and all DBA Contract Parties under each Davis Bacon Act Covered Contract have taken all necessary steps to comply with and are in compliance (including retroactive compliance) with the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>As of the Execution Date, there are no Davis-Bacon Act Covered Contracts except for those listed in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 6.26(b)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act Covered Contracts</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref140234597"></a>If and to the extent construction, alteration or repair (within the meaning of 29 C.F.R. &#167;5.5(a)) of the Project began prior to the Execution Date, the Borrower Entities have prior to the Execution Date, retroactively adjusted, and caused each DBA Contract Party to retroactively adjust, the wages of each affected laborer and mechanic employed in the construction, alteration or repair of the Project prior to the Execution Date, and paid or caused to be paid to each such laborer or mechanic such additional wages, if any, as were necessary for such laborers and mechanics to have been paid at rates not less than </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">67</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">those prevailing on similar work in the relevant locality during the period such work was performed, as determined by the Secretary of Labor in accordance with the Davis-Bacon Act wage determinations attached to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit G</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act Contract Provisions</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.27</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123229130"></a><a name="_Ref140333372"></a><a name="_Ref140333388"></a><a name="_Toc142338331"></a><a name="_Toc187351003"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">E</b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">RISA</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower and each of its ERISA Affiliates have operated the Employee Benefit Plans in compliance with their terms and with all applicable provisions and requirements of the Code, ERISA and all other Applicable Law and have performed all their respective obligations under such plan.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>Each Employee Benefit Plan has been determined by the IRS to be so qualified or is in the process of being submitted to the IRS for approval or will be so submitted during the applicable remedial amendment period, and, nothing has occurred since the date of such determination that would adversely affect such determination (or, in the case of an Employee Benefit Plan with no determination, nothing has occurred that would materially adversely affect such qualification).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>There exists no Unfunded Pension Liabilities with respect to Employee Benefit Plans in the aggregate, taking into account only Employee Benefit Plans with positive Unfunded Pension Liabilities.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>There are no Adverse Proceedings pending against or threatened involving an Employee Benefit Plan (other than routine claims for benefits) or, to the Borrower&#8217;s Knowledge, any Borrower Entity or any ERISA Affiliate, which would reasonably be expected to be asserted successfully against any Employee Benefit Plan and, if so asserted successfully, would reasonably be expected, either singly or in the aggregate, to have a Material Adverse Effect.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>No ERISA Event has occurred or is reasonably expected to occur.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>Except to the extent required under Section&#160;4980B of the Code or comparable state law, no Employee Benefit Plan provides health or welfare benefits (through the purchase of insurance or otherwise) for any retired or former employee of the Borrower or any ERISA Affiliate.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>The execution and delivery of this Agreement and the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereunder (or the exercise by DOE of its rights under this Agreement) will not involve any non-exempt transaction that is subject to the prohibitions of Section&#160;406 of ERISA or in connection with which taxes could be imposed pursuant to Section&#160;4975(c)(1)(A)-(D) of the Code.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font>(i) The assets of the Borrower do not and will not constitute (A) &quot;plan assets&quot; within the meaning of Section&#160;3(42) of ERISA and DOL Regulations set forth in 29 C.F.R. 2510.3-101, or (B)&#160;the assets of any governmental, church, non-U.S. or other plan (&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Similar Law Plan</b>&quot;), and (ii)&#160;transactions by or with the Borrower are not and will not be subject to state statutes applicable to the Borrower regulating investments of fiduciaries with respect to any Similar Law Plan. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>Neither any Borrower Entity nor any ERISA Affiliate has ceased operations at a facility so as to become subject to the provisions of Section 4068(a) of ERISA, withdrawn as a substantial employer so as to become subject to the provisions of Section 4063 of ERISA or ceased making contributions to any Employee Benefit Plan subject to Section 4064(a) of ERISA to which it made contributions.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font>Neither any Borrower Entity nor any ERISA Affiliate has incurred or reasonably expects to incur any liability to PBGC save for any liability for premiums due in the ordinary course or other liability which would not reasonably be expected to have, either singly or in the aggregate, a Material Adverse Effect.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">68</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.28</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref143909245"></a><a name="_Ref131017611"></a><a name="_Toc149993005"></a><a name="_Toc187351004"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sanctions and Anti-Money Laundering Laws</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>None of the Borrower, any Borrower Entity or any of their Affiliates is a Prohibited Person, and each of the Borrower, the Sponsor, and their respective directors, officers, employees and, to the Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, agents, are and for the last five (5) years have been in compliance with all Sanctions. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>No Borrower Entity or any of their respective members, directors, officers, employees or, to the Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, agents, is a Prohibited Person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>None of the Collateral is owned, traded or used, directly or, to the Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, indirectly by a Prohibited Person or is located or organized in a Prohibited Jurisdiction.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower and each Borrower Entity, and their respective directors, officers, employees and, to the Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, agents, are and for the last five (5) years have been in compliance with all applicable Anti-Money Laundering Laws.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>There are no Adverse Proceedings pending or, to the Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, threatened, against or affecting any Borrower Entity or their respective directors, officers, or employees regarding any actual or alleged non-compliance with any Sanctions or Anti-Money Laundering Laws.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>The Borrower has implemented, maintained, and at all times complied with policies and procedures reasonably designed to ensure compliance with all applicable International Compliance Directives and Anti-Money Laundering Laws.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.29</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131017628"></a><a name="_Toc142338333"></a><a name="_Toc187351005"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Cargo Preference Act</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font><i style="color:#1f4e79;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;"> </i><font style="font-weight:normal;">The Borrower is in compliance with the Cargo Preference Act of 1954, as amended, and all related implementing regulations with respect to all equipment, materials and commodities procured, contracted or obtained in connection with the Project, or has entered into an agreement with the United States Maritime Administration with respect to such compliance.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.30</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131017635"></a><a name="_Toc142338334"></a><a name="_Toc187351006"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Lobbying Restriction</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower is in compliance with all requirements of 31 U.S.C. &#167; 1352, as amended, including the requirement that no proceeds of the Advances be expended by the Borrower or any of its Affiliates to pay any Person for influencing or attempting to influence an officer or employee of any federal agency, a member of the U.S. Congress, an officer or employee of the U.S. Congress, or an employee of a member of Congress in connection with the making of the Guaranteed Loan or any other action described in 31 U.S.C. &#167;&#160;1352(a)(2).</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.31</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131017642"></a><a name="_Toc142338335"></a><a name="_Toc187351007"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Federal Funding</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. No application has been delivered by the Borrower to, and no application is pending review or approval by, any Governmental Authority for allocation of Federal Funding to the Project.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.32</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123234104"></a><a name="_Toc142338336"></a><a name="_Toc187351008"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Federal Debt Delinquency</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. No Borrower Entity has:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>any judgment Lien against any of its Property for a debt owed to the United States or any other creditor, or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>any Indebtedness (other than a debt under the Code) owed to the United States or any Governmental Authority thereof that is in delinquent status, as the term &quot;delinquent status&quot; is defined in 31 C.F.R. 285.13(d), including any Tax liabilities (other than those Tax liabilities contested in accordance with the Permitted Contest Conditions), except to the extent such delinquency has been resolved with the appropriate Governmental Authority in accordance with Applicable Law. </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">69</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.33</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131017658"></a><a name="_Toc142338337"></a><a name="_Toc187351009"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Tax-Exempt Indebtedness</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. Neither the Guaranteed Loan nor the FFB Note Reimbursement Obligations finance, either directly or indirectly, tax-exempt debt obligations, consistent with the requirements of Section&#160;149(b) of the Code. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.34</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338338"></a><a name="_Toc187351010"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sufficient Funds</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The remaining Loan Commitment Amount, the remaining Base Equity Commitment (including amounts projected to be paid from the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account pursuant to the latest Base Case Financial Model), the remaining Contingent Equity Commitment (in the amounts and at the times required pursuant to the Sponsor Support Agreement), any amounts on deposit in the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account in excess of $80 million and any amounts on deposit in the Construction Account and, with respect to any date on which this representation is made which is an Advance Date, the amount of the requested Advance are, collectively, sufficient to pay all remaining Project Costs (including any reasonably expected Cost Overruns) in accordance with the then-applicable Construction Budget and Project Milestone Schedule and to achieve Project Completion by the Project Completion Longstop Date. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.35</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131017667"></a><a name="_Toc142338339"></a><a name="_Toc187351011"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Use of Proceeds</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower has used the proceeds of each Advance in accordance with </font><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;2.04(e)</u><font style="font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Disbursement of Proceeds</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">) and the other terms and conditions of all applicable Financing Documents.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.36</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338340"></a><a name="_Toc187351012"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Immunity</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. No Borrower Entity nor any of its assets is entitled to immunity in any jurisdiction in which judicial proceedings may at any time be commenced with respect to this Agreement or any other Transaction Document.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.37</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131017675"></a><a name="_Toc142338341"></a><a name="_Toc187351013"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Fraudulent Intent</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. Neither the execution and delivery of this Agreement or any of the other Transaction Documents nor the performance of any actions required hereunder or thereunder is being undertaken by the Borrower with or as a result of any actual intent by the Borrower to hinder, delay or defraud any entity to which the Borrower is now or will hereafter become indebted.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.38</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338342"></a><a name="_Toc187351014"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Disclosure</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The statements and information contained in the Financing Documents, taken together with all documents, reports or other written information pertaining to the Project that have been furnished by or on behalf of the Borrower or any other Borrower Entity to DOE or any Secured Party Advisor from time to time, are true and correct in all material respects and do not contain any material misstatement of fact or omit to state a material fact or any fact necessary to make the statements contained therein not materially misleading at the time they were made.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>There are no facts, documents or agreements that have not been disclosed to DOE in writing that could reasonably be expected to be material to DOE&#39;s decision to enter into this Agreement or the transactions contemplated hereby or authorize any Advance or that could otherwise
