reasonably be expected to materially and adversely alter or affect the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.39</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338343"></a><a name="_Toc187351015"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Insurance</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. From and after the Execution Date, all Required Insurance is in full force and effect. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.40</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref130502537"></a><a name="_Ref130502557"></a><a name="_Ref130502608"></a><a name="_Toc142338344"></a><a name="_Toc187351016"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Information Technology; Cyber Security</b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> </b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref149557419"></a><a name="_Ref130502589"></a>The information technology (including data communications systems, equipment and devices) used in the business of the Borrower (&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">IT Systems</b>&quot;) operates and performs in all material respects as necessary: (i) for the development, design, engineering, procurement, construction, starting up, commissioning, ownership, operation or maintenance of the Project; (ii) to complete the activities </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">70</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">designated to be completed to achieve Project Completion; or (iii) to exercise the Borrower&#39;s rights and perform its obligations under the Major Project Documents, as applicable at the relevant time. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower has implemented and maintains, and has caused each other Borrower Entity (as applicable) and Major Project Participant (as applicable) to implement and maintain in connection with the Project, commercially reasonable privacy, information security, cyber security, disaster recovery, business continuity, data backup and incident response plans, policies and procedures consistent with industry standards (including administrative, technical and physical safeguards) designed to protect: (i) Sensitive Information from any unauthorized, accidental, or unlawful Processing or loss; (ii) each IT System from any unauthorized or unlawful access, acquisition, use, control, disruption, destruction, or modification; and (iii) the integrity, security and availability of the Sensitive Information and IT Systems.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>In the past five (5) years, neither the Borrower, nor to the Borrower&#39;s Knowledge, any Person that Processes Sensitive Information on behalf of the Borrower, has suffered any data breaches or other incidents that have resulted in: (i) any unauthorized Processing of any Sensitive Information; or (ii)&#160;any unauthorized access to or acquisition, use, control or disruption of or any corruption of any of the IT Systems owned or controlled by Borrower in any material respect. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower is and, during the past five (5) years has been, in material compliance with: (i) all applicable Data Protection Laws; and (ii) all contractual obligations, and all privacy notices and policies, binding on the Borrower related to the Processing of Personal Information.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>In the past five (5) years, the Borrower has not received: (i) any written claims related to any unauthorized Processing (including any ransomware incident), or any loss, theft, corruption, or other misuse of any Personal Information Processed by the Borrower; or (ii) any written notice (including by any Governmental Authority) of any claims, investigations, or alleged violations relating to any Personal Information Processed by the Borrower.<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;background:#00ff00;"> </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:8pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.41</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351017"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">CFIUS</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font> <font style="font-weight:normal;">No approval from, or notice to, the Committee on Foreign Investment (&#8220;CFIUS&#8221;) in the United States is required with respect to the Project.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.42</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc175842208"></a><a name="_Toc175842470"></a><a name="_Toc175842728"></a><a name="_Toc175842209"></a><a name="_Toc175842471"></a><a name="_Toc175842729"></a><a name="_Toc142338321"></a><a name="_Toc187351018"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Certain Events</b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> </b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>No Default, Event of Default, Event of Force Majeure or Event of Loss has occurred and is continuing or is reasonably expected to occur.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>No material breach or default has occurred and is continuing under any Major Project Document.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 6.43</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338323"></a><a name="_Toc187351019"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Material Adverse Effect</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. No event (including any legal, arbitral or other dispute review proceeding or any change in law) has occurred and is continuing that has or could reasonably be expected to have or result in a Material Adverse Effect.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';white-space:nowrap;">Article VII</font><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:0.25pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin:12pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;"><a name="_Toc187351020"></a><b style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-weight:bold;">Affirmative covenants</b></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">The Borrower hereby agrees that, until the Release Date:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.01</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref127828008"></a><a name="_Ref140248820"></a><a name="_Ref140248823"></a><a name="_Toc142338346"></a><a name="_Toc187351021"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Maintenance of Existence; Property; Etc</b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">.</b><font style="font-weight:normal;white-space:pre-wrap;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The Borrower shall preserve and maintain (i) its legal existence; and (ii) all of its licenses, rights, privileges and franchises material to the conduct of its business and the Project.</font></div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">71</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall keep (or cause to be kept) all its Properties and IT Systems in good working order and condition to the extent necessary to ensure that its business can be conducted properly, continuously and in compliance with all Applicable Laws, Required Approvals and its Organizational Documents at all times.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>Except as otherwise permitted hereunder, the Borrower shall preserve and maintain good and marketable title to or leasehold interest in or rights to the Collateral and such rights to use the Project Site as are necessary to construct, operate and maintain the Project in accordance with the requirements of the Transaction Documents and the Project Milestone Schedule, and shall, at its own expense, take all actions to ensure that it has sufficient rights to the Project Site as are necessary for the development, construction and operation of the Project as contemplated by the Transaction Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.02</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref127828032"></a><a name="_Toc142338347"></a><a name="_Toc187351022"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Intellectual Property</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Maintenance of Project IP</u>. The Borrower shall at all times: (i) acquire and maintain ownership of all Project IP then required; or (ii) obtain and maintain its licenses or rights to use all Intellectual Property owned by any other Person necessary: (A) for Project Completion; and (B) to exercise its rights and perform its obligations under the Major Project Documents, in each case, as applicable at the relevant time. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref130496882"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Protection of Project IP</u>. The Borrower shall take all commercially reasonable steps to: (i)&#160;protect, enforce, preserve and maintain its rights, title or interests in and to the Project IP, including maintaining and pursuing any application, registration or issuance for Project IP owned by the Borrower, which the Borrower, in its reasonable business judgment, believes should be maintained and pursued; (ii) protect the secrecy and confidentiality of all the Borrower&#8217;s Trade Secrets included in the Project IP, or with respect to which the Borrower, has any confidentiality obligation; and (iii) comply in all material respects with the terms and conditions of the Project IP Agreements. &#160;If (A)&#160;any Project IP owned by the Borrower or licensed under any Project IP Agreement to the Borrower becomes, as applicable (I)&#160;abandoned, lapsed, dedicated to the public or placed in the public domain, (II)&#160;invalid or unenforceable, or (III) subject to any adverse action or proceeding before any intellectual property office or registrar; and (B) the foregoing, individually or in the aggregate, could reasonably be expected to result in a Material Adverse Effect, then, after the Borrower obtains Knowledge thereof, the Borrower shall notify DOE thereof in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.03(g)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Notices</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Continued Security Interest in Project IP</u>. The Borrower shall, promptly upon the reasonable request of DOE, execute (or procure the execution of) and deliver to DOE any document and take all actions necessary to acknowledge, confirm, register, record or perfect DOE&#39;s security interest in any part of the Project IP (including the filing of the IP Security Agreement with the United States Patent and Trademark Office, the United States Copyright Office, or the corresponding entities in any applicable jurisdiction), whether such interest is now owned or hereafter acquired (whether by application, registration, purchase or otherwise). </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Protection Against Infringement</u>. In the event that the Borrower has Knowledge of any breach or violation of any of the terms or conditions of any Project IP Agreement or that any material Project IP owned by any Borrower Entity is infringed, misappropriated or otherwise violated by any Person, the Borrower shall (i) take actions or inactions that are, in the Borrower&#39;s reasonable judgment, appropriate under the circumstances (taking into account Applicable Law with respect to such infringement, misappropriation or other violation), and protect its rights in such Project IP, and (ii) after the Borrower obtains Knowledge of such infringement, misappropriation or other violation, notify DOE in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.03(g)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Notices</i>).</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">72</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Notice of Borrower&#39;s Alleged Infringement</u>. In the event that the Borrower has Knowledge of any Adverse Proceeding alleging that the Borrower, its respective businesses, or the development, design, engineering, procurement, construction, starting up, commissioning, ownership, operation, use or maintenance of the Project, is infringing, misappropriating or otherwise violating any Intellectual Property of any Person, the Borrower shall (i) take such actions that are, in the Borrower&#39;s reasonable business judgment, appropriate under the circumstances to avoid or avert a Material Adverse Effect; and (ii)&#160;after the Borrower obtains Knowledge thereof, report such notice or communication relating thereto to DOE in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160; </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.03(g)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Notices</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><a name="_Ref130495006"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">License Grant</u>. The Borrower hereby grants, and shall cause each applicable Borrower Entity and each licensor of Project IP under a Project IP Agreement to grant or otherwise permit to grant, to the Secured Parties a Secured Parties&#8217; License.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font><a name="_Ref130494950"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Source Code Escrow</u>. With respect to any and all Project Source Code, the Borrower shall, and shall cause each applicable Borrower Entity to, at a Borrower Entity&#8217;s cost and expense:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref140244258"></a><a name="_Ref128588506"></a>no later than six (6) months after the Execution Date, and thereafter, upon execution of any Project IP Agreement containing Source Code enter into a Source Code escrow agreement for the benefit of the Secured Parties with an escrow agent approved by DOE containing: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>terms and conditions (including release conditions, such conditions to include an unwillingness or inability to support or maintain the Software) that are usual and customary for Source Code escrow arrangements satisfactory to DOE; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font><a name="_Hlk144150051"></a><a name="_Ref141122484"></a>the grant to the Secured Parties by the Borrower Entity or the third party that licenses Source Code to the Borrower, as applicable (effective as of such date, or if acquired later, upon such acquisition date, but enforceable following the occurrence of any release condition specified in the Source Code escrow agreement) of an irrevocable, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, sublicensable, fully paid-up and royalty-free right and license to Practice, compile and execute any and all Source Code and other materials placed into escrow pursuant to <a name="_Hlk154045440"></a>clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(ii)</u> below, solely for purposes of developing, designing, engineering, procuring, constructing, starting up, commissioning, operating and maintaining the Project and achieving Project Completion, as applicable; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><a name="_Ref140244283"></a><a name="_Ref128588522"></a>promptly deposit in escrow (A)&#160;a complete, reproducible copy of all Project Source Code that is relevant to Project Completion; and (B)&#160;all revisions, modifications and enhancements to such Project Source Code (including updates, upgrades and corrections thereto, and derivative works thereof) as such revisions, modifications or enhancements are used in or otherwise made available to the Project, in each case, together with all such documentation or materials as are reasonably required to exercise the rights granted in <a name="_Hlk154045548"></a>clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(g)(i)(B)</u> above.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font><a name="_Ref130495040"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project IP Agreement Terms</u>. &#160;The Borrower shall ensure that each license agreement that constitutes a Project IP Agreement grants to the Borrower: (i) a direct, and transferable or sublicensable license; or (ii) an irrevocable, perpetual, and transferable or sublicensable sublicense, to Project IP which is owned by any other Borrower Entity or which is either critical to (or otherwise inextricably embedded in) the Project or not readily replaceable; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that with respect to Borrower Entity-owned Project IP, each license and sublicense is fully paid-up and royalty-free for the Borrower.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.03</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref235357518"></a><a name="_Toc142338348"></a><a name="_Toc187351023"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Insurance</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall obtain, maintain and comply with (or cause to be obtained, maintained and complied with) the Required Insurance at all times and in all respects, and shall keep its </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">73</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">present and future properties insured as required by, and in accordance with the requirements of <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 7.03</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Required</i> <i style="font-style:italic;">Insurance</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall pursue any contractual remedies to cause other Persons required to provide Required Insurance, including any Major Project Participant, to obtain and maintain such Required Insurance and as otherwise required in the respective Major Project Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.04</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref98492561"></a><a name="_Toc142338349"></a><a name="_Toc187351024"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Event of Loss</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref127935117"></a>If any Event of Loss shall occur, the Borrower shall promptly deliver notice thereof to DOE and:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>diligently pursue all of its rights to compensation against all relevant insurers, reinsurers and Governmental Authorities, as applicable, in respect of such event; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>compromise or settle any claim with respect to any Event of Loss involving an amount in excess of [***] (such Event of Loss, a &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Threshold Event of Loss</b>&quot;) per claim only upon prior written consent of DOE; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>pay or apply the Net Amount of all Loss Proceeds stemming from such event in accordance with this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Event of Loss</i>) including, to the extent required in this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Event of Loss</i>), for prepayments in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 3.05(c)(i)(C)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Mandatory Prepayments</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>Upon the occurrence of any Event of Loss, Loss Proceeds shall be promptly deposited into, or credited to the Loss Proceeds Account. &#160;The Borrower shall, in advance, direct the relevant insurers, reinsurers and Governmental Authorities, as applicable, to pay Loss Proceeds directly to the Collateral Agent as loss payee for deposit to the Loss Proceeds Account (and subject to the use of such proceeds by the Borrower in accordance with this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section &#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Event of Loss</i>)). &#160;If Loss Proceeds are paid to the Borrower, such Loss Proceeds shall be received in trust, for the benefit of the Collateral Agent, shall be segregated from other funds of the Borrower, and shall be forthwith paid over to the Collateral Agent in the same form as received (with any necessary endorsement) for deposit to the Loss Proceeds Account.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>Upon the occurrence of any Event of Loss, the Borrower shall promptly repair or remediate such loss and cause Loss Proceeds associated with the loss to be applied to the payment of the costs of repair or restoration of the portion of the Project lost or damaged if and to the extent required in clauses (d), (e) or (f), as applicable of this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Event of Loss</i>) or, upon DOE&#8217;s prior written consent, reimburse the Borrower or Sponsor, as applicable, for any cost of repairs or remediation prior to the receipt of such Loss Proceeds paid using Equity Contributions; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided,</i> that, in each case, DOE shall have (i) received from the Borrower a summary of the relevant Event of Loss, the basis for the Borrower&#39;s decision to repair or remediate and a remediation plan; and (ii) approved such remediation plan.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>With respect to the Net Amount of any Loss Proceeds not from a Threshold Event of Loss, the Borrower shall apply such amounts within ninety (90) days toward the repair or replacement of the affected assets except to the extent that the failure to use all or a portion of such proceeds toward repair or replacement would not reasonably be expected to (i) reduce the annualized production capacity of the Project; (ii) reduce net revenues from the sale of the Products; or (iii)&#160;to increase the operating costs with respect to the Project, such amounts may be transferred to the Revenue Account on the next Payment Date for application in accordance with the Accounts Agreement, and DOE has received evidence, in form and substance satisfactory to it, of the foregoing. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>With respect to the Net Amount of any Loss Proceeds from a Threshold Event of Loss, the Borrower shall undertake the relevant repairs and restoration, and apply the amounts from Loss Proceeds Account (or, upon DOE&#8217;s prior written consent, reimburse the Borrower or the Sponsor, as </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">74</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">applicable for any cost of repairs or remediation prior to the receipt of such loss Proceeds paid using Equity Contributions)<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font>to pay the costs of the relevant repairs and restoration if, and only if, DOE determines, after consultation with the Independent Engineer, that:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>repair or replacement of the relevant portion of the Project is technically and economically feasible; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>the Borrower is in compliance with such other conditions and requirements as DOE shall consider appropriate in the circumstances.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><a name="_Ref127936367"></a>In respect of any Event of Loss that (i) does not constitute a Threshold Event of Loss; or (ii) constitutes a Threshold Event of Loss for which DOE has consented to the repair and restoration in accordance with clause (e) above, the Borrower shall, on the tenth (10th) Business Day of each month until such restoration and repair has been completed and the contractors performing such restoration or repair work have been paid in full, deliver to the Collateral Agent and DOE the following:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>a detailed summary of the work performed in connection with any such restoration or repair during the preceding month and the itemized expenses that are then due and payable, together with copies of all invoices, conditional (upon payment only) lien waivers from the contractors performing such restoration or repair work and other information and documents reasonably requested by DOE with respect to such restoration or repair work; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>proposed Funds Withdrawal/Transfer Certificate directing the Collateral Agent to disburse to the contractors performing such restoration or repair work amounts constituting Loss Proceeds on deposit in the Loss Proceeds Account in the respective amounts then due and payable to such contractors.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>Upon the completion of any such restoration and repair work (as validated in writing by the Independent Engineer), or if restoration and repair work is not undertaken pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Event of Loss</i>), and to the extent that the Borrower has not delivered a Prepayment Election Notice in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.05(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Mandatory Prepayments</i>), DOE shall be entitled to instruct the Collateral Agent to apply any amounts constituting Loss Proceeds on deposit in the Loss Proceeds Account to the prepayment of the Advances on the second (2nd) Business Day following receipt of such instructions, in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">3.05(c)</u> <i style="font-style:italic;">(</i><i style="font-style:italic;">Mandatory Prepayments</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.05</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref130769101"></a><a name="_Toc142338350"></a><a name="_Toc187351025"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Further Assurances; Creation and Perfection of Security Interests</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall execute and deliver, from time to time, as reasonably requested by DOE or the Collateral Agent at the Borrower&#39;s expense, such other documents as shall be necessary or advisable or that DOE and the Collateral Agent may reasonably request in connection with the rights and remedies of DOE and the Collateral Agent granted or provided for by the Transaction Documents and to consummate the transactions contemplated therein.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall, at its own expense, take all actions that have been or shall be requested by DOE, the Collateral Agent or that the Borrower knows are necessary to establish, maintain, protect, perfect and continue the perfection of the First Priority (subject to Permitted Liens) security interests of the Secured Parties created by the Security Documents in all assets relating in any manner to the Project and shall furnish timely notice of the necessity of any such action, together with such instruments, in execution form, and such other information as may be required or reasonably requested to enable any appropriate Secured Party to effect any such action.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.06</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123266419"></a><a name="_Toc142338351"></a><a name="_Toc187351026"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Diligent Construction of Project; Approved Construction Changes</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">75</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall cause: &#160;the Project Completion Date to occur on or prior to the Project Completion Longstop Date within the Construction Budget. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall construct and complete, or cause to be constructed and completed, the Project diligently in accordance with the Major Project Documents and the other Transaction Documents, all Required Approvals, the Project Milestone Schedule, Environmental Laws and the Construction Budget. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall cause all Approved Construction Changes to be described in the applicable Construction Progress Report and, where applicable, reflected in revised versions of the Project Milestone Schedule, and the Construction Budget, as applicable, and delivered to DOE in accordance with the terms hereof. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.07</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142653425"></a><a name="_Ref123226226"></a><a name="_Toc142338352"></a><a name="_Toc187351027"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Contractual Remedies</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall diligently pursue all contractual remedies available to it to cause each Major Project Participant to&#160;comply with and conduct its property, business and operations in compliance with all Applicable Laws that are applicable to the activities that such Person carries out under the Project; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall, and shall cause each Major Project Participant to,&#160;procure, maintain and comply in all material respects with all Required Approvals that are required for such Person to perform its obligations under the Project Documents to which it is a party. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.08</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648670"></a><a name="_Ref142648952"></a><a name="_Toc142338353"></a><a name="_Toc187351028"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Taxes, Duties, Expenses and Liabilities</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall pay or cause to be paid on or before the date payment is due: (i) all Taxes (including stamp taxes), Secured Party Expenses, or other fees payable on or in connection with the execution, issue, delivery, registration, or notarization, or for the legality, validity, or enforceability, of the Transaction Documents (other than those Taxes that it is contesting in accordance with the Permitted Contest Conditions and Taxes imposed with respect to an assignment by FFB); <i style="font-style:italic;">provided, </i>that, the Borrower shall promptly pay or cause to be paid any valid, final judgment rendered upon the conclusion of any relevant Adverse Proceeding enforcing any Tax and cause it to be satisfied of record; and (ii)&#160;all claims, levies or liabilities (including claims for labor, services, materials and supplies) for sums that have become due and payable and that have or, if unpaid, could reasonably be expected to become a Lien (other than a Permitted Lien) upon the property of the Borrower (or any part thereof).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall file all tax returns required by Applicable Laws to be filed by it and shall pay or cause to be paid on or before the date payment is due (i)&#160;all income Taxes required to be paid by it; and (ii) all other material Taxes and assessments required to be paid by it (other than those Taxes that it contests in accordance with the Permitted Contest Conditions).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall comply with all requirements related to the receipt of tax credits or other related incentive based program related to taxes, if any, and shall procure that no tax credit recapture event or similar event occurs.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower acknowledges and agrees that DOE&#8217;s execution and delivery of this Agreement, including the determination by DOE as to whether Project Costs are Eligible Project Costs, (i) does not prejudice or otherwise have any binding effect with regard to any determination by the Internal Revenue Service, the U.S. Department of the Treasury, or a court of law as to the tax basis of the Project or any part thereof under the Code and (ii) does not constitute a determination regarding, and is unrelated to whether such Person or the Project has complied or will comply with, Federal tax law. &#160;The Borrower </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">76</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">acknowledges and agrees that such Person shall not use DOE&#8217;s execution and delivery of this Agreement, or documents generated by DOE during its consideration of the Application, to demonstrate or prove it complied with the requirements to claim a tax credit or other amount under the Internal Revenue Code in an administrative or judicial proceeding.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.09</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123226239"></a><a name="_Toc142338354"></a><a name="_Toc187351029"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Performance of Obligations</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall perform and observe all of its covenants and obligations contained in any Financing Document, any Required Approval or any Project Document (except with respect to any Project Document that is not a Major Project Document, to the extent that the failure to do so could not reasonably be expected to have Material Adverse Effect).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall take all reasonable and necessary action to prevent the termination, suspension or cancellation of any Financing Document, any Required Approval or any Project Document (except with respect to any Project Document that is not a Major Project Document, to the extent that the failure to do so could not reasonably be expected to have Material Adverse Effect), except for (i) the expiration of any Financing Document, any Required Approval or any Project Document in accordance with its terms and not as a result of a breach or default thereunder by the Borrower; and (ii) the termination or cancellation of any Project Document that the Borrower replaces as permitted herein.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall enforce against the relevant Project Participant in accordance with Prudent Industry Practices and in accordance with its terms each material covenant or obligation under each Project Document to which such Project Participant is a party (except with respect to any Project Document that is not a Major Project Document, to the extent that the failure to do so could not reasonably be expected to have Material Adverse Effect).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.10</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648037"></a><a name="_Ref142648040"></a><a name="_Toc142338356"></a><a name="_Toc187351030"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Use of Proceeds</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall use the proceeds of each Advance in accordance with </font><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;2.04(e)</u><font style="font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i contravention of any Applicable Law, Transaction Document or Governmental Approval. &#160;Neither DOE nor FFB shall have any responsibility as to the use of any proceeds of any Advance.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.11</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref100676734"></a><a name="_Toc142338357"></a><a name="_Toc187351031"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Books, Records and Inspections</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New in accordance with the Designated Standard and all Applicable Laws are made in respect of all dealing and transactions relating to the business and activities of the Borrower; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>maintain adequate internal controls, reporting systems, IT Systems and cost control systems that are designed to ensure that the Borrower satisfies its obligations under the Financing Documents and:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New financial reporting;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>for maintaining such records as are necessary to facilitate an effective and accurate audit and performance evaluation of the Project as required by the Program Requirements; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(E)</font>for compliance with securities, corporate and other Applicable Law <font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font>regarding adoption of a code of ethics and auditor independence; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>record, store, maintain, and operate its records, systems, controls, data and information using means (including any electronic, mechanical or photographic process, whether computerized or not) that are under its exclusive ownership and direct control (including all means of access thereto and therefrom).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>consult and cooperate with Secured Parties and the Secured Party Advisor&#8217;s regarding the Project upon DOE&#39;s request;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>permit officers and designated representatives of Secured Parties, any agent of any of the foregoing, and the Secured Party Advisors to visit and inspect the Project and any other facilities and properties of the Borrower;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>provide to officers and designated representatives of Secured Parties, any agent of any of the foregoing, the Comptroller General and the Secured Party Advisors (A) access to any pertinent books, documents, papers and records of the Borrower for the purpose of audit, examination, inspection and monitoring upon reasonable notice and at reasonable times during normal business hours, to examine and discuss the affairs, finances and accounts of the Borrower with the representatives of the Borrower, and (B) such access rights as required by the Program Requirements, including access to the Project Site and ancillary facilities (and allowing the officers and designated representatives of the Secured Parties and the Comptroller General to discuss the Borrower&#39;s and its subsidiaries&#39; affairs, finances and accounts with the Borrower&#39;s officers) for the purpose of monitoring the performance of the Project; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>afford proper facilities for such inspections, and make copies (at the Borrower&#39;s expense) of any records that are subject to such inspection; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>subject to the Borrower&#39;s protection of confidential information and Trade Secrets described in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.02(b)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Protection of Project IP</i>), make available all information related to the Project, including all patents, technology and proprietary rights owned or controlled by, or licensed to, the Borrower and utilized in the development, design, engineering, procurement, construction, starting-up, commissioning, operation or maintenance of the Project, as may be reasonably necessary in order to determine the technical progress, soundness of financial condition, management stability, compliance with Environmental Law, adequacy of health and safety conditions and all other matters with respect to the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>authorize the Borrower&#39;s Accountant to communicate directly with DOE, FFB and the Comptroller General at any time regarding any Agreed-Upon Procedures Report and the Borrower&#39;s accounts and operations relating thereto; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that at any time prior to a Default, a representative of the Borrower shall be provided reasonable opportunity to participate in such communication and shall be a copy to any formal written communication; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>in the event that the Borrower&#39;s Accountant should cease to be the accountants of the Borrower for any reason, promptly, but in any event no later than five (5) Business Days </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">78</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">after the occurrence thereof, notify DOE of such change in the Borrower&#39;s Accountant and the reason therefor, and the Borrower shall appoint and maintain another firm of independent public accountants that satisfy the conditions set forth herein to qualify as the Borrower&#39;s Accountant.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower shall disclose in writing to its outside auditors and audit committee and shall promptly, but in any event no later than five (5) Business Days, provide copies thereof to DOE of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>any significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial reporting that are reasonably likely to adversely affect its ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in its internal controls over financial reporting.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>The Borrower shall promptly provide copies to DOE of any management letter or other material communication sent by the Borrower&#39;s Accountant (or any other accountants retained by the Borrower) to the Borrower in relation to the Borrower&#39;s financial, accounting, management information or other systems, policies, management or accounts.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>The Borrower shall retain all records relating to expenditures incurred with respect to the Project with respect to which Advances were made until the latter of (i) the date that is five (5) years after the Advance was made with respect to such expenditure and (ii) the Project Completion Date.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.12</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648690"></a><a name="_Ref142649056"></a><a name="_Toc142338358"></a><a name="_Toc187351032"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compliance with Applicable Law</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall comply with, and conduct its business, operations, assets, equipment, property, leaseholds, and other facilities in compliance with all Environmental Laws and all other Applicable Laws.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall comply with all applicable requirements of all Anti-Money Laundering Law, and maintain proper operating and credit policies and procedures (including &quot;know your customer&quot; and anti-money laundering policies) to ensure, <i style="font-style:italic;">inter alia</i>, proper credit, risk and conflicts of interest management in connection therewith.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref143915430"></a>The Borrower shall procure all Required Approvals at or prior to such time as they are required or necessary, maintain such Required Approvals, and comply in all material respects with all Required Approvals.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower shall ensure that the Project is operated in compliance with the
