Mitigation Action Plan, in material compliance with all applicable Environmental Laws &#160;and in a manner that would not pose a hazard to public health or safety (including worker safety) or to the environment.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>The Borrower shall take all necessary actions to ensure that it is in compliance with CFIUS at all times.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.13</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123226254"></a><a name="_Toc142338359"></a><a name="_Toc187351033"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compliance with Program Requirements</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall comply with all Program Requirements in connection with the Project.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.14</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123226279"></a><a name="_Toc142338360"></a><a name="_Toc187351034"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Accounts; Cash Deposits</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall maintain, or cause to be maintained, in full force and effect each of the Project Accounts and amounts on deposit therein in accordance with the terms of the Accounts Agreement and relevant Financing Documents. &#160;</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">79</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall instruct each Person remitting cash to or for the account of the Borrower to deposit such cash in accordance with the terms of the Accounts Agreement. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall remit any amounts received by it or received by third parties on its behalf to the Collateral Agent for deposit in accordance with the terms of the Accounts Agreement and any applicable Direct Agreement.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.15</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123265980"></a><a name="_Ref140248099"></a><a name="_Ref140248105"></a><a name="_Ref140248431"></a><a name="_Ref140248435"></a><a name="_Ref140248683"></a><a name="OfftakeAgreements"></a><a name="_Toc142338361"></a><a name="_Toc187351035"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Offtake </b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Contracts</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The Borrower shall enter into additional Offtake Contracts only with DOE&#8217;s prior written consent; and </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall enforce against the relevant Project Participant, in accordance with Prudent Industry Practices and in accordance with its terms each material covenant or obligation under each Project Document to which such Project Participant is a party (except with respect to any Project Document that is not a Major Project Document, to the extent that the failure to do so could not reasonably be expected to have Material Adverse Effect).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall maintain 70% of the then current production of the Project under Offtake Contracts each with a term of at least three (3) years and provisions, on the whole, at least as &#160;beneficial to the Borrower as Offtake Contracts in effect on the Execution Date and, in each case, in form and substance acceptable to DOE.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.16</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351036"></a><a name="_Hlk154546404"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Feedstock Supply Plan</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. &#160;The Borrower shall enter into and maintain Feedstock Supply Contracts for the supply of raw materials in accordance with Prudent Industry Practice or otherwise with DOE&#39;s prior written consent. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.17</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref100211423"></a><a name="_Toc142338363"></a><a name="_Toc187351037"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Davis-Bacon Act</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall comply (and shall ensure that each DBA Contract Party complies) with the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall maintain an Electronic Certified Payroll System accessible to DOE and the Borrower shall systematically review the certified weekly payroll records that the Borrower maintains for its own laborers and mechanics and those that it receives for the laborers and mechanics of any Borrower Entity and DBA Contract Party. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall designate and identify to DOE a point of contact who will be responsible for ensuring compliance with the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements. This person will provide to DOE any information reasonably requested in support of DOE&#8217;s Davis-Bacon Act compliance monitoring efforts. The Borrower shall notify DOE in writing regarding a change to this contact person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>The Borrower shall promptly notify DOE in writing when it receives any complaint related to non-compliance with the Davis-Bacon Act, or discovers in the course of its systematic review of the certified payroll records an incident that the Borrower reasonably believes to be a case of such non-compliance and which, in each case, the Borrower cannot resolve on its own, and shall forward to DOE (i)&#160;the complaint or a written summary of the non-compliant incident; (ii) a summary of the Borrower&#8217;s investigation into such complaint or such incident; and (iii) the relevant certified payroll records. &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>Certified payroll records maintained by the Borrower shall be preserved for three (3) years after completion of work. &#160;The Borrower shall make such records available to DOE and DOL when necessary, and upon request, for purposes of an investigation or audit of compliance with prevailing wage requirements. &#160;Certified payroll records maintained by the Borrower shall be considered federal government </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">80</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">records for the purposes of the Freedom of Information Act, 5 U.S.C. &#167; 552. &#160;The Borrower shall provide such records to DOE within five (5) Business Days of receipt of any request for such records from DOE.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>The Borrower shall use commercially reasonable efforts to cause each DBA Compliance Matter Contractor to cure each applicable DBA Compliance Matter. Such efforts may be suspended while a DBA Compliance Matter Contractor is, in good faith, appealing a DOL determination of non-compliance..</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>Within ten (10) Business Days after the end of each month prior to the resolution of any DBA Compliance Matter that has been fully cured to the satisfaction of DOL or otherwise finally resolved favorably to the Borrower or DBA Contract Party, the Borrower shall either:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>notify DOE of the specific details of each DBA Compliance Matter that has not been so cured or finally resolved, and describe the commercially reasonable efforts that it and the applicable DBA Compliance Matter Contractor have taken to cause the DBA Compliance Matter Contractor to comply with the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements that are the subject of such dispute, or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>notify DOE that the applicable DBA Compliance Matter Contractor has appealed, and is diligently prosecuting such appeal in good faith, DOL&#8217;s determination that the DBA Compliance Matter Contractor has failed to comply with the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements giving rise to such DBA Compliance Matter. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.18</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648220"></a><a name="_Ref142648293"></a><a name="_Toc142338364"></a><a name="_Toc187351038"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Lobbying Restriction</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall, and shall cause each other Borrower Entity to, comply with all requirements of 31 U.S.C. &#167; 1352, as amended, including the requirement that no proceeds of any Advance be expended by the Borrower or any of its Affiliates to pay any Person for influencing or attempting to influence an officer or employee of any federal agency, a member of the U.S. Congress, an officer or employee of the U.S. Congress, or an employee of a member of Congress in connection with the making of the Guaranteed Loan or any other action described in 31 U.S.C. &#167; 1352(a)(2).</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.19</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref131068252"></a><a name="_Toc142338365"></a><a name="_Toc187351039"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Cargo Preference Act</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall comply with the Cargo Preference Act of 1954, as amended, and all related implementing regulations with respect to the Project, unless it has entered into an agreement with the United States Maritime Administration with respect to such compliance, in which case it shall comply with such agreement.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, and unless the Borrower has entered into an agreement with the United States Maritime Administration excusing them from the following obligations, the Borrower shall deliver to DOE:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>no later than on each Quarterly Reporting Date, evidence that either (A) at least fifty percent (50%) of CPA Goods will be transported from each port of loading to the applicable port of unloading on privately owned U.S.-flag commercial vessels; or (B) privately owned U.S.-flag commercial vessels are not available to transport such amount of CPA Goods; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>promptly after delivery of any CPA Goods to the applicable carrier, but not later than the earlier of (A) the date of delivery thereof to the United States Maritime Administration; and (B) (1) in the case of shipments originating outside of the United States, thirty (30) working days (as such term is used in 46 C.F.R. 381.7) or (2) in the case of shipments originating within the United States, twenty (20) days, in each case, following the date of loading any CPA Goods, a legible copy of a rated, &#8216;on-board&#8217; commercial ocean bill-of-lading in English for each shipment of CPA Goods.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">81</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.20</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648704"></a><a name="_Ref142648998"></a><a name="_Toc142338366"></a><a name="_Toc187351040"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">SAM Registration</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall maintain its SAM database registration at all times.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.21</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338367"></a><a name="_Toc187351041"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">ERISA</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. &#160;</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall, and the Borrower shall cause its ERISA Affiliates to, maintain all Employee Benefit Plans that are presently in existence or may, from time to time, come into existence, in compliance with terms of any such Employee Benefit Plan, ERISA, the Code and all other Applicable Laws; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall, and the Borrower shall cause its ERISA Affiliates to, make or cause to be made contributions to all Employee Benefit Plans in a timely manner and, with respect to Pension Plans and Multiemployer Plans, in a sufficient amount to comply with the requirements of Sections 302 and 303 of ERISA and Sections 412 and 430 of the Code.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.22</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142647657"></a><a name="_Ref142647673"></a><a name="_Ref142648321"></a><a name="_Toc187351042"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Financial Covenants</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall, as of each Calculation Date, (a) commencing on the Calculation Date immediately following Commercial Operations Date, maintain a Historical Debt Service Coverage Ratio of no less than 1.10:1.00, (b) commencing on the Calculation Date immediately following Commercial Operations Date, maintain a Projected Debt Service Coverage Ratio (for each applicable calculation period occurring quarterly up to (and including) the Payment Date) of no less than 1.10:1.00, which, in each case, shall be calculated based on the Financial Statements that have been, or are required to have been, delivered by the Borrower pursuant to </font><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01</u><font style="font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Financial Statements</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">). </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.23</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648329"></a><a name="_Ref142648336"></a><a name="_Toc142338369"></a><a name="_Toc187351043"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Public Announcements</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall coordinate with DOE with respect to:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>any public announcements by any Borrower Entity in connection with the Guaranteed Loan or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement or any other Financing Document;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>any subsequent public announcements by the Borrower in connection with material developments in respect of the Project; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>the public announcement of satisfaction of any Project Milestones, </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.24</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648453"></a><a name="_Ref142648456"></a><a name="_Toc142338370"></a><a name="_Toc187351044"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Bankruptcy Remoteness</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall ensure that it remains a bankruptcy-remote, single-purpose entity at all times and shall do all things necessary to maintain its corporate existence separate and apart from any other Borrower Entity.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.25</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref142648496"></a><a name="_Ref142648500"></a><a name="_Toc142338371"></a><a name="_Toc187351045"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Prohibited Persons</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>If any Principal Person of the Borrower becomes (whether through a transfer or otherwise) a Prohibited Person, the Borrower shall remove or replace such Principal Person with a person or entity reasonably acceptable to DOE within thirty (30) days from the date that the Borrower knew or should have known that such Principal Person became a Prohibited Person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>If any Borrower Entity (other than the Borrower) or any Major Project Participant or any of their respective Principal Persons becomes (whether through a transfer or otherwise) a Prohibited Person, within thirty (30) days of obtaining actual knowledge that such Person has become a Prohibited Person, the Borrower shall engage and continue to engage in good faith discussions with DOE regarding the removal or replacement of such Person or, if such removal or replacement is not reasonably feasible, the implementation of other mitigation measures.<i style="color:#1f4e79;font-style:italic;"> </i></div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">82</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The internal management and accounting practices and controls of each Borrower Entity shall at all times be adequate to ensure that each Borrower Entity and each Principal Person thereof (i) does not become a Prohibited Person; and (ii) complies with all applicable International Compliance Directives.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.26</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref140247229"></a><a name="_Toc142338372"></a><a name="_Toc187351046"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">International Compliance Directives</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall comply with all International Compliance Directives.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref106913658"></a>If any Principal Person of the Borrower fails to comply with any International Compliance Directive, the Borrower shall remove or replace such Principal Person with a person or entity reasonably acceptable to DOE within thirty (30) days from the date that the Borrower knew or should have known of such violation; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>,<i style="font-style:italic;"> </i>that, in the case where a Principal Person fails to comply with any International Compliance Directive, such removal or replacement by the Borrower pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.26(b)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">International Compliance Directives</i>) shall occur only to the extent permitted by applicable Sanctions or otherwise authorized by OFAC.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>If any Borrower Entity (other than the Borrower) or any Major Project Participant or any of their respective Principal Persons fails to comply with any applicable International Compliance Directive, the Borrower shall, within thirty (30) days of obtaining actual knowledge that such Person has so failed to comply, engage and continue to engage in good faith discussions with DOE regarding the removal or replacement of such Person or, if such removal or replacement is not reasonably feasible, the implementation of other mitigation measures.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.27</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref100221394"></a><a name="_Toc142338373"></a><a name="_Toc187351047"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Operating Plan; Operations</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall cause the Project, or such portions of the Project that have begun commercial operations, to operate in all material respects pursuant to the Operating Plan then in effect. &#160;The Borrower shall conduct the operations of the Project in accordance, in all material respects, with the Financing Documents and the Major Project Documents, the Operating Plan, the Business Continuity Plan, the O&amp;M Budget, Applicable Law, any applicable Required Approvals, and Prudent Industry Practice.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall own, maintain, repair and replace (or cause to be owned, maintained, repaired and replaced) all equipment, spare parts, and inventory reasonably necessary for the operation and maintenance of the Project in all material respects in accordance with the Financing Documents and the Major Project Documents, the Operating Plan, the Business Continuity Plan, Applicable Law, any other applicable Required Approvals and Prudent Industry Practice.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall maintain, or cause to be maintained, at &#160;Project Site a complete set of plans and specifications for the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.28</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref100167050"></a><a name="_Toc142338374"></a><a name="_Toc187351048"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">O&amp;M Budget</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Submission and Approval of O&amp;M Budget</u></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref127936406"></a>No later than: <a name="iA"></a>(A) sixty (60) days prior to the achievement of the Commercial Operations Date; and (B) no later than sixty (60) days prior to the beginning of each Fiscal Year of the Borrower, the Borrower shall prepare and submit for approval to DOE, with a copy to the Independent Engineer, the proposed O&amp;M Budget for the succeeding Fiscal Year. &#160;Each such proposed O&amp;M Budget shall be consistent with the Base Case Financial Model being submitted concurrently to DOE for approval in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.02(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Annual Reports</i>) and shall be accompanied by a certification of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower that, to the best of such Responsible Officer&#39;s Knowledge, such proposed &#160;O&amp;M Budget is a reasonable estimate for the period covered thereby and is in </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">83</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">compliance with the requirements of this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.28</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">O&amp;M Budget</i>). &#160;DOE shall approve or reject in writing all or any portion of a proposed O&amp;M Budget. &#160;If DOE does not approve all or portions of an O&amp;M Budget, DOE shall advise the Borrower of the items that are rejected and the reason or reasons therefor. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>Each proposed O&amp;M Budget approved by DOE &#160;shall become effective on the later of (A)&#160;the first (1st) day of the relevant Fiscal Year; and (B)&#160;the date DOE advises the Borrower that DOE has approved such O&amp;M Budget.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>If any part of a proposed O&amp;M Budget is rejected, the Borrower shall comply with all approved items of such proposed O&amp;M Budget. &#160;With respect to those items of any proposed O&amp;M Budget that are not approved, the Borrower and DOE shall continue to consult regarding such items in good faith, during which time the O&amp;M Budget for the preceding Fiscal Year related to such items &#160;shall be applicable and shall for all purposes of this Agreement be deemed to be part of the approved O&amp;M Budget for the preceding Fiscal Year until such time as such items for the current Fiscal Year have been approved in writing by DOE.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>Each proposed O&amp;M Budget submitted pursuant to this <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.28</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">O&amp;M Budget</i>) shall:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>be prepared in good faith on the basis of all facts and circumstances then existing and known to the Borrower, and assumptions that the Borrower believes to be reasonable as to all factual and legal matters material to such estimates (which shall be set forth in reasonable detail in the O&amp;M Budget), and reflect the Borrower&#39;s best estimate of the future revenues and expenditures to be received or incurred by the Borrower;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>be based on the same format and maintained substantially on the same basis as, and provide sufficient detail to permit a meaningful comparison to, the O&amp;M Budgets for the previous Fiscal Years; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>include the following:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(1)</font>fair and good faith reasonable estimates of Operating Revenues, Operating Costs (on an individual line-item basis), Debt Service and Capital Expenditures for each period covered by such O&amp;M Budget;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(2)</font>a summary of the Project&#39;s major maintenance schedule to the end of the then-current long-term major maintenance cycle (and related scheduled outages), and the Borrower&#39;s fair and good faith reasonable estimates of any Capital Expenditures during such maintenance cycle, or that are otherwise expected to be incurred in the succeeding five (5) years, and the envisioned effect of any contemplated major maintenance activities or Capital Expenditures on the Project&#39;s operations, which shall be consistent with the Base Case Financial Model being submitted concurrently to DOE for approval in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.02(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Annual Reports</i>); and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(3)</font>such other information as may be reasonably requested by DOE.<i style="color:#1f4e79;font-style:italic;"> </i></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Amendments to O&amp;M Budget</u>. If at any time during any Fiscal Year, Operating Costs to be paid during the balance of such Fiscal Year exceed or could reasonably be expected to exceed the limitations set forth in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;7.28(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Submission and Approval of O&amp;M Budget</i>), the Borrower shall deliver a proposed amendment to the then-current O&amp;M Budget to DOE and the Independent Engineer </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">84</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">describing the purpose of such amendment and certifying that such amendment is reasonably necessary or advisable for the operation and maintenance of the Project. &#160;Such proposed amendment shall become effective on the date approved by DOE and, until such proposed amendment is approved, the Borrower shall comply with the approved O&amp;M Budget (subject to the allowance provisions of this </font><u style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.28</u><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;"> (</font><i style="font-size:11pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">O&amp;M Budget</i><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">) until the proposed amendment is approved by DOE.</font></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.29</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338375"></a><a name="_Toc187351049"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Acceptance and Start-up Testing</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall consult with and provide, or cause to be provided, reasonable notice to DOE and the Independent Engineer regarding provisions related to start-up and testing of the Project and equipment pursuant to the Construction Contracts and the Operating Contracts.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall provide the Independent Engineer with the opportunity to observe the start-up and testing of the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>The Borrower shall at the request of DOE, promptly, but in any event no later than five (5) Business Days, provide DOE and the Independent Engineer with any data or reports received by the Borrower in connection with any of the start-up testing of the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:8pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.30</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351050"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Process Agent</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall procure that each Major Project Participant that is non-U.S. domiciled executes and keeps effective a process agency agreement in form and substance acceptable to the DOE that, in each case, expires no sooner than the sooner of (a) the date that is six months following the Maturity Date and (b) the date that is six months following the corresponding Major Project Document.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:8pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.31</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351051"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">MFN</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall provide DOE with a true and complete copy of any financing arrangement (including, without limitation, loan agreements, inventory financing arrangements, sale and leaseback arrangements, asset financing arrangements, indenture, note purchase agreements, hedging arrangements) entered into after the date hereof. If such financing arrangement has the effect of establishing rights or otherwise benefiting the lender, financier, purchaser, investor, hedge counterparty or direct or indirect shareholder in such financing arrangement in a manner more favorable in any material respect than the rights and benefits established in favor of the DOE hereunder the DOE shall have the right to elect any or all of such rights and benefits by written notice to the Borrower within forty five (45) calendar days of receipt thereof. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:8pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.32</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351052"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Know Your Customer Information</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall provide DOE any information reasonably requested by DOE under or in connection with International Compliance Directives and Anti-Money Laundering Laws, including in connection with entry into any Additional Project Documents, including in connection with entry into any Additional Major Project Documents.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.33</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351053"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">BNSF Consent</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall deliver to DOE within sixty (60) days of the Execution Date:</font></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;"></div><div style="margin-top:12pt;"></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>a duly executed BNSF Consent;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>the Subleasehold Mortgage;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>the BNSF Site Map in a form acceptable to DOE and the Title Company for issuance of the Subleasehold Policy; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>the Subleasehold Policy.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">85</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 7.34</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351054"></a><a name="_Hlk187350752"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Offtake Contracts</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall provide notice to DOE not later than sixty (60) days prior to the last date (a &#8220;</font>Termination Date<font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8221;) on which the Borrower has the right to provide notice of non-renewal for any of:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>the Offtake Contract with [***]</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>the Offtake Contract with [***]</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>the Offtake Contract with [***]</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>the Offtake Contract with [***];</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 72pt;">in each case, before any such Offtake Contract automatically renews. Following the delivery of any such notice and prior to the applicable Termination Date, DOE and Borrower shall confer on the Borrower&#8217;s strategy for Offtake Contracts generally and such Offtake Contract specifically. Thereafter, if DOE so instructs in writing at least five (5) Business Days prior to any Termination Date, the Borrower shall provide notice of non-renewal for the applicable Offtake Contract on or prior to the applicable Termination Date. For the avoidance of doubt, nothing in this provision shall impair or limit the restrictions on the Borrower and DOE&#8217;s consent rights set forth in Section 9.01 including, without limitation, restrictions on amending, modifying, supplementing, further renewing or extending the term of, or consenting to or waiving any right with respect to such Offtake Contract or entering into additional Offtake Contracts, in each case, without DOE&#8217;s prior written consent.</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';white-space:nowrap;">Article VIII</font><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:0.25pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin:12pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;"><a name="_Toc142338376"></a><a name="_Toc187351055"></a><b style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-weight:bold;">Information Covenants</b></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">The Borrower hereby agrees that until the Release Date:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 8.01</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123225655"></a><a name="_Toc142338377"></a><a name="_Toc187351056"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Financial Statements</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. At its own expense, the Borrower shall furnish or cause to be furnished to DOE by an Acceptable Delivery Method (unless otherwise noted), and if requested by FFB or DOE on behalf of FFB, to FFB by email to [***], with a reproduction of the signatures where required, the following items:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref123225904"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Annual Financial Statements</u>. With respect to the Borrower, any Sponsor (other than Warburg Pincus), Direct Parent, and any Person(s) providing the Phase 2 Equity Instrument as soon as available, but in any event within sixty (60)&#160;days (for the Calumet Parent) and ninety (90) days for all other such Persons following such Person&#8217;s Fiscal Year end:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>audited Financial Statements of such Borrower Entity for such Fiscal Year (whether consolidated or on an individual basis);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>each Compliance Certificate required by <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Compliance Certificates</i>); and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>a report on such Financial Statements of the Accountant for such Person, which report shall:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>be unqualified as to going concern and scope of audit;</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">86</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>subject to changes in professional auditing standards from time to time, contain a statement to the effect that such Financial Statements fairly present, in all material respects, the consolidated financial condition of such Borrower Entity , as applicable, and its Subsidiaries as at the dates indicated and the results of their operations and their cash flows for the period indicated in conformity with the Designated Standard applied on a basis consistent with prior years (except as otherwise disclosed in such Financial Statements); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>state that the examination by the Borrower&#8216;s Accountant or Borrower Entity&#8217;s Account, as applicable, in connection with such Financial Statements has been made in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>include an updated asset register listing and describing the net book values of all tangible assets related to the Project and any other asset constituting Collateral, including inventory, plant, property and equipment as derived from the Borrower&#8217;s Accountant worksheet to the audited Financial Statements of the Borrower.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref140334826"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Quarterly Financial Statements</u>. With respect to the Borrower and Calumet Parent, as soon as available, but in any event within forty-five (45)&#160;days following the end of each fiscal quarter of such Person&#8217;s Fiscal Year: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>unaudited Financial Statements of such Person for such Fiscal Quarter, which shall exclude notes thereto for the Borrower; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>each Compliance Certificate required by <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Compliance Certificates</i>); and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>such other evidence as may be required by DOE to demonstrate such Person&#8217;s compliance with Section 7.22 (<i style="font-style:italic;">Financial Covenants</i>) of the Sponsor Support Agreement. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref123225803"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compliance Certificates</u>. Concurrently with any delivery of Financial Statements or other information pursuant to any of <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sections </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Annual Financial Statements</i>) through <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Compliance Certificates</i>), a certificate (a &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Compliance Certificate</b>&quot;) of a Financial Officer of the relevant Borrower Entity substantially in the form of the document attached as <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit&#160;I</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form of Compliance Certificate</i>) hereto, which certificate shall:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>certify that no Default or Event of Default has occurred, or, if such certification cannot be made, the nature and period of existence of such Default or Event of Default and what corrective action such Borrower Entity has taken or proposes to take with respect thereto;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>set forth computations in reasonable detail satisfactory to DOE demonstrating whether or not: (A) in the case of the Borrower, it is in compliance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;7.22</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Financial Covenants</i>); and &#160; &#160; &#160; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>in the case of each Compliance Certificate delivered concurrently with annual Financial Statements pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Annual Financial Statements</i>):</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>certify that such Financial Statements fairly present, in all material respects, the financial condition of such Borrower Entity as at the dates indicated and the results of its operations and its cash flows for the periods indicated, in each case in conformity with the Designated Standard applied on a basis consistent with prior years; </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">87</p></div></div></div><hr hereto since the date thereof or the date of the most recent certificate delivered pursuant to this <u made, identify such changes; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>contain a written statement stating any material changes, if any, within the Designated Standard used to prepare the applicable Financial Statements or in the application thereof since the date of the previous certification and describing the effect of any such changes on such Financial Statements accompanying such certificate.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New
