style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 8.02</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc175842246"></a><a name="_Toc175842507"></a><a name="_Toc175842765"></a><a name="_Toc175842247"></a><a name="_Toc175842508"></a><a name="_Toc175842766"></a><a name="_Toc142338378"></a><a name="_Toc187351057"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Reports</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. At its own expense, the Borrower shall furnish or cause to be furnished to DOE by an Acceptable Delivery Method, and, if requested by FFB or DOE on behalf of FFB, to FFB by facsimile, with a reproduction of the signatures where required, the following items, in each case, in form and substance satisfactory to DOE:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref127930740"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Annual Reports</u>. With respect to each Fiscal Year of the Borrower: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>no later than the date falling forty-five (45) days prior to the end of such Fiscal Year (such date, an &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Annual Reporting Date</b>&quot;), an omnibus annual report (each, an &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Omnibus</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Annual Report</b>&quot;) of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, substantially in the form attached as <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit&#160;J</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form of Annual Certificate</i>) hereto, setting forth the following and including all material calculations and assumptions used to generate the information provided therein, together, if applicable, with a comparison marked to reflect changes as compared to the contents of the Omnibus Annual Report delivered to the DOE for the immediately preceding year:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>an updated O&amp;M Budget and Operating Plan for the immediately subsequent four (4) Fiscal Quarters prepared and approved in accordance with, and within the time frames specified in, <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.28</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">O&amp;M Budget</i>), accompanied by a report on the past twelve (12) months of production of the Facilities; Operating Costs and Capital Expenditures and a forecast of anticipated Capital Expenditures for the immediately subsequent four (4) Fiscal Quarters;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>(I) a certificate from the chief financial officer or similar officer of the Borrower that there have been no material changes to the Base Case Financial Model or the assumptions therein from the Base Case Financial Model then in effect; or (II) a proposed update to the Base Case Financial Model, together with a certificate from the chief financial officer or similar officer of the Borrower that includes a written explanation from the Borrower of all variances from the Base Case Financial Model then in effect.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>the Safety Report, substantially in the form attached hereto as <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule R</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form of Safety Report</i>), with respect to the Safety Audit for such Fiscal Year;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>a sales and marketing plan, in the form attached hereto as <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 8.02(a) (</u><i style="font-style:italic;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sales and Marketing Plan</i><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">)</u>, together with a report setting out the status of offtake arrangements, each of which will be in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to DOE (the &#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Sales and Marketing Plan</b>&#8221;)</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>no later than the date falling sixty (60) days following the end of such Fiscal Year:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>updated versions of the Offtake Plan, Major Maintenance Plan and the Business Continuity Plan, in each case, together with a report setting out changes as </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">88</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">compared to the contents of the then-approved plans, each of which will be in form and substance reasonably satisfactory to DOE; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>such other information as DOE may request.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref127934640"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Quarterly Certificate</u>. With respect to each Fiscal Quarter of the Borrower, no later than the date on which the quarterly unaudited Financial Statements are delivered pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 8.01(b)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Quarterly Financial Statements</i>) (such date, a &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Quarterly Reporting Date</b>&quot;), a quarterly certificate (each, a &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Quarterly Certificate</b>&quot;) of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower, substantially in the form attached as <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit&#160;K</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form of Quarterly Certificate</i>) hereto and in form and substance satisfactory to DOE, setting forth the following and including all material calculations and assumptions used to generate the information provided therein:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New and for the Fiscal Year to date, together with a comparison of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New applicable reporting period in form and substance satisfactory to DOE acting reasonably, which report shall: (A) summarize: (1) the Project&#39;s compliance with applicable Environmental Laws, the Mitigation Action Plan and the environmental requirements set forth in this Agreement during such Fiscal Year including, for the avoidance of doubt, a document that lists all Required Approvals required under applicable Environmental Laws, identifies any changes to such Required Approvals, and tracks the associated reporting requirements under applicable Environmental Laws for construction and operation of the Project, any changes to such Required Approvals, any changes to the status of the information confirmed by the Borrower pursuant to the representations set forth in <u 31 of each Fiscal Year following the Execution Date. &#160;The Borrower shall provide for the prompt correction of any deficiencies identified in such safety audit and for the operation and maintenance of the Project in accordance with any recommendations set forth therein. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Promptly, but in any event within five (5) Business Days (unless otherwise set out below), after any Borrower Entity obtains Knowledge thereof or information pertaining thereto, the Borrower shall furnish or cause to be furnished to DOE, at the Borrower&#39;s expense, by an Acceptable Delivery Method, and if requested by FFB or DOE on behalf of FFB, to FFB by email to [***], with a reproduction thereof, together with a certificate of a Responsible Officer of the Borrower indicating the steps the Borrower has taken or proposes to take to remedy the same;</div><div style="font-family:'Times then-current Base Case Financial Model, including any calculation or assumption set out therein, together </div></div><div style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>breach or non-performance of, or any default under, a Contractual Obligation of any Borrower Entity; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>any dispute, litigation, investigation, proceeding or suspension between any Borrower and any Governmental Authority; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>the commencement of, or any material development in, any litigation or proceeding affecting any Borrower Entity, including pursuant to any applicable Environmental Laws; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>any actual or proposed termination, rescission, discharge (otherwise than by performance), amendment, supplement, modification, waiver or indulgence or breach of any Project Document, Governmental Approval or Required Approval;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font>not less than twelve (12) months prior to expiration or anticipated termination of any Major Offtake Contract, notification of such expiration or termination, together with a written plan for replacement of such Major Offtake Contract and revenues generated thereunder.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the occurrence of any ERISA Event;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font>any written formal or informal environmental notices, orders, decisions, directives or determinations submitted by any Governmental Authority to the Borrower, including any violations or potential violations of Environmental Law identified in writing by such Governmental Authority together with a report setting out remedial action or proposed remedial action taken with respect thereto;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(k)</font>any accident related to the Project having a material and adverse impact on the environment or on human health (including any such accident resulting in serious injury or the loss of life), including any discovery of the presence of Hazardous Substances at the Project Site, or Release or threatened Release or threatened Release on, under, at or through the Project Site required to be reported to any federal, state or local Governmental Authority under any applicable Environmental Law;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(l)</font>any Adverse Proceeding pending or threatened against or affecting any Borrower Entity (other than a Passive Sponsor), any of their respective property or any other third party that could reasonably be expected to impact the Project:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>that has had or could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>that seeks damages in excess of [***];</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>that seeks to enjoin or otherwise prevent the consummation of, or to recover any damages or obtain relief as a result of, the transactions contemplated hereby; </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">92</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>that arises in respect of any Indebtedness that, in each case, has an aggregate principal amount of at least [***] (in the case of any Borrower Entity other than a Sponsors) or [***] (in the case of a Sponsor other than a Passive Sponsor);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>where any Governmental Authority alleges substantial criminal misconduct by any Borrower Entity or its Affiliates; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(vi)</font>if related to the Project, where any Governmental Authority alleges any criminal misconduct by any of the relevant Person, and any material developments with respect to any of the foregoing;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(m)</font>any actual or proposed termination, rescission, discharge (otherwise than by performance), amendment, supplement, modification, waiver or breach of:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>any Major Project Document or Required Approval; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>any other Project Document or other Governmental Approval if such action in respect of such other Project Document or other Governmental Approval has had or could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect on the Borrower or the Project; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(n)</font>any information that representations made with respect to Debarment Regulations were erroneous when made or have become erroneous by reason of changed circumstances;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(o)</font>the occurrence of any Emergency;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(p)</font>any change in the information provided prior to the date hereof that would result in a change to the KYC Requirements or KYC Parties;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(q)</font>as soon as practicable and no later than forty eight (48) hours from obtaining knowledge of an event or accident that results in serious injury or loss of life, and with respect to any such event or accident, provide DOE with a root cause analysis no later than 30 days from such event.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 8.04</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338380"></a><a name="_Toc187351059"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Other Information</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. At its own expense, the Borrower shall furnish or cause to be furnished to DOE by an Acceptable Delivery Method, and, if requested by FFB or DOE on behalf of FFB, to FFB by email to [***], with a reproduction of the signatures where required, the following items:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Project Documents</u>. Without limiting <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Article IX</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Negative Covenants</i>), as soon as available, but in no event later than ten (10) Business Days after the execution thereof the Borrower shall furnish copies of any Project Document obtained or entered into by the Borrower after the Execution Date, and with respect to any Major Project Document, unless otherwise instructed by DOE, the Borrower shall deliver to DOE, concurrently with delivery of such copy:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>a customary legal opinion (addressed to the Secured Parties) from external counsel qualified in the jurisdiction of organization of each counterparty thereto, and, if different, in the jurisdiction whose law governs such Major Project Document, in form and substance satisfactory to DOE; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>a fully executed Direct Agreement with the Major Project Participant thereunder, in form and substance satisfactory to DOE and subject only to countersignature by the Collateral Agent.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">93</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Additional Audit Reports</u>. As soon as available, but, in any event, within thirty (30) Business Days after the receipt thereof by any Borrower Entity, copies of all other material annual or interim reports submitted to such Borrower Entity by such Borrower Entity&#8217;s Accountant. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Other Information</u>. Promptly upon request, such other information or documents as DOE reasonably requests.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 8.05</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338381"></a><a name="_Toc187351060"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Adverse Proceedings; Defense of Claims</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall provide DOE with rights to review, with appropriate restrictions to protect waiver of any relevant privileges, including any attorney-client privilege, controlled by the Borrower, drafts of any submissions that the Borrower has prepared for filing in any court or with any regulatory body in connection with proceedings to which the Borrower is or is seeking to become a party; </font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">provided</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">, that this obligation shall not apply to any such proceedings between the Borrower and any Secured Party.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';white-space:nowrap;">Article IX</font><a name="_Ref130493163"></a><a name="_Ref127828225"></a><a name="_Ref127936048"></a><a name="_Ref127936054"></a><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:0.25pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin:12pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;"><a name="_Ref130493206"></a><a name="_Ref140336790"></a><a name="_Toc142338383"></a><a name="_Toc187351061"></a><b style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-weight:bold;">Negative Covenants</b></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">The Borrower hereby agrees that until the Release Date:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.01</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338384"></a><a name="_Toc187351062"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Restrictions on Operations</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Ordinary Course of Conduct; No Other Business</u>. The Borrower shall not:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>engage in any business other than the financing, ownership, design, development, engineering, procurement, equipping, construction, implementation, completion, operation, maintenance and repair of the Project and activities directly redirected thereto in accordance with and as contemplated by the Transaction Documents; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>undertake any action that could reasonably be expected to lead to a material alteration of the nature of its business or the nature or scope of the Project (including any expansion thereof); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>change its name or take any other action that might adversely affect the Liens created by the Security Documents; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>fail to maintain its existence and its right to carry on its business.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Other Transactions</u>. The Borrower shall not, directly or indirectly: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>enter into any contracts or other agreements providing it with material rights against, or material obligations toward, any Person other than rights and obligations under the Financing Documents, the Major Project Documents, and the Project Documents permitted hereunder and any transactions expressly contemplated hereby and thereby; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>enter into any Additional Project Documents without the prior written consent of DOE, except as expressly permitted in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.15</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Offtake Contracts</i>);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>agree to any provision or term in any Project Document or other material contract of any limitation on the Borrower&#8217;s ability to assign its right and obligations thereunder as Collateral or causing or giving the counterparty thereunder the right to cause any such Project Document or material contract to be terminated or materially impaired as a result, directly or indirectly, of any Default, Event of Default or exercise of remedies under the Financing Documents;</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">94</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>enter into any transaction or series of related transactions with any Person other than in the Ordinary Course of Business and on an arm&#39;s-length basis; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>establish any sole and exclusive purchasing or sales agency, or enter into any transaction, whereby the Borrower might pay more than the fair market value for products or services of others.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Amendment of and Notices under Transaction Documents</u>. The Borrower shall not, except with the prior written consent of DOE:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref123311030"></a>agree, directly or indirectly, to any assignment, amendment, modification, suspension, termination, rescission, supplement, consent or waiver, or waive any right to consent to any amendment, modification, suspensions, termination, rescission, supplement or waiver of any right with respect to, or assign any of the respective duties or obligations under:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>any Major Project Document (except for, in the case of any Construction Contract, any change orders or other modifications that reflect or implement Approved Construction Changes), the Project Milestone Schedule, the Construction Budget, the Major Maintenance Plan, the Offtake Plan or the O&amp;M Budget;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>any Project Document (other than any Major Project Document) unless such assignment, amendment, modification, suspension, termination, rescission, supplement or waiver is an Approved Construction Change or such assignment, amendment, modification, suspension, termination, rescission, supplement or waiver could not reasonably be expected to:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(1)</font>delay the occurrence of the Project Completion Date beyond the Project Completion Longstop Date; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:108pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:31.8pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(2)</font>otherwise have a Material Adverse Effect;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>any Governmental Approval or other Required Approval, the effect of which could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>any Financing Document; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>certify, consent to or otherwise permit through a Change Order or otherwise, &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Substantial Completion</b>&quot; (as defined in the Construction Contracts), or any equivalent term, to occur under the Construction Contracts; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>enter into any agreement other than any Financing Document that would restrict its ability to amend or otherwise modify any of the Transaction Documents; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>give or withhold any material consent or approval, or exercise any option or take or decline to take any other material action under the provisions of the Major Project Documents other than actions permitted under clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(i)</u> above, actions that are reasonably required to carry out the Project in accordance with the Project Milestone Schedule, and actions reasonably required to comply with the Borrower&#39;s affirmative obligations under this Agreement, including under <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sections </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.06</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Diligent Construction of Project; Approved Construction Changes</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.07</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Contractual Remedies</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.09</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Performance of Obligations</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.13</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Compliance with Program Requirements</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.15</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Offtake </i><i style="font-style:italic;">Contracts</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.14</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Accounts; Cash Deposits</i>); 7.32 (<i style="font-style:italic;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Know Your Customer Information</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.17</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act</i>), and <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.27</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Operating Plan; Operations</i>).</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">95</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Commissions</u>. The Borrower shall not pay: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>any commission or fee to Affiliate for furnishing guarantees, counter-guarantees or other credit support for any Contractual Obligations undertaken by the Borrower in connection with the Project (other than as set forth in the following clause (ii)); or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><a name="_Ref127914964"></a>any fee to any Affiliate with respect to or in connection with the development, construction, financing or operation of the Project, including salaries, bonuses, commissions, management fees, consulting fees, and technical assistance fees; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that this provision shall not preclude the Borrower from (A) paying salaries and bonuses to its employees; or (B) making payments to other Borrower Entities in accordance with Major Project Documents.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compromise or Settlement of Disputes</u>. The Borrower shall not agree or otherwise consent to settle or compromise: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>any single Adverse Proceeding in excess of [***]; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>any material dispute under any Project Document, </div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:12pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;">in each case without the prior written consent of DOE.</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Accounts</u>. From the First Advance Date under Tranche 1, the Borrower shall not establish or maintain any bank accounts other than the Project Accounts and the Company Account.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Assignment</u>. Other than the assignment of the Project Documents and Governmental Approvals to the Collateral Agent as security for the benefit of the Secured Parties, the Borrower shall not assign or otherwise transfer its rights under any of the Transaction Documents or Required Approvals to any Person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Powers of Attorney</u>. The Borrower shall not grant any power of attorney or similar power to any Person, except:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>to its officers, directors or employees in the Ordinary Course of Business; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>in connection with Permitted Liens granted to the Secured Parties.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.02</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338385"></a><a name="_Toc187351063"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Liens</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not, and shall not agree to, create, assume or otherwise permit to exist any Lien upon any of the Collateral or any of its other property, whether now owned or hereafter acquired, or in any proceeds or income therefrom, other than Permitted Liens.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.03</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338386"></a><a name="_Toc187351064"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Merger; Disposition; Transfer</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not, and shall not agree to:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>enter into any transaction of merger, consolidation, liquidation, winding up or dissolution;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref466759333"></a>carry out any Disposition of all or any part of its ownership interests in the Project or the Collateral, or any other part of its business or property of any kind whatsoever, whether real, personal </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">96</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">or mixed and whether tangible or intangible, whether now or hereafter acquired other than Permitted Dispositions;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>acquire by purchase or otherwise the business, property or fixed assets of any Person, other than purchases or other acquisitions of inventory, property or materials or spare parts or Capital Expenditures, either (i) in the Ordinary Course of Business in accordance with the applicable Construction Budget or O&amp;M Budget, or (ii) constituting Emergency Operating Costs as required in connection with an Emergency; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>transfer or release (other than as permitted by clause&#160;<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(b)</u> above) the Collateral, or other similar actions; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>abandon, or suspend, or agree (directly or indirectly) to abandon or suspend or make any public statements regarding its intention to abandon or suspend the development, construction or operation of the Project, or take any action that could be deemed an &quot;abandonment,&quot; or &quot;suspension,&quot; or transfer of the Project to any Person or notify any Major Project Participant of its intent to terminate, or agree (directly or indirectly) to the termination of, any Major Project Document or the construction or operation of the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.04</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123198088"></a><a name="_Toc142338387"></a><a name="_Toc187351065"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Restricted Payments</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not, and shall not agree to, directly or indirectly, (i)&#160; </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">reduce its Share Capital (other than as required by the Designated Standards); (ii) declare or make or authorize any dividend or any other payment or distribution of cash or property to any Equity Owner on account of any Equity Interests of the Borrower; (iii)&#160;redeem, retire, purchase or otherwise acquire any of the Equity Interests of the Borrower; (iv)&#160;make any payment with respect to principal or interest on or purchase, redeem, retire or defease any Indebtedness owed to or for the benefit of any Affiliate of the Borrower; (v) make any other payment (including with respect to any development, management or operation fee) to any Affiliate of the Borrower (other than repayment of any Permitted Indebtedness) except for, in each case (A) repayment of any Permitted Indebtedness and (B) payments pursuant to any Major Project Document existing on the Execution Date or entered into with the consent of DOE; or (f)&#160;set aside any funds for any of the foregoing (collectively, the &quot;</font>Restricted Payments<font style="font-weight:normal;">&quot;), unless such Restricted Payment is made solely with available funds standing to the credit of the Restricted Payment Account after transfer thereto from the Restricted Payment Suspense Account and following satisfaction of each of the following conditions to such transfer (the &quot;</font>Restricted Payment Conditions<font style="font-weight:normal;">&quot;):</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The first Restricted Payment Date shall not be less than twelve (12) months following the Project Completion Date;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>(A) such transfer shall be made not more than thirty (30) days after a Payment Date; and (B) no other such transfer shall have been made during the immediately preceding ninety (90) day period;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>the Borrower has provided not less than fifteen (15) Business Days&#8217; prior written notice of the proposed Restricted Payment and the proposed Restricted Payment Date to DOE;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>no Material Adverse Effect shall exist or would exist after giving effect to any such Restricted Payment;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>no Default or Event of Default shall exist or would exist prior to or after giving effect to any such Restricted Payment;</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">97</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>all amounts standing to the credit of each Reserve Accounts shall be equal to or exceed the amount, if any, then required in accordance with the Accounts Agreement, both before and after given effect to such transfer;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>as of the immediately preceding Calculation Date, (i) the Historical Debt Service Coverage Ratio for the twelve (12) month period ending on the most recent Payment Date shall be at least 1.50:1.00; and (ii) the Projected Debt Service Coverage Ratio for the twelve (12) month period commencing on the most recent Payment Date shall be at least 1.50:1.00; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font>such transfer is made in accordance with the Accounts Agreement;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>in connection with the proposed Restricted Payment, no earlier than twenty (20) Business Days and no later than fifteen (15) Business Days prior to the making of such Restricted Payment, a Responsible Officer of the Borrower shall have delivered a certificate in the form set out as <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit&#160;Q</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form of Restricted Payment Certificate</i>) either (i) certifying that: (A) there are no material changes to the Base Case Financial Model most recently approved by DOE; and (B) there are no material changes to the assumptions therein, accompanied by a certificate from the chief financial officer of the Borrower concurring with the Borrower&#8217;s assessment and assumptions set out in its certification; or (ii) attaching a certified updated Base Case Financial Model, in form and substance satisfactory to DOE, accompanied by a certificate from the chief financial officer of the Borrower concurring with such updated Base Case Financial Model and the assumptions set out therein; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font>in connection with the proposed Restricted Payment, no earlier than ten (10) Business Days and no later than five (5) Business Days prior to the making of such Restricted Payment, a Responsible Officer of the Borrower shall have delivered a certificate (i) certifying satisfaction of the foregoing conditions, and (ii) setting out in reasonable detail (and certifying the accuracy of) the calculations for computing the ratios in clause (h) above and stating that such calculations were made in good faith and were based on assumptions believed to be reasonable;</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><i style="font-style:italic;">provided that</i>, prior to the first anniversary of the Project Completion Date, the Borrower may make a Restricted Payment in connection with a Permitted Tax Distribution without complying with Sections 9.04(a) and (b) above in an aggregate amount not to exceed $[***] in any twelve- (12) month period.</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.05</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338388"></a><a name="_Toc187351066"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Use of Proceeds</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not use the proceeds of any Advance for any purpose other than as specified in Section 2.04(e) (</font><i style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">Disbursement of Proceeds</i><font style="font-weight:normal;">).</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.06</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338389"></a><a name="_Toc187351067"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Organizational Documents; Fiscal Year; Account Policies; Reporting Practices</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not, except with the prior written consent of DOE, amend or modify: </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>its Organizational Documents, except such amendments that would not have any adverse effect on the rights of the Secured Parties;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>its Fiscal Year;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>accounting policies or reporting practices other than as required by the Designated Standard; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>its legal form or its capital structure (including to provide for the issuance of any options, warrants or other rights with respect thereto).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.07</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref123227033"></a><a name="_Toc142338390"></a><a name="_Toc187351068"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Approved Construction Changes; Project Milestone Schedule; Budgets</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not:</font></div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">98</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref123196300"></a>except with the prior written consent of DOE or as otherwise required or permitted hereunder, change, reallocate, amend, modify, or supplement or permit or consent, directly or indirectly, to any changes, reallocations, amendments, modifications, or supplements (including consent to any plans) (each, a &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Construction Change</b>&quot;) of any provisions of the Project Milestone Schedule, the Operating Plan, the Major Maintenance Plan, the Construction Budget or the Base Case Financial Model, in each case that is then applicable; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>except as expressly contemplated herein and permitted in accordance with the terms hereof, make any material modifications to the then-applicable Project Milestone Schedule, except (i) as expressly contemplated herein; or (ii)&#160;otherwise with the prior written consent of DOE;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>except as expressly contemplated herein and permitted in accordance with the terms hereof, make any modification without the prior written consent of DOE to the then-applicable (i) Construction Budget; (ii) O&amp;M Budget; or (iii) Base Case Financial Model;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>incur or pay any Capital Expenditures in connection with major maintenance activities that are not contemplated in the Major Maintenance Plan; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>other than with respect to the incurrence or payment of Emergency Operating Costs, incur or pay any Operating Costs that are not contemplated in a line item or category contained in the O&amp;M Budget, unless: (i) such Operating Costs have been reallocated from a line item or category for which they are no longer needed, as approved in writing by DOE; and (ii) as of any calculation date, the aggregate amount of Operating Costs incurred as of such date does not exceed one hundred ten percent (110%) of the aggregate amount of Operating Costs reflected in the O&amp;M Budget.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.08</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338391"></a><a name="_Toc187351069"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Hedging Agreements</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not enter into any Hedging Agreements.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.09</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338392"></a><a name="_Toc187351070"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Margin Regulations</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.The Borrower shall not directly or indirectly apply any part of the proceeds of any Advance or other revenues to the purchasing or carrying of any margin stock within the meaning of Regulation T, U or X of the Board, or any regulations, interpretations or rulings thereunder, or for any purpose that violates any regulation of the Board.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.10</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351071"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Environmental Matters.</b></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall not undertake any action or release any Hazardous Substances in violation of any Environmental Law or the effect of which would trigger a reporting obligation under Environmental Law and the Borrower shall ensure that the Project shall be operated in compliance with all Environmental Laws and that the Project shall not be operated in any manner that would pose a hazard to public health or safety or to the environment. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall not undertake any development or construction activities for the Project outside the geographic boundaries of the environmental review under NEPA</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font
