style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.11</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338394"></a><a name="_Toc187351072"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">ERISA</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not, and shall cause its ERISA Affiliates not to: </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>take any action that would result in the occurrence of an ERISA Event to the extent that, when taken together with all other such ERISA Events for which liability is reasonably expected to occur, the occurrence of such ERISA Event could reasonably be expected to, individually or in the aggregate, result in a Material Adverse Effect;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>allow, or permit any of its ERISA Affiliates to allow, the aggregate amount of Unfunded Pension Liabilities among all Employee Benefit Plans (taking into account only Employee </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">99</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">Benefit Plans with positive Unfunded Pension Liabilities) at any time to exist where such amount could have a Material Adverse Effect; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>fail, or permit any of its ERISA Affiliates to fail, to comply with ERISA or the related provisions of the Code, if any such non-compliance, singly or in the aggregate, would be reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.12</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338395"></a><a name="_Toc187351073"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Investment Company Act</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not take any action that would result in the Borrower being required to register as an &quot;investment company&quot; under the Investment Company Act or that would result in it being controlled by any Person that is or is required to be registered as an &quot;investment company&quot; under the Investment Company Act of 1940.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.13</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc187351074"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sanctions</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>(i)&#160;become a person whose property or interests in property are blocked or subject to blocking pursuant to Section&#160;1 of Executive Order 13224 of September&#160;23, 2001, Blocking Property and Prohibiting Transactions With Persons Who Commit, Threaten to Commit or Support Terrorism (66 Fed. Reg. 49079(2001); (ii)&#160;engage in any dealings or transactions prohibited by Section&#160;2 of such executive order, or be otherwise associated with any such person in any manner violative of Section&#160;2; or (iii)&#160;otherwise become the subject or target of any Sanctions;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>directly or indirectly use the proceeds of any Advance, or lend, contribute or otherwise make available such proceeds to any Person (i) to fund any activities, dealings, or business of or with any Prohibited Person or in any Prohibited Jurisdiction; or (ii) in any other manner that would result in a violation of Sanctions by any Person (including any Person participating in the Guaranteed Loan); or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>repay any portion of the Guaranteed Loan with any funds: (i) obtained or derived, directly or knowingly indirectly, from any business or dealings with any Prohibited Person; or (ii) constituting the proceeds of a violation of any International Compliance Directive.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.14</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338397"></a><a name="_Toc187351075"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Debarment Regulations</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>Unless authorized by DOE, the Borrower shall not knowingly enter into any transactions in connection with the construction, operation or maintenance of the Project with any Person who is debarred, suspended, declared ineligible or voluntarily excluded from participation in procurement or non-procurement transactions with any United States federal government department or agency pursuant to any of the Debarment Regulations.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>The Borrower shall not fail to comply with any and all Debarment Regulations in a manner that results in the Borrower being debarred, suspended, declared ineligible or voluntarily excluded from participation in procurement or non-procurement transactions with any United States federal government department or agency pursuant to any of such Debarment Regulations.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.15</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338398"></a><a name="_Toc187351076"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Prohibited Person</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not become (whether through a transfer or otherwise) a Prohibited Person. </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.16</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338399"></a><a name="_Toc187351077"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Restrictions on Indebtedness and Certain Capital Transactions</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref123197188"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Indebtedness</u>. The Borrower shall not and shall not agree to, directly or indirectly: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>incur, create, guarantee, assume, permit to exist or otherwise become liable for any Indebtedness, except for Permitted Indebtedness and without the prior written consent of DOE, incur </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">100</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">any liabilities to third parties in order to sell (including pursuant to any contract) Product except as expressly permitted in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.15</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Offtake Contracts</i>). </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Capital Expenditures</u>. The Borrower shall not make any Capital Expenditure in any year except for Permitted Capital Expenditures.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref130505918"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Investments</u>. The Borrower shall not make any Investments except for Permitted Investments. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Leases</u>. The Borrower shall not enter into any Lease of any property or equipment of any kind (including by sale-leaseback or otherwise)<i style="font-style:italic;">,</i> except for Permitted Leases in an amount not in excess of the amount budgeted therefor in the Construction Budget or the O&amp;M Budget, as applicable, or as permitted pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 9.16(a)(i)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Indebtedness</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Redemption Transfer or Issuance of Stock</u>. The Borrower shall not: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>redeem, retire, purchase or otherwise acquire, directly or indirectly, any of its outstanding Equity Interests (or any options or warrants issued by the Borrower with respect to its Equity Interests) or set aside any funds for any of the foregoing; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>issue or transfer any Equity Interests to any other Person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Subsidiaries</u>. The Borrower shall not: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>form or have any Subsidiaries;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>enter into any partnership or a joint venture;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>acquire any Equity Interests in or make any capital contribution to any other Person;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>enter into any partnership, profit-sharing or royalty agreement or other similar arrangement whereby the Borrower&#39;s income or profits are, or might be, shared with any other Person; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font>enter into any management contract or similar arrangement whereby its business or operations are managed by any other Person.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.17</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338400"></a><a name="_Toc187351078"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">No Other Federal Funding</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not use any other Federal Funding to pay any Project Costs.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.18</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338401"></a><a name="_Toc187351079"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Intellectual Property</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>The Borrower shall not (and shall cause each other Borrower Entity and each other Major Project Participant to not) assign or otherwise transfer any right, title or interest in any Project IP: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>to any Prohibited Person; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>without providing advance written notice of such assignment or transfer to the Secured Parties</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>except as permitted under <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 9.03(b)</u>(<i style="font-style:italic;">Merger; Disposition; Transfer</i>); and </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">101</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>without requiring such assignee or transferee to:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(A)</font>comply with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 7.02(g)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Source Code Escrow</i>);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(B)</font>as applicable: (1) for all Project IP licensed to the Borrower under a Project IP Agreement, comply with the terms and conditions of such Project IP Agreement; and (2) for all Project IP owned by the Borrower, grant to the Borrower the right to freely use and sublicense, for no additional consideration, rights in the Project IP to: (x) develop, design, engineer, procure, construct, start up, commission, operate and maintain the Project; (y) complete the activities designated to be completed in each Project Phase, or to achieve Project Completion; or (z) exercise the Borrower&#39;s rights and perform its obligations under the Major Project Documents, as applicable at the relevant time; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(C)</font>demonstrate the technical experience and financial ability to maintain and develop the Project IP as required for the Project; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:32.5pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(D)</font>grant to the Secured Parties the Secured Parties&#39; License, where such license shall also be enforceable upon any bankruptcy or insolvency action involving such assignee or transferee.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 9.19</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338402"></a><a name="_Toc187351080"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Program Requirements</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The Borrower shall not </font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>take any action, or fail to take any action, that would cause the Project not to be an Eligible Project; or<b style="font-weight:bold;text-transform:uppercase;"> </b></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>cause the Guaranteed Loan to be paid, or, after the First Advance Date, cause Project Costs to have been paid or be expected to be paid, with (i) any federal grants, assistance, or loans (excluding the Guaranteed Loan); or (ii) other funds guaranteed by the Federal Government.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';white-space:nowrap;">Article X</font><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';margin-right:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:0.25pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;margin:12pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;"><a name="_Toc142338403"></a><a name="_Toc187351081"></a><b style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-weight:bold;">Events of Default and Remedies</b></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 10.01</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Ref236044388"></a><a name="_Toc142338404"></a><a name="_Toc187351082"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Events of Default</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. The occurrence of any of the following events shall constitute an </font>Event of Default<font style="font-weight:normal;"> hereunder:</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref123268624"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Borrower Failure to Make Payment Under Financing Documents</u>. The Borrower shall fail to pay, in accordance with the terms of this Agreement, the FFB Documents or any other Financing Documents (whether at scheduled maturity, as a required prepayment, by acceleration or otherwise):</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>any principal amount of the Advances or any interest otherwise due and payable in respect of the Guaranteed Loan or any FFB Note Reimbursement Obligation on or before the date such amount is due; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>any fee, charge or other amount due under any Financing Document on or before the date such amount is due and such failure to pay shall continue unremedied for a period of five (5) Business Days after the date on which such amount was due.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font><a name="_Ref127936574"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sponsor Failure to Make Payment Under Financing Documents</u>. Any Sponsor shall fail to pay, in accordance with the terms of this Agreement or any other Financing Documents to which it is a party, any fee, charge or other amount due by it under such Financing Document on or before the date </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">102</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">such amount is due, and such failure to pay shall continue unremedied for a period of five (5) Business Days after the date on which such amount was due.</font></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font><a name="_Ref127936580"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Misstatements; Omissions</u>. Any representation or warranty confirmed or made in any Transaction Document by or on behalf of any Borrower Entity or any Major Project Participant or in any certificate, Financial Statement or other document provided by or on behalf of any such Person to any Secured Party or any Secured Party Advisor in connection with the transactions contemplated by the Transaction Documents shall be found to have been incorrect, false or misleading in any respect when confirmed, made or deemed to have been made. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font><a name="_Ref142649634"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Borrower Entity Breaches Under the Financing Documents Without Cure Period</u></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>The Borrower fails, as of any relevant date of determination, to perform or observe any of its obligations under any term, covenant or agreement set forth in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Sections </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Maintenance of Existence; Property; Etc</i><i style="font-style:italic;">.</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.02</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Intellectual Property</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.03</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Insurance</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.05 </u>(<i style="font-style:italic;">Further Assurances; Creation and Perfection of Security Interests</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.10</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Use of Proceeds</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.13</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Compliance with Program Requirements</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.14</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Accounts; Cash Deposits</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.17</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.18</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Lobbying Restriction</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.19</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Cargo Preference Act</i>); 7.22 (<i style="font-style:italic;">Financial Covenants</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.23</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Public Announcements</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.24</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Bankruptcy Remoteness</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.25</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Prohibited Persons</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.26</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">International Compliance Directives</i>); <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.32</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Know Your Customer Information</i>); or <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Article IX</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Negative Covenants</i>); provided that a breach under Section 7.22(b) related to the Projected Debt Service Coverage Ratio shall not constitute an Event of Default so long as (x) within thirty (30) calendar days after the Calculation Date related to each such breach, the Borrower shall have delivered a remediation plan acceptable to DOE setting forth proposed steps to be taken by the Borrower to improve the Projected Debt Service Coverage Ratio and monthly thereafter, provides reports to the DOE detailing the implementation of such remediation plan and (y) the Borrower and the Sponsor make relevant company representatives and outside advisors available to meet and confer with DOE, the Independent Engineer, and its other outside advisors (including legal and financial advisors) to discuss the contents of the remediation plan.<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> &#160;</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>Any Sponsor fails, as of any relevant date of determination, to perform or observe any of its obligations, including any payment obligation, under any term, covenant or agreement set forth in Section 2.02 (<i style="font-style:italic;">Additional Equity Contributions</i>) &#160;of the Sponsor Support Agreement.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>Any Borrower Entity fails, as of any relevant date of determination, to perform or observe any of its obligations under any term, covenant or agreement set forth in any Security Document to which it is a party.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Other Breaches Under Financing Documents</u>. Any Borrower Entity or any Major Project Participant shall fail to perform or observe any covenant, or any other term or obligation under this Agreement or any other Financing Document to which it is a party (other than those described in clauses (a)-<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(d) above</u>), in each case, where such failure to perform or observe has not been remedied within the relevant cure period, if any, specified for such covenant, term or obligation in such Financing Document, or if no cure period is specified, thirty (30) days following such failure. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Breach or Default Under Major Project Documents</u></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>Any Borrower Entity shall fail to perform or observe any covenant or any other term or obligation under any Major Project Document to which it is a party, and such breach or default shall continue unremedied beyond any applicable cure period set forth therein, or if no cure period is specified, thirty (30) days following such failure.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">103</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font covenant or any other material term or obligation under any Major Project Document to which it is a party, and such breach or default shall continue unremedied beyond any applicable cure period set forth therein, or if no cure period is specified, thirty (30) days following such failure.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Material Breach or Default Under Project Documents</u>. Any Borrower Entity shall fail to perform or observe any material covenant or any other material term or obligation under any Project Document (that is not a Major Project Document) to which it is a party, and such breach or default shall continue unremedied beyond any applicable cure period set forth therein, or if no cure period is specified, thirty (30) days following such failure.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Borrower Default Under Other Indebtedness</u>. Any Borrower Entity (other than a Passive Sponsor) shall default in the payment of any principal, interest or other amount due under any agreement or instrument evidencing, or under which such Borrower Entity has outstanding at any time, any Indebtedness for Borrowed Money (other than the Guaranteed Loans) in an amount in excess of (i) in the case of the Borrower, [***] (ii) in the case of each Sponsor other than a Passive Sponsor, [***]; or (iii) in the case of any Borrower Entity other than a Passive Sponsor, [***], and, in each case, for a period beyond any applicable grace period, or any other default occurs under any such agreement or instrument, if the effect of such default is to accelerate, or to permit the acceleration of, the maturity of such Indebtedness for Borrowed Money. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><a name="_Ref140235461"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Unenforceability, Termination, Repudiation or Transfer of Any Transaction Documents</u>. Any Financing Document, any Major Project Document or any Project Documents (to the extent it is not a Major Project Document, solely to the extent that such event results in a Material Adverse Effect) at any time and for any reason: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>is or becomes invalid, illegal, void or unenforceable or any party thereto has repudiated or disavowed or taken any action to challenge the validity or enforceability of such agreement;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>except as otherwise expressly permitted hereunder, ceases to be in full force and effect except at the stated termination date thereof, or shall be assigned or otherwise transferred or terminated by any party thereto prior to the repayment in full of all Secured Obligations (other than with the prior written consent of DOE); or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>is suspended, revoked or terminated (other than upon expiration in accordance with its terms when fully performed). </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Security Interests</u>. Any of the Security Documents shall fail in any respect to provide the Liens, security interests, rights, titles, interests, remedies, powers or privileges intended to be created thereby (including the priority intended to be created thereby) or such Lien shall fail to have the priority contemplated therefor in such Security Documents, or any such Security Document or Lien shall cease to be in full force and effect, or the validity thereof or the applicability thereof to the Advances, the Secured Obligations or any other obligations purported to be secured or guaranteed thereby or any part thereof, shall be disaffirmed by or on behalf of any Borrower Entity or any other Person party thereto (other than the Secured Parties).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(k)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Governmental Approvals and Required Approvals</u>. (i) Any Borrower Entity shall fail to obtain, renew, maintain or comply in all material respects with any Required Approval; (ii) or any such Required Approval shall be rescinded, terminated, suspended, modified, withdrawn or withheld or shall be determined to be invalid or shall cease to be in full force and effect other than any Required Approvals that by their nature are no longer needed for the construction, completion, ownership, operation </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">104</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;font-weight:normal;">or maintenance of the Project; or (iii) any proceedings shall be commenced by or before any Governmental Authority for the purposes of rescinding, terminating, suspending, modifying, withdrawing or withholding any such Required Approval and such proceeding is not: (A) dismissed within sixty (60) days of institution, including as a result of satisfaction of any judgment or settlement of any claim that does not otherwise separately result in an Event of Default hereunder; and (B) diligently contested or appealed by any Borrower Entity.</font></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(l)</font><a name="_Ref109242446"></a><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Bankruptcy; Insolvency; Dissolution</u></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Involuntary Bankruptcy; Etc.</u><font style="white-space:pre-wrap;"> </font>The commencement of an Insolvency Proceeding against any Borrower Entity or any Specified Major Project Participant and such proceeding continues undismissed for thirty (30) days.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Voluntary Bankruptcy; Etc.</u>The institution by any Borrower Entity or any Specified Major Project Participant of any Insolvency Proceeding, or the admission by it in writing of its inability to pay its Indebtedness generally as it becomes due or its general failure to pay its Indebtedness as it becomes due, or any other event has occurred that under any Applicable Law would have an effect analogous to any of those events listed above, or any action is taken by any such Person for the purpose of effecting any of the foregoing.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Dissolution</u>. The dissolution of any Borrower Entity or any Specified Major Project Participant.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(m)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Attachment</u>. An attachment or analogous process is levied or enforced upon or issued against any of the assets of any Borrower Entity (other than a Passive Sponsor) other than, for the avoidance of doubt, any Permitted Lien, which (i) in the case of the Borrower, is in excess of [***]; and (ii) in the case of any Sponsor other than a Passive Sponsor, is in excess of [***]; and (iii) with respect to any other any Borrower Entity (other than a Passive Sponsor), is in excess of [***]; or, in any case, has or could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(n)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Judgments</u>. One or more Governmental Judgments shall be entered (i) against any Borrower Entity (other than a Passive Sponsor) and such Governmental Judgments have not been vacated, discharged or stayed or bonded pending appeal for any period of thirty (30) days, and the aggregate amount of all such Governmental Judgments outstanding at any time (except to the extent any applicable insurer(s) have acknowledged liability therefor) exceeds: (A) in the case of the Borrower, [***]; and (B) in the case of any Sponsor other than a Passive Sponsor, [***]; and (C) in the case of any other Borrower Entity (other than a Passive Sponsor), [***]; or (ii) such Governmental Judgment is in the form of an injunction or similar form of relief that is not satisfied or discharged requiring suspension or abandonment of operation of the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(o)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Construction and Operation</u>. Any of the following occurs: </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the Physical Completion Date shall have not occurred by the corresponding Physical Completion Longstop Date; the Project Completion Date shall not have occurred by the Project Completion Longstop Date;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>failure to satisfy certain mechanical, technical and operational specifications resulting in material, chronic underperformance of the Project as against production assumptions set out in the Base Case Financial Model; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>at any time prior to the Project Completion, DOE (in consultation with the Independent Engineer) determines that the remaining Project Costs exceed the total funding available to the </div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">105</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;">Borrower under the Financing Documents, the Base Equity Commitment (including amounts projected to be paid from the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account pursuant to the latest Base Case Financial Model) and the Phase 2 Equity Instrument, and the Borrower fails within sixty (60) consecutive days after receiving written notice thereof from DOE to arrange for the provision of the requisite funds (through Additional Equity Contribution) on terms and conditions and from parties reasonably acceptable to DOE; or &#160;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>the Borrower shall: (A) cease to have the right to possess or use the Project; (B) cease to have the right to possess or use any portion of the Project Site or any rights granted to it under any of the Project Documents; or (C)&#160;lose a material right of way, easement or other right of use or access to land necessary for the Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(p)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Environmental and Health and Safety Matters</u></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">(i) Any Adverse Proceeding alleging violation of any Environmental Law or asserting any Environmental Claim has been threatened in writing or instituted against any Borrower Entity or in relation to the Project, or (ii) any Governmental Judgment imposing a penalty, monetary damages, remediation requirements or restrictions of construction or operations of the Project is issued relating to any violation of Environmental Law, violation of the terms or conditions or any Required Approval issued under any Environmental Law or restricting the use of any such Required Approval in any material respect, and such Adverse Proceeding or Governmental Judgment is not (A) dismissed within sixty (60)&#160;days of institution, including as a result of satisfaction of any judgment or settlement of any claim that does not otherwise result in an Event of Default hereunder; or (B) subject to a limit of one hundred and eighty (180) days of institution, diligently contested or appealed by the applicable Borrower Entity in accordance with Permitted Contest Conditions; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided,</i> that, to benefit from the cure periods described above, in either case<u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">,</u> the Borrower shall have timely notified DOE of the Adverse Proceeding or Governmental Judgment and consulted in good faith with DOE with respect to its intended response.</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(q)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Event of Loss</u>. A material portion of the Project is destroyed or becomes permanently inoperative as a result of a material Event of Loss, and is not covered by insurance, or not repaired or restored with Loss Proceeds within any time periods required under <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">7.04</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Event of Loss</i>).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(r)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Force Majeure</u>. An Event of Force Majeure shall occur and continue for a period of at least one hundred eighty (180) consecutive days.<i style="color:#1f4e79;font-style:italic;"> </i></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(s)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Changes in Ownership</u>. Any Change of Control. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(t)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">ERISA Events</u>. An ERISA Event shall have occurred that, individually or when aggregated with any other then existing ERISA Event, results in or could reasonably be expected to result in liability to any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate in excess of [***].</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(u)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Certain Governmental Actions</u>. Any Governmental Authority shall (i)&#160;lawfully condemn or assume custody of all of the property or assets (or a substantial part thereof) of any Borrower Entity; or (ii)&#160;take lawful action to displace the management of, or the Equity Interests in, any Borrower Entity.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(v)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Abandonment or Suspension of Project</u>. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>Prior to the Project Completion Date, construction of the Project shall be suspended for a period of thirty (30) consecutive days or forty-five (45) days in the aggregate in any twelve-month period;<i style="color:#1f4e79;font-style:italic;"> </i></div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">106</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>from and after the Project Completion Date ceases to operate for a period of thirty (30) consecutive days or forty-five (45) days in the aggregate in any twelve-month period; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>The Borrower shall abandon, or suspend, agree in writing to abandon or suspend, or make any public statements regarding its intention to abandon, or suspend, the Project (or any Phase thereof), or take any action that could be deemed an &quot;abandonment,&quot; or &quot;suspension&quot;; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iv)</font>Failure to initiate the construction of Phase 2 by October 1, 2026.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(w)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Compliance with International Compliance Directives and Anti-Money Laundering Laws</u>.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>The making of any Advances or the use of the proceeds thereof shall violate or cause any Person, including the Lender, to violate any International Compliance Directives or Anti-Money Laundering Laws or other applicable Anti-Corruption Laws.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>Any violation by any Borrower Entity or any Major Project Participant of any International Compliance Directives or Anti-Money Laundering Laws.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(x)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Offtake Contracts</u>. </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>The failure of the Borrower to have binding Offtake Contracts in full force and effect in an amount sufficient to cover 70% of the then current production of the Project; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>the failure of the Borrower to replace any Major Offtake Contract with a binding Offtake Contract on terms and conditions acceptable to DOE within six (6) months of expiration or termination of such Major Offtake Contract.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(y)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Material Adverse Effect</u>. Any event or condition that has had or could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect shall occur and be continuing.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(z)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Base Cash Equity Reserve Account. </u>The occurrence of ninety (90) consecutive calendar days in which the amount of cash on deposit in the Base Cash Equity Reserve Account is below eighty million Dollars ($80 million).</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(aa)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Reserve Account Funding</u>. Any failure to maintain cash in the Reserve Accounts to their respective required balances as set forth in the Accounts Agreement.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(bb)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Debt Service Reserve Account</u>. Any failure of the relevant Borrower Entities to replenish the Debt Service Reserve Account to its required balance as set forth in the Accounts Agreement within thirty (30) days of falling below such required balance.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(cc)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Intended Purpose</u>. Any material deviation from the intended Project purpose.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(dd)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Use of Proceeds</u>. Use of the proceeds of (i) federal grants, assistance or loans (other than the Guaranteed Loan) or (ii) other funds guaranteed by the Federal Government, in each case, to pay Project Costs.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ee)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Eligible Project</u>. Any act or omission that would cause the Project to fail to be an Eligible Project.</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ff)</font><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Prohibited Person</u>. Any Borrower Entity or Major Project Participant shall be or shall have become a Prohibited Person.</div></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:center;margin:0pt;">107</p></div></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.58%;margin-right:11.58%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.85%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.58%;padding-right:11.58%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:0pt;">For the avoidance of doubt, each clause of this Section 10.01 (Events of Default) shall op-erate independently, and the occurrence of any such event shall constitute an Event of Default.</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 10.02</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338405"></a><a name="_Toc187351083"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Remedies; Waivers</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:72pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.9pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>Upon the occurrence of and during the continuance of an Event of Default, DOE or the Collateral Agent may exercise any one or more of the rights and remedies set forth below:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:108pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>declare all or any portion of the indebtedness and obligations of every type or
