All covenants hereunder and under the other Financing Documents shall be given independent effect so that if a particular action or condition is not permitted by any of such covenants, the fact that it would be permitted by an exception to, or would otherwise be within the limitations of, another covenant shall not avoid the occurrence of a Default or an Event of Default if such action is taken or condition exists.</font></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:69.9pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">Section 11.21</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"><a name="_Toc142338428"></a><a name="_Toc187351106"></a></b><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Marshaling</b><font style="font-weight:normal;">. Neither DOE nor FFB nor any other Secured Party shall be under any obligation to marshal any assets in favor of the Borrower or any other Person or against or in payment of any or all of the Secured Obligations.</font></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><i style="font-style:italic;">[NO FURTHER TEXT ON THIS PAGE; SIGNATURES FOLLOW]</i></p><p style="display:none;font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';line-height:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 8pt 0pt;"><font style="font-size:0pt;font-weight:bold;line-height:1.19;margin-bottom:0pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;display:table;margin-bottom:30pt;min-height:21.3pt;width:100%;"><div style="display:table-cell;vertical-align:bottom;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Cortes</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;padding-top:1pt;border-top:1px solid #000000;margin:0pt;">Name: Hernan T. Cortes</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:10pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;">Title: Director, Loan Origination Division, Loans Program Office</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></td></tr></table></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p><div style="margin-top:12pt;"></div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman Bold';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><b style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-weight:bold;">Definitions</b></div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<a name="_Hlk183175843"></a><b style="font-weight:bold;">Acceptable Bank</b>&quot; means a bank or financial institution or branch office thereof in New York, New York organized under or licensed as a branch under the laws of the United States or any state thereof, which has a rating for its long-term unsecured and unguaranteed Indebtedness of &quot;A-&quot;/Stable outlook or higher by S&amp;P or Fitch or A3 or higher by Moody&#39;s, using the lowest rating of the aforementioned three rating firms.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Acceptable Delivery Method</b>&quot; means, with respect to any certificate, document or other item required to be delivered by an Acceptable Delivery Method hereunder:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>transmission, by an Authorized Transmitter, of such certificate, document or other item in Electronic Format, together with the Transmission Code; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>delivery of a manually executed original of such certificate, document or other item; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>such other delivery method as the Borrower and DOE shall mutually agree.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Accounts Agreement</b><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font> means the Collateral Agency and Accounts Agreement entered into as of the First Advance Date under Tranche 1 by and among the Borrower, DOE, the Collateral Agent and the Depositary Bank.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;">Additional Equity Contributions</b><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font> has the meaning given to such term in the Sponsor Support Agreement. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><a name="_Hlk187179796"></a>&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Additional Major Project Document</b>&#8221; means any Additional Project Document under which (i) the Borrower is reasonably expected to have aggregate obligations or liabilities in excess of five million Dollars ($5,000,000) (as such amount shall be adjusted by inflation) over any rolling twelve (12) month period during its term; or (ii) the breach, non-performance, cancellation or early termination of which has, or could reasonably be expected to materially and adversely affect the Borrower or the Project or otherwise have a Material Adverse Effect.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Additional Project Document</b>&quot; means any contract entered into by the Borrower subsequent to the Execution Date that is necessary for or material to the construction and operation of the Project. </p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Additional Sponsor</b>&#8221; means any Person who becomes a beneficial owner of more than 10% economic or voting securities in Direct Parent; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i> that such Person(s) (x) is not a Prohibited Person, (y) DOE has received all documentation and other information requested by DOE related to &#8220;know your customer&#8221; and other requirements (including, the Anti-Money Laundering Laws) and (z) DOE, in its sole discretion, has approved in writing of such Person(s) becoming an Additional Sponsor.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Advance</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Tranche, an advance of funds by FFB to the Borrower under the FFB Note as may be requested by the Borrower from time to time during the applicable Availability Period.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Advance Date</b>&quot; means the date on which FFB makes any Advance to the Borrower.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Advance Request</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">2.03(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Advance Requests</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Advance Request Approval Notice</b>&quot; means the written notice from DOE located at the end of an FFB Advance Request advising FFB that such FFB Advance Request has been approved by or on behalf of DOE.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Adverse Proceeding</b>&quot; means any action, suit, proceeding (whether administrative, judicial or otherwise), governmental investigation or arbitration at law or in equity, or before or by any Governmental Authority, domestic or foreign or other regulatory body or any arbitrator.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Affiliate</b>&quot; means, as applied to any Person, (a)&#160;any other Person directly or indirectly controlling, controlled by, or under common control with, that Person; and (b)&#160;in addition, in the case of any Person that is an individual, each member of such Person&#39;s immediate family, any trusts or other entities established for the benefit of such Person or any member of such Person&#39;s immediate family and any other Person controlled by any of the foregoing. &#160;For the purposes of this definition, &quot;control&quot; (including, with correlative meanings, the terms &quot;controlling,&quot; &quot;controlled by&quot; and &quot;under common control with&quot;), as applied to any Person, means the possession, directly or indirectly, of the power (i)&#160;to vote ten percent (10%) or more of the securities having ordinary voting power for the election of directors of such Person; or (ii)&#160;to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of that Person, whether through the ownership of voting securities or by contract or otherwise.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Affiliated Major Project Participant</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the definition of &#8220;Borrower Entity.&#8221;</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Agent Fees</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Agents</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Aggregate Capitalized Interest</b>&#8221; means, with respect to any requested Advance, the aggregate amount of interest that has been capitalized and will be capitalized on all Advances then made to the Borrower under all FFB Notes outstanding (including, for the avoidance of doubt, such requested Advance) as determined in accordance with the FFB Notes.<sup style="font-size:8.25pt;vertical-align:top;"> </sup></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Agreed-Upon Procedures Repor</b>t&quot; means a report, in substantially the form of the document titled &quot;Agreed-Upon Procedures Report, &quot; prepared by the Borrower&#8217;s Accountant, as such form may be revised from time to time by the Borrower and the Borrower&#8217;s Accountant with the consent of DOE, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Agreement</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the preamble hereto.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">ALTA</b>&quot; means the American Land Title Association headquartered in Washington D.C.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">ALTA Mortgage Loan Policy</b>&quot; means the policy of title insurance to be issued by the Title Company, in form and substance satisfactory to DOE, with such co-insurers or reinsurers as may be reasonably acceptable to DOE. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Annual Reporting Date</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.02(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Annual Reports</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Anti-Corruption Laws</b>&quot; means all laws concerning or relating to anti-bribery, anti-corruption, and anti-kickback matters in the public or private sector, including the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, as amended, the UK Bribery Act 2010, or any similar laws. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Anti-Money Laundering Laws</b>&quot;<font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;"> means the Currency and Foreign Transactions Reporting Act of 1970 (otherwise known as the Bank Secrecy Act), the USA PATRIOT Act, the Anti-Money Laundering Act of 2020, the Money Laundering Control Act, the rules and regulations thereunder and any similar Applicable Laws relating to money laundering, terrorist financing, or financial recordkeeping and recording requirements administered or enforced by any United States of America governmental agency, or any other jurisdiction in which the Borrower operates or conducts business.</font></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Applicable Law</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Person, any constitution, statute, law, rule, regulation, code, ordinance, treaty, judgment, order or any published directive, guideline, requirement or other governmental rule or restriction which has the force of law, by or from a court, arbitrator or other Governmental Authority having jurisdiction over such Person or any of its properties, whether in effect as of the date of this Agreement or as of any date hereafter.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Applicable Regulations</b>&quot; means the final regulations with respect to Title XVII at 10 CFR Part 609 (2024), and any other applicable regulations from time to time promulgated to implement Title XVII.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;"> Applicant</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Applicable Regulations.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Application</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the preliminary statements.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Approved Construction Changes</b>&quot; means:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>any Construction Change that (i)&#160;has been submitted in writing by the Borrower to DOE (including an explanation in reasonable detail of the reasons for such Construction Change) and (ii)&#160;has received a written approval from DOE;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>any allocation of Budgeted Contingencies to Project Costs set forth in the Construction Budget; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>Construction Changes that are in the Ordinary Course of Business and do not exceed seven hundred fifty thousand Dollars ($750,000) individually, and two million five hundred thousand Dollars ($2,500,000) in the aggregate during any twelve (12) month period.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Authorized Transmitter</b>&quot; means, with respect to delivery of documentation: (a) by any Borrower Entity to DOE, the list of individuals designated as Authorized Transmitters set forth in the relevant certificate delivered pursuant to Sections <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">5.01(f)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Organizational Documents</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">5.01(d)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Transaction </i></p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;"><i style="font-style:italic;">Documents</i>) <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">5.03(aa)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">IE&#8217;s Certificate</i>), <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">5.04(u)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">IE&#8217;s Certificate</i>) and <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">5.05(y)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">IE&#8217;s Certificate)</i>, as applicable, delivered by such Borrower Entity or the Independent Engineer, as applicable, to DOE prior to the Execution Date, as updated or modified, with the consent of DOE, from time to time; and (b) to FFB, each of the individuals listed on the certificate specifying authorized Borrower Officials.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Availability Period</b>&quot; means with respect to each Tranche (unless limited expressly to a Tranche), the period commencing on the Execution Date until and including the earliest of:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>(i) for Tranche 1, April 9, 2025, and (ii) for Tranche 2, April 30, 2030;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>for Tranche 2, October 1, 2026 if the First Advance Date for Tranche 2 has not occurred on or before such date; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>the date that the Maximum Tranche Amount for such Tranche is fully disbursed; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>for Tranche 2, the date on which Substantial Completion occurs for the Phase 2; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>the date of termination of obligations to disburse any undisbursed amounts of the Guaranteed Loan following the occurrence of any Event of Default. </div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12pt 0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Bankruptcy Code</b>&quot; means Title 11 of the United States Code, 11 U.S.C. &#167;&#167; 101, et seq, as amended.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><a name="_Hlk183176046"></a>&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Base Case Financial Model</b>&quot; means a mechanically sound financial model prepared by the Borrower in good faith, showing financial projections and underlying assumptions for the Project believed by the Borrower to be reasonable, in Excel form and otherwise in accordance with the Transaction Documents, that are set forth on a quarterly basis, for the period from the Execution Date to a date falling no sooner than twelve (12) months after the Maturity Date, which projections: (a) are consistent with the Construction Budget and Project Milestone Schedule; and (b) are designed to demonstrate, among other things, compliance with the Debt Sizing Parameters and all other financial covenants in the Financing Documents. &#160;References to &quot;Base Case Financial Model&quot; refer to the Original Base Case Financial Model, the Execution Date Base Case Financial Model, the Project Completion Date Base Case Financial Model or any updated Base Case Financial Model approved by DOE in accordance with the Financing Documents. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 36pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Base Cash Equity Reserve Account</b>&#8221; has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Base DSRA Amount</b>&quot; &#160;for any date of determination means the Account Funding Requirement applicable to the Debt Service Reserve Account on such date.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Base Equity Commitment</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Sponsor Support Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Base Equity Contribution</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Sponsor Support Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">BNSF Consent</b>&#8221; means a Consent to Collateral Assignment pursuant to which BNSF Railway Company, a Delaware corporation, has consented to the Borrower granting to the Collateral Agent a collateral interest in the BNSF Sublease.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Capital Expenditures</b>&quot; means all expenditures that should be capitalized in accordance with the Designated Standards.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Capital Lease</b>&quot; means, for any Person, any lease of (or other agreement conveying the right to use) any property of such Person that would be required, in accordance with the Designated Standards, to be capitalized and accounted for as a capital lease on a balance sheet of such Person.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Capital Lease Obligations</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Person, the obligations of such Person to pay rent or other amounts under any lease of (or other arrangement conveying the right to use) real or personal property, or a combination thereof, which obligations are required to be classified and accounted for as capital leases on a balance sheet of such Person under the Designated Standard, and the amount of such obligations shall be the capitalized amount thereof determined in accordance with the Designated Standard.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Cash Equivalents</b>&quot; means any of the following, to the extent owned by the Borrower free and clear of all Liens (other than Liens created under the Security Documents): </p><div style="font-family:'Times New book-entry form on the books of the United States Department of the Treasury) or obligations, the timely payment of principal and interest of which is fully guaranteed by the United States maturing not more than one hundred eighty (180) days from the date of the creation thereof;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New or &quot;P-1&quot; or equivalent by S&amp;P or Moody&#39;s, respectively (or an equivalent rating by another nationally recognized credit rating agency of similar standing if neither of such corporations is then in the business of rating commercial paper), maturing not more than ninety (90) days from the date of creation thereof;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New
