style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Code</b>&quot; means the United States Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time, and the regulations promulgated and rulings issued thereunder.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Collateral</b>&quot; means (a) all real property of the Borrower (including a mortgage or deed of trust on all easements, leasehold and fee interests of the Borrower); (b) all feedstock, inventory and all other personal property and other tangible assets of the Borrower (including all Project Documents and Required Approvals); (c) all intangible assets and intellectual property of the Borrower, including licenses therefor; (d) all cash and investments of the Borrower, whether or not in controlled accounts, including the Project Accounts; (e) all other assets of the Borrower; (f) all equity interests of the Borrower; (which are owned by Direct Parent); (g) all Project assets (e.g., shares in the Project, accounts, inventories, insurance proceeds, key agreements, etc.); and (h) other collateral designated as such by the Borrower and agreed to by DOE<font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">.</font><sup style="font-size:8.25pt;vertical-align:top;"> </sup></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Collateral Agent</b>&quot; means Citibank, N.A., acting through its Agency and Trust business in its capacity as collateral agent for the benefit of the Secured Parties, or any successor collateral agent appointed from time to time pursuant to the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Commercial Operations Date</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 5.01(j)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Project Milestone Schedule</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Commissioning</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 5.01(j)</u>(<i style="font-style:italic;">Project Milestone Schedule</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Commissioning Plan</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 5.01(j)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Project Milestone Schedule</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Community Benefits Plan and Justice40 Annual Report</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 8.02(c)(C) </u>(<i style="font-style:italic;">Labor Reporting and Justice40 Initiative Reporting Requirements</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Company Account</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Compliance Certificate</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">8.01(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Compliance Certificates</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:35.3pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Comptroller General</b>&quot; means Comptroller General of the United States.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:35.3pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Conditional Commitment Letter</b>&#8221; has the meaning given to such term in the preliminary statements.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Construction Budget</b>&quot; means the Initial Construction Budget, as updated, amended or supplemented from time to time pursuant to the terms hereof. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Construction Change</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">9.07(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Approved Construction Changes; Project Milestone Schedule; Budgets</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Construction Contract</b>&quot; means, each of:<sup style="font-size:8.25pt;vertical-align:top;"> </sup></p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>the Construction Management Contracts;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>the Equipment Supply Contracts;</div></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>any other contracts, agreements and other documents, including all material sub-contracts and all related guarantees or other credit support instruments, necessary or appropriate for Project Construction; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>to the extent applicable, one or more construction interface contracts executed by material contractors governing the interface of construction activities on the Project Site and corresponding risk/liability allocation; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>any other document designated as a Construction Contract by the Borrower and DOE.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Construction Contractor</b>&quot; means any party to any Construction Contract, excluding the Borrower.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Construction Management Contract</b>&quot; means a construction management agreement to be entered into between the construction management contractor and the Borrower pursuant to which the construction management contractor agrees to provide construction management services to the Borrower to coordinate all construction activities in accordance with the terms of the Construction Contracts, Required Approvals, Applicable Law and Prudent Industry Practice.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Construction Progress Report</b>&quot; means a monthly summary construction report, certified by the Borrower and the Independent Engineer as correct and not misleading in any material respect, which shall include:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>a detailed assessment of the Project&#39;s performance in comparison with the Construction Budget and Project Milestone Schedule, in each case, then in effect for such period, including:</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>basic data relating to construction of the Project;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(ii)</font>a description and explanation of any Event of Loss, Adverse Proceedings or other material disputes between the Borrower and any Person; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:72pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:33.2pt;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(iii)</font>any material non-compliance with any Required Approval then in effect;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>an updated Project Milestone Schedule and an updated Construction Budget, reflecting any Approved Construction Changes (or certification that no changes or updates are then required);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>a statement that the Project is on schedule to achieve the Project Completion Date by the Project Completion Longstop Date; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>a statement that the aggregate amount expended for each Punch List Item does not exceed the aggregate amount budgeted for such cost in the Construction Budget, except for Approved Construction Changes.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Contest</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Claim</b><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font> means any Tax or any Lien or other claim or payment of any nature.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Contingent Equity Commitment</b>&#8221; has the meaning given to such term in the Sponsor Support Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Contingent Obligations</b>&quot; means, as to any Person, any obligation of such Person with respect to any Indebtedness (&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">primary obligations</b>&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">) </b>of any other Person (the &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">primary obligor</b>&quot;) in any manner, </p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">whether directly or indirectly, including any obligation of such Person, whether or not contingent, as a guarantee or otherwise:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>for the purchase, payment or discharge of any such primary obligation;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>to purchase, repurchase or otherwise acquire such primary obligations or any property constituting direct or indirect security therefor, including the obligation to make take or pay or similar payments;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>to advance or supply funds;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>to maintain working capital or equity capital of the primary obligor or otherwise to maintain the net worth or solvency or any balance sheet item, level of income or financial condition of the primary obligor;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>to purchase property, securities or services primarily for the purpose of assuring the holder of any such primary obligation of the ability of the primary obligor to make payment of such primary obligation; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>otherwise to assure or hold harmless the holder of such primary obligation against loss in respect thereof, including with respect to letter of credit obligations, swap agreements, foreign exchange contracts and other similar agreements (including agreements relating to derivative instruments),</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><i style="font-style:italic;">provided, </i>that, (i) the term &quot;Contingent Obligation&quot; shall not include endorsements of instruments for deposit or collection in the Ordinary Course of Business; and (ii) the amount of any Contingent Obligation shall be deemed to be an amount equal to the stated or determinable amount of the primary obligation in respect of which such Contingent Obligation is made or, if not stated or determinable, the maximum anticipated liability in respect thereof (assuming such Person is required to perform thereunder) as determined by such Person in good faith.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Contractual Obligation</b>&quot; means, as to any Person, any provision of any security issued by such Person or of any agreement, instrument or other undertaking to which such Person is a party or by which it or any of its property is bound.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Control</b>&quot; means the power, directly or indirectly, to direct or cause the direction of the management or business or policies of a Person (whether through the ownership of voting securities or partnership or other ownership interests, by contract, or otherwise); and the words &quot;Controlling,&quot; &quot;Controlled,&quot; and similar constructions shall have corresponding meanings. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Copyrights</b>&quot; means any and all (a) copyright rights in any work subject to copyright laws of the United States or any other jurisdiction, whether as author, assignee, transferee or otherwise, including Mask Works (as defined under 17 U.S.C. &#167; 901 of the U.S. Copyright Act)(in each case, whether registered or unregistered); (b) registrations and applications for registration of any such copyrights, including registrations, extensions, renewals recordings, supplemental registrations and pending applications for registration in the United States Copyright Office or any foreign equivalent office; and (c) other Copyrights as set out in Schedule A of the IP Security Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Cost Overrun</b>&quot; means any actual aggregate costs of achieving Substantial Completion in excess of the total amount of Project Costs set forth in the Construction Budget delivered as of the Execution Date (excluding any costs incurred and paid for prior to the start date of the Construction Budget and not counted </p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">towards the Base Equity Commitment), including (a) any liquidated damages payable by the Borrower under any Project Document; (b) any Debt Service and other costs and expenses under the Financing Documents; and (c) all other costs, expenses and liabilities incurred as a result of any delay in achieving Substantial Completion.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">CPA Goods</b>&quot; means any equipment, materials or commodities procured, contracted or obtained for the Project, &#160;the cost of which has been or is projected to be paid or reimbursed with proceeds of any Advance, and that may be transported by ocean vessel.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Credit Subsidy Cost</b>&quot; means the &quot;cost of a direct loan,&quot; as defined in Section&#160;502(5)(B) of FCRA.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Currency of Denomination</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">11.06</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Judgment Currency</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<a name="_Hlk183176391"></a><b style="font-weight:bold;">Data Protection Laws</b>&quot; means any and all foreign or domestic (including U.S. federal, state and local) Applicable Laws relating to the privacy, security, notification of breaches, Processing of any data or information that identifies or can be used to identify an individual, household or device, whether directly or indirectly, in each case, in any manner applicable to any Borrower Entity or any of its Subsidiaries.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Davis-Bacon Act</b>&quot; means Subchapter IV of Chapter 31 of Part A of Subtitle II of Title&#160;40 of the United States Code, including and as implemented by the regulations set forth in Parts&#160;1, 3 and 5 of title 29 of the Code of Federal Regulations.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Davis-Bacon Act Covered Contract</b>&quot; means any contract, agreement or other arrangement for the construction, alteration or repair (within the meaning of Section 276a of the Davis-Bacon Act and 29 C.F.R. 5.2) of all or any portion of the Project.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Davis-Bacon Act Requirements</b>&quot; the requirement that all laborers and mechanics employed by contractors and subcontractors in the performance of construction work financed in whole or in part by the Guaranteed Loan shall be paid wages at rates not less than those prevailing on projects of a character similar in the locality as determined by the Secretary of Labor in accordance with the Davis-Bacon Act, and all regulations related thereto, including those set forth in 29 CFR 5.5, and all notice, reporting and other obligations related thereto as required by DOE, including the obligations under <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 8.02(b)(vi)</u> (Labor Reporting and Justice40 Initiative Reporting Requirements) and the inclusion of the provisions in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit G</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act Contract Provisions</i>) and the appropriate wage determination(s) of the Secretary of Labor in each Davis-Bacon Act Covered. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DBA Compliance Matter</b>&quot; means any deviation from compliance with the applicable Davis-Bacon Act Requirements.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DBA Compliance Matter Contractor</b>&quot; means the DBA Contract Party that is party to the Davis-Bacon Act Covered Contract giving rise to the DBA Compliance Matter.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DBA Contract Party</b>&quot; means any contractor, subcontractor (including any lower tier subcontractor) or other Person (other than any Borrower Entity) that is party to a Davis-Bacon Act Covered Contract.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DBA</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Holdback Account</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DBA</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Holdback Amount</b>&quot; means the sum of (a) the aggregate amount of back wages determined from time to time by DOL, or any office thereof, as being due and payable to any employees of DBA Contract Parties as a result of any violation of the Davis-Bacon Act Requirements, whether or not such determination has become final, and which back wages have not been paid in full to such employees or determined by a final action of DOL to not be payable to such employees; and (b) any other amount otherwise required to be withheld in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;"> G</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Davis-Bacon Act Contract Provisions</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Debarment Regulations</b>&quot; means all of the following: (a) Subpart 9.4 (Debarment, Suspension, and Ineligibility) of the Federal Acquisition Regulations, 48 C.F.R. 9.400&#8211;9.409; and (b) the Government-wide Debarment and Suspension (Non-procurement) regulations (Common Rule), 2 C.F.R. 200.214 implementing Executive Orders 12549 and 12689, and 2 C.F.R. Part 180, as supplemented by 2&#160;C.F.R. Part 901. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Debt Service</b><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font> means, with respect to any period, the sum of (a)&#160;principal, interest, fees and other amounts paid or to be paid under the Financing Documents and (b) all other payments made or to be made with respect to other Indebtedness for Borrowed Money of the Borrower.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Debt Service Coverage Ratio</b><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font> means (a) the Historical Debt Service Coverage Ratio; or (b) the Projected Debt Service Coverage Ratio, as applicable.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font><b style="font-weight:bold;text-decoration-color:#000000;">Debt Service Reserve Account</b><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font> has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Debt Sizing Parameters</b>&quot; has the meaning as set out in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">2.07(a)</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(v)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Determination of Advance Amounts</i>). </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Debt to Equity Ratio</b>&quot; has the meaning set out in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 5.04(pp)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Debt to Equity Ratio</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Default</b>&quot; means any event or circumstance that with the giving of notice, the lapse of time, or both would become an Event of Default.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Depositary Bank</b>&quot; means Citibank, N.A., acting through its Agency and Trust business in its capacity as depositary bank, or any successor account bank appointed from to time to time pursuant to the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Designated Standard</b>&quot; means:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>with respect to the Borrower, GAAP or IFRS (<i style="font-style:italic;">provided,</i> that, unless such standards are GAAP, any Financial Statements prepared in accordance therewith shall include a reconciliation to GAAP, certified by the Borrower&#39;s Accountant); and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>with respect to any Person other than the Borrower, any of GAAP, IFRS or other applicable and appropriate generally accepted accounting principles to which such Person is subject and that may be applicable thereto from time to time.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Direct Agreement</b>&quot; means each direct agreement entered into between a Major Project Participant and the Collateral Agent in respect of each Major Project Document, in form and substance acceptable to DOE.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Direct Parent</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the preamble hereto.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:35.3pt;margin:0pt;"><font style="margin-top:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:35.3pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Disclosure Form to Report Lobbying</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;5.01(ee)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Lobbying Certification</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Disposition</b>&quot; means, with respect to any property or assets, any single or series of related sales, transfers, conveyances, leases, licenses or other dispositions thereof, and the terms &quot;Dispose&quot; and &quot;Disposed of&quot; shall have correlative meanings; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that the term &quot;Disposition&quot; shall not include the creation or existence of any Permitted Lien, so long as no ownership is transferred to any party pursuant thereto.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOE</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the preamble hereto.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOE Default Interest Rate</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 4.01(e)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOE Extraordinary Expenses</b>&quot; means, in connection with any technical, financial, legal or other difficulty experienced by the Project (e.g. engineering failure or financial workouts) that requires DOE to incur time or expenses (including third party expenses) beyond standard monitoring and administration of the Financing Documents, the amounts that DOE determines are required to: (a) reimburse DOE&#39;s additional internal administrative costs (including any costs to determine whether an amendment or modification would be required that could constitute a &quot;modification&quot; (as defined in Section 502(9) of FCRA)); and (b)&#160;any related fees and expenses of the Secured Party Advisors to the extent not paid directly by on or behalf of the Borrower.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOE Guarantee</b>&#8221; has the meaning given to such term in the preamble hereto.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOE Guarantee Payment</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;4.01(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Reimbursement and Other Payment Obligations</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">DOL</b>&quot; means the United States Department of Labor.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Dollars</b>&quot; or &quot;USD&quot; or &quot;$&quot; means the lawful currency of the United States.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Drawstop Notice</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">2.04(c)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Drawstop Notices</i>) and <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit B</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form of Drawstop Notice</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<a name="_Hlk183176632"></a><b style="font-weight:bold;">EBITDA</b>&quot; means, for any period, (a) Net Income (before extraordinary or other nonrecurring items) for such period, plus (b) to the extent deducted in determining Net Income for such period, the sum of (i) Interest Expense, plus (ii) Taxes, plus (iii) depreciation and amortization. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Electronic Certified Payroll System</b>&#8221; means any electronic certified payroll reporting software that is compliant with the certified payroll requirements outlined in 29 CFR 5.5(a)(3)(ii).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Electronic Format</b>&quot; means an unalterable electronic format (including Portable Document Format (.pdf)) with a reproduction of signatures where required or such other format as shall be mutually agreed between the Borrower and DOE.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Electronic Signature</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 11.18</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Counterparts; Electronic Signature</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Eligible Project</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Applicable Regulations.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Eligible Project Costs</b>&quot; means Project Costs that satisfy each of the following conditions: (a) DOE has determined the Project Costs to be &quot;eligible costs&quot; in accordance with Section 609.2 and 609.10 of the Applicable Regulations; (b) the Project Costs have not been paid and are not expected to be paid any time after the First Advance Date with (i) any federal grants, assistance, or loans (excluding the Guaranteed Loan); or (ii) other funds guaranteed by the Federal Government; (c) the Project Costs are identified in the Construction Budget; and (d) the Project Costs do not constitute Cost Overruns. For the avoidance of doubt, (x) costs incurred in preparation of the Project Site and construction of the external shells of building infrastructure and (y) the initial funding of any Project Account (other than the Debt Service Reserve Account) to its Account Funding Requirement as set forth in the Accounts Agreement) shall in each case shall not constitute Eligible Project Costs.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Emergency</b>&quot; means an unforeseeable event, circumstance or condition (including as a result of an Event of Loss), that in the good faith judgment of the Borrower (and subsequently confirmed by the Independent Engineer using information and facts that were available to the Borrower at the time that the applicable mitigation measures were implemented) necessitates the taking of immediate measures to prevent or mitigate: (a) a life threatening situation, safety, environmental or regulatory non-compliance concern, including breach of any Applicable Law; or (b) to prevent or mitigate an event or circumstance not known or reasonably foreseeable prior to the preparation of the O&amp;M Budget. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Emergency Operating Costs</b>&quot; means those amounts required to be expended in order to prevent or mitigate an Emergency; <i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that such expenditures are either: (a) payable under an insurance policy (in an aggregate amount not to exceed five million Dollars ($5,000,000) in any twelve (12) month period); (b) payable by insurance or a warranty provided under any Project Document (in an aggregate amount not to exceed five million Dollars ($5,000,000) in any twelve (12) month period); or (c) in an amount that does not exceed five million Dollars ($5,000,000) in any twelve (12) month period. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Employee Benefit Plan</b>&quot; means, collectively, (a)&#160;all &quot;employee benefit plans&quot; (as defined in Section&#160;3(3) of ERISA) including any Multiemployer Plans which are or at any time have been maintained or sponsored by any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate or to which any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate has ever made, or been obligated to make, contributions or with respect to which any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate has incurred or is likely to incur any liability or obligation, and (b)&#160;all Pension Plans.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Environmental Assessment</b>&quot; means the environmental review completed under the NEPA for this Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Environmental Claim</b>&quot; means any and all obligations, liabilities, losses, abatements, administrative, regulatory or judicial actions, suits, demands, decrees, claims, liens, judgments, notices of noncompliance or violation, investigations, proceedings, clean-up, removal or remedial actions or orders, or damages (foreseeable and unforeseeable, including consequential and punitive damages) or penalties relating in any way to any Environmental Law or any Governmental Approval issued under any such Environmental Law, including (a)&#160;any and all Indemnity Claims by any Governmental Authority for enforcement, clean-up, removal, response, remedial or other actions or damages pursuant to any applicable Environmental Law, and (b)&#160;any and all Indemnity Claims by any third party seeking damages, contribution, indemnification, cost recovery, compensation or injunctive relief resulting from Hazardous Substances, the violation or alleged violation of any Environmental Law or the violation or alleged violation of any Governmental Approval issued thereunder, or arising from alleged injury or threat of injury to human health, safety or the environment.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Environmental Consultant</b>&quot; means ERM, Kleinfelder, ICF, or such other Person appointed from time to time by DOE to act as environmental consultant in connection with the Project.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Environmental Laws</b>&quot; means any and all foreign, Federal, state, provincial, local or municipal laws, rules, orders, regulations, statutes, ordinances, codes, decrees, requirements of any Governmental Authority or other Applicable Law (including common law) regulating, relating or imposing liability or standards of conduct concerning <a name="one"></a>(i) protection of human health or safety (as it relates to exposure to Hazardous Substances), the environment or natural resources; or <a name="two"></a>(ii) the presence, Release or threatened Release, generation, use, management, handling, transportation, treatment, storage, or disposal of Hazardous Substances, in each case of clause <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(i)</u> and <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(ii)</u> as now or may at any time hereafter be in effect.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">EPC Contract</b>&quot; means a single agreement with a contractor or multiple agreements with contractors responsible for the engineering, procurement, and construction activities required for the Project.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equipment Supplier</b>&quot; shall have the meaning given to such term in the Security Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equipment Supply Contract</b>&quot; means an agreement outlining the delivery of equipment required for the project as outlined in the EPC contracts.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Contribution</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Sponsor Support Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equity </b><b style="font-weight:bold;">Contribution</b><b style="font-weight:bold;"> Account</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Document</b>&quot; means each of:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>the Sponsor Support Agreement;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>each other agreement between any Sponsor and DOE regarding the Borrower or the Project; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>each other agreement pursuant to which any Sponsor agrees to any obligations, conditions, representations or covenants in relation to the Project.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Interests</b>&quot; means any and all shares, interests, participations or other equivalents (however designated) of capital stock of a corporation, any and all equivalent ownership interests, including partnership interests, limited liability interests and trust beneficial interests, in a Person (other than a corporation) and any and all warrants, rights or options to purchase any of the foregoing and all rights (including, but not limited to, voting rights), and interests with respect to or derived from such equity interest. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Owner</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Person, another Person holding Equity Interests in such first Person.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Pledge Agreement</b>&quot; means the Equity Pledge Agreement entered into as of the First Advance Date under Tranche 1 between the Direct Parent and the Collateral Agent in respect of the Direct Parent&#8217;s Equity Interests in the Borrower. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">ERISA</b>&quot; means the United States Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended from time to time, and the regulations promulgated and rulings issued thereunder.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">ERISA Affiliate</b>&quot; means any person, trade or business (whether or not incorporated) that would be deemed at any relevant time to be: (a) a single employer with a Borrower Entity under Section 414(b), (c), (m) or (o) of the Code; or (b) under common control with a Borrower Entity under Section 4001 of ERISA.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">ERISA Event</b>&quot; means:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font><a name="_Ref130505741"></a>a reportable event as defined in Section&#160;4043 of ERISA with respect to a Pension Plan, excluding, however, such events as to which the PBGC by regulation has waived the requirement of Section&#160;4043(a) of ERISA that it be notified within thirty (30) days of the occurrence of such event. &#160;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the existence of a failure to meet the minimum funding standard of Section&#160;412 of the Code or Section&#160;302 of ERISA with respect to any Pension Plan shall be a reportable event for the purposes of this paragraph <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">(a)</u> regardless of the issuance of any waiver;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>a withdrawal by any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate from a Pension Plan or the termination of any Pension Plan resulting in liability under Sections&#160;4063 or 4064 of ERISA;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>the withdrawal of any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate in a complete or partial withdrawal (within the meaning of Sections 4201,&#160;4203 and 4205 of ERISA) from any Multiemployer Plan if there is any liability with respect to such withdrawal, or the receipt by any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate of notice from any Multiemployer Plan that it is insolvent within the meaning of Section&#160;4245 of ERISA;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>the filing of a notice of intent to terminate any Pension Plan, or the treatment of a plan amendment as a termination, or the termination of any Pension Plan under Section 4041 or 4042 of ERISA, or the termination of any Multiemployer Plan under Section 4041A of ERISA; or the commencement of proceedings by the PBGC to terminate, or to appoint a trustee to administer, a Pension Plan or Multiemployer Plan;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>the present value of all non-forfeitable accrued benefits under any Pension Plan (using the actuarial assumptions utilized by the PBGC upon termination of an employee pension benefit plan subject to Title IV of ERISA) (in the opinion of DOE) materially exceeding the fair market value of the Pension Plan&#39;s assets allocable to such benefits, all determined as of the most recent valuation date for each such Pension Plan;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>the imposition of liability on any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate pursuant to Sections 4062(e) or 4069 of ERISA or by reason of the application of Section&#160;4212(c) of ERISA;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>the failure by the Borrower or an ERISA Affiliate to make any required contribution under Section 412 or 430 of the Code to an Employee Benefit Plan, the failure to meet the minimum funding standard of Section&#160;302 of ERISA or Section 412 of the Code with respect to any Pension Plan (whether or not waived), the failure to make by its due date a required installment under Section&#160;303(j) of ERISA or Section 430(j) of the Code with respect to any Pension Plan or the failure to make any required contribution to a Multiemployer Plan under Section 304 of ERISA or Section 431 of the Code;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font>an event or condition that would reasonably be expected to constitute grounds under Section&#160;4042 of ERISA for the termination of, or the appointment of a trustee to administer, any Pension Plan or Multiemployer Plan;</div></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New
