style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>the imposition of any liability under Title I or Title&#160;IV of ERISA (other than PBGC premiums due but not delinquent under Section&#160;4007 of ERISA) upon any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font>an application for a funding waiver under Section&#160;302(c) of ERISA or Section&#160;412(c) of the Code with respect to any Pension Plan;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(k)</font>the imposition of any lien on any of the rights, properties or assets of any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate, or the posting of a bond or other security by of such entities, in either case pursuant to Title&#160;I or IV of ERISA or to Section 412, 430, or 436 of the Code;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(l)</font>the making of any amendment to any Pension Plan that could directly result in the imposition of a lien or the posting of a bond or other security;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(m)</font>the occurrence of a non-exempt prohibited transaction (within the meaning of Section&#160;4975 of the Code or Section&#160;406 of ERISA);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(n)</font>the determination that an Employee Benefit Plan&#39;s qualification or tax-exempt status under Section 401(a) of the Code has been or could be revoked;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(o)</font>a determination that any Employee Benefit Plan is, or is expected to be, in &quot;at risk&quot; status (within the meaning of Section 303(i)(4) of ERISA or Section 430(i)(4) of the Code);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(p)</font>the receipt by any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate of any notice of the imposition of withdrawal liability or of a determination that a Multiemployer Plan is, or is expected to be, in &quot;endangered&quot; or &quot;critical&quot; status within the meaning of Section 305 of ERISA or Section 432 of the Code; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(q)</font>the occurrence of any Foreign Plan Event.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<a name="_Hlk183176762"></a><b style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Default</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">10.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Events of Default</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Force Majeure</b>&quot; means an event or circumstance beyond the reasonable control of, and not the result of the fault or negligence of, the Borrower, and that could not have been prevented by the exercise of reasonable diligence by the Borrower, including any act of God, fire, flood, severe weather, epidemic, equipment failure, failure or delay in issuance of Governmental Approvals (but which Governmental Approval Borrower must be using commercially reasonable efforts to obtain) or other acts or inaction of Governmental Authorities (but which act or inaction the Borrower must be using commercially reasonable efforts to contest or reverse), change in Applicable Law, default by suppliers or contractors, quarantine restriction, explosion, sabotage, strike or other material labor disruption, act of war, act or threat of terrorism or riot or civil commotion.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Loss</b>&quot; means any condemnation, expropriation or taking (including by any Governmental Authority) of any portion of the Project or Collateral, or any other event that causes any portion of the Project or the Collateral to be damaged, destroyed or rendered unfit for normal use for any reason whatsoever, including through a failure of title (or defect therein) or any damage, destruction or loss of such property. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Excess Advance Amount</b>&quot; means, on any date of determination with respect to any Advance under the FFB Note, an amount equal to the total proceeds of such Advance that were (a)&#160;applied by the Borrower to reimburse itself for applicable Project Costs incurred and paid but which did not constitute </p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">Eligible Project Costs relating to the FFB Note for which such Advance was sought; or (b) not applied by the Borrower to pay Eligible Project Costs incurred and invoiced relating to the FFB Notes for which such Advance was sought.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Excess Guaranteed Loan Amount</b>&quot; means, with respect to each Tranche, the amount by which the aggregate principal amount of all Advances made under the FFB Note applicable to such Tranche exceeds the applicable Maximum Tranche Amount, the aggregate capitalized interest under the FFB Note exceeds the Maximum Capitalized Interest Amount or the aggregate amount of each Advance otherwise exceeds the Debt Sizing Parameters.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Execution</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Date</b>&quot; means the date on which all of the conditions precedent set out in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">5.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Conditions Precedent to the Execution Date</i>) have been satisfied or waived and the Guaranteed Loan is fully executed and delivered by all parties thereto. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Execution Date Base Case Financial Model</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 5.01(i)(ii)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Base Case Financial Model</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Existing Credit Facility</b>&#8221; means each of the agreements listed in Schedule 6.01 (<i style="font-style:italic;">Existing Credit Facilities</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Extraordinary</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Amount</b>&quot; means any cash or other amounts or receipts received by, on behalf of or on account of the Borrower or, to the extent received in connection with the Project, any Borrower Entity, not in the Ordinary Course of Business, including (a) indemnification payments; (b) any cash or other receipts in the nature of indemnification payments under or in respect of any acquisition documentation or any related documentation; and (c) any judgment or settlement proceeds, or other consideration of any kind received in connection with any cause of action or proceeding, other than, in each case, cash or other amounts or receipts received in connection with the proceedings set forth on Schedule 6.08. To the extent any such cash, amounts or receipts are received by any other Borrower Entity in connection with the Project, the Borrower shall cause such cash, amounts or receipts to be transmitted to the Borrower and applied as Extraordinary Amounts hereunder.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Facility Fee</b>&quot; means a facility fee equal to eight million six hundred thirty-nine thousand eight hundred sixteen Dollars and fifty four cents ($8,639,816.54), to be paid by the Borrower to DOE on the Execution Date.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FCRA</b>&quot; means the Federal Credit Reform Act of 1990, P.L. 101-508, 104 Stat. 1388-609 (1990), as amended by P.L. 105-33, 111 Stat. 692 (1997).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Federal Funding</b>&quot; means any funds obtained from the United States or any agency or instrumentality thereof, including funding under any other loan program.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Feedstock</b>&quot; means fats, oils, and greases in a form and amount that can be processed by the Project.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Feedstock Supplier</b>&quot; means (a) each entity listed on Part C of <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 5.01(d)(ii)-2</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Major Project Documents; Specified Major Project Participant; Feedstock Supplier</i>) or other feedstock provider approved by DOE prior to the Effective Date, or (b) with respect to any feedstock agreement entered into by the Borrower following the Effective Date, any feedstock provider in accordance with a feedstock plan or other criteria to be agreed in the Financing Documents or otherwise approved by DOE.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Feedstock Supply Contract</b>&quot; means each feedstock supply arrangement entered into by the Borrower and a Feedstock Supplier.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FFB</b>&quot; means the Federal Financing Bank, an instrumentality of the United States government created by the Federal Financing Bank Act of 1973 that is under the general supervision of the Secretary of the Treasury.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FFB Advance Request</b>&#8221; means the request for Advances required to be delivered pursuant to the terms of the FFB Note, which shall be substantially in the form of Exhibit A (Form of FFB Advance Request) to the FFB Note Purchase Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FFB Commitment</b>&quot; means the commitment of FFB to make FFB Advances to the Borrower pursuant to the terms of the FFB Note Purchase Agreement in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $1,439,969,423.18.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FFB Document</b>&quot; means each of: </p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>the Program Financing Agreement; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>the FFB Note Purchase Agreement; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>the FFB Note; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>the Secretary&#8217;s Instruments; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>any other documents, certificates, and instruments required in connection with the foregoing.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><b style="font-weight:bold;">&#8220;FFB Note</b>&quot; means each promissory note to be issued by the Borrower in favor of FFB in accordance with other FFB Documents to induce FFB to advance funds thereunder to the Borrower, as such note may be amended, supplemented, substituted and restated from time to time in accordance with its terms.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FFB Note Obligations</b>&quot; means, collectively, the unpaid principal of and interest on Advances made under the FFB Note, the FFB Note Reimbursement Obligations and all other obligations and liabilities of the Borrower (including interest accruing at the then applicable rate provided in the FFB Documents after maturity of the relevant Advances and FFB Note Reimbursement Obligations and Post-Petition Interest) to DOE or FFB or any subsequent holder or holders of such FFB Note (on any portion thereof), whether direct or indirect, absolute or contingent, due or to become due, or now existing or hereafter incurred, which may arise under, out of, or in connection with, this Agreement, the FFB Note, the FFB Note Purchase Agreement, the Program Financing Agreement, the Security Documents, or any other document made, delivered or given in connection with any of the foregoing, in each case, whether on account of principal, interest, charges, expenses, fees, attorneys&#39; or other Secured Party Advisors&#39; fees and disbursements, reimbursement obligations, prepayment premiums, indemnities, costs, or otherwise (including all fees and Advances made with respect to the FFB Note of DOE or FFB or any subsequent holder or holders of such FFB Note (or any portion thereof) that are required to be paid by the Borrower pursuant to the terms of any of the foregoing agreements). </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">FFB Note Purchase Agreement</b>&quot; means the FFB Note Purchase Agreement entered into between the Borrower, the Secretary of Energy and FFB prior to the Execution Date.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New means any reimbursement obligations of the Borrower to DOE arising under, out of, pursuant to or in connection with the FFB Note.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New means Global Project Finance Advisory Council. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b treasurer, any vice president of finance or any assistant vice president of finance or any other vice president or assistant vice president with significant responsibility for the financial affairs of such Person.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Financial Statements</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Person, for any period, the balance sheet of such Person as at the end of such period and the related statements of income, stockholders&#39; equity and cash flows for such period and for the period from the beginning of the then-current Fiscal Year to the end of such period, together with all notes thereto and except in the case of the Borrower&#39;s Historical Financial Statements, with comparable figures for the corresponding period of the previous Fiscal Year, each prepared (except where otherwise noted herein) in accordance with the Designated Standard.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Financing style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">First Advance</b>&quot; means, with respect to each Tranche,<b style="font-weight:bold;"> </b>the first advance under such Tranche occurring on the relevant First Advance Date.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">First Advance Date</b>&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;"> </b>means, with respect to each Tranche,<b style="font-weight:bold;"> </b>the date on which the first Advance under such Tranche has been made in accordance with this Agreement. </p><p Date</b>&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;"> </b>means, with respect to:</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New each Tranche, the earlier to occur of (a) the date that the aggregate amount of capitalized interest on all outstanding Advances for such Tranche exceeds the Maximum Capitalized Interest Amount for such Tranche; and (b) the sum of (i) the outstanding principal amount of each Advance under such Tranche; and (ii) aggregated amount of capitalized interest on all outstanding Advances under such Tranche, exceeds the Maximum Guaranteed Loan Amount for such Tranche.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">First Principal Payment Date</b>&quot; means, March 31, 2029. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">First Priority</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Lien purported to be created in any Collateral pursuant to any Security Document, that such Lien:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>is the only Lien to which such Collateral is subject, other than any Permitted Lien; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:35.3pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Fiscal Quarter</b>&quot; means the three (3)-month periods ending on March 31, June 30, September 30 and December 31 of each Fiscal Year.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Fiscal Year</b>&quot; means with respect to:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>the Borrower, the period beginning on January 1 and ending on December 31; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font Ltd.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Foreign Asset Control Regulations</b>&quot; means the United States Trading with the Enemy Act, as amended, or any of the foreign assets control regulations of the United States Treasury Department (31 C.F.R. Subtitle B, Chapter V, as amended), or any ruling issued thereunder or any enabling legislation or Presidential Executive Order granting authority.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Foreign Plan</b>&quot; means any employee benefit plan, program, policy, arrangement or agreement not subject to ERISA or Section 4975 of the Code, including any defined benefit pension plan maintained, contributed to or sponsored by the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries for the benefit of employees employed outside the United States, other than any such plan, program, policy, arrangement or agreement that is funded through a trust or funding vehicle maintained exclusively by a Governmental Authority.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Foreign Plan Event</b>&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;"> </b>means, with respect to any Foreign Plan:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>the existence of unfunded liabilities in excess of the amount permitted under any Applicable Law, or in excess of the amount that would be permitted absent a waiver from a Governmental Authority; </div></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p Law, on or before the due date for such contributions or payments; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font that would reasonably be expected to result in the incurrence of any liability to the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries, or the imposition on the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries of any fine, excise tax or penalty resulting from any non-compliance with any Applicable Law.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Form of Advance Request</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">2.03(a)</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Advance Requests</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Form of O&amp;M Budget</b>&quot; means the form of O&amp;M Budget set out in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Exhibit R</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Form of O&amp;M Budget</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Funds Withdrawal/Transfer Certificate</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the Accounts Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">GAAP</b>&quot; means generally accepted accounting principles in the United States as in effect from time to time.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Governmental Approval</b>&quot; means any approval, consent, authorization, license, permit, order, certificate, qualification, waiver, exemption, or variance, or any other action of a similar nature, of or by a Governmental Authority, including any of the foregoing that are or may be deemed given or withheld by failure to act within a specified time period.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Governmental Authority</b>&quot; means any federal, state, county, municipal, or regional authority, or any other entity of a similar nature, exercising any executive, legislative, judicial, regulatory, or administrative function of government.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Governmental Judgment</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Person, any judgment, order, decision or decree, or any action of a similar nature, of or by a Governmental Authority having jurisdiction over such Person or any of its properties.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Guarantee</b>&quot; means, as to any Person, obligations, contingent or otherwise (including a Contingent Obligation), guaranteeing or having the economic effect of guaranteeing any Indebtedness of another Person in any manner, whether directly or indirectly, and including any obligation:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>to purchase or pay any Indebtedness or to purchase or provide security for the payment of any Indebtedness;</div></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>to purchase or lease property, securities or services for the purpose of assuring the payment of any Indebtedness;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>to maintain working capital, equity capital or any other financial statement condition or liquidity of any other Person; or</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>in respect of any letter of credit, letter of guaranty or bond issued to support any obligation or Indebtedness,</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 35.45pt;">except that the term Guarantee shall not include endorsements for collection or deposit in the Ordinary Course of Business.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Guaranteed Loan</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;2.01</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Guaranteed Loan Purchase of the FFB Notes</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Hazardous Substance</b>&quot; means any substances, chemicals, materials or wastes defined, listed, classified or regulated as hazardous, toxic or a pollutant or contaminant in, or for which standards are imposed by any Governmental Authority &#160;or under, any applicable Environmental Laws, including (a) any petroleum or petroleum by-products (including gasoline, crude oil or any fraction thereof), flammable explosives, radioactive materials, asbestos in any form that is or could become friable, urea formaldehyde foam insulation, per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances, and polychlorinated biphenyls, noise, odor, and vibration; and (b) any other chemical, material or substance of which the import, storage, transport, use, Release, or disposal of, or exposure to, is prohibited, limited or otherwise regulated under any Environmental Law.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Hedging Agreement</b>&quot; means any agreement or instrument (including a cap, swap, collar, option, forward purchase agreement or other similar derivative instrument) relating to the hedging of any interest under any Indebtedness, including any foreign currency trading or other speculative transactions.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Historical Debt Service Coverage Ratio</b>&quot; means, as of any Calculation Date, the ratio of (a)&#160;actual Cash Flow Available for Debt Service for the immediately preceding twelve (12) month period, to (b)&#160;aggregate Debt Service payable during such period.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Historical Financial Statements</b>&quot; means as of the Execution Date, with respect to: </p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>the Borrower, the audited Financial Statements for the Fiscal Year ending December 31, 2023, and the unaudited quarterly Financial Statements for the quarter ending September 30, 2024; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>each other Borrower Entity, the audited Financial Statements for the Fiscal Year ending 2023, and the unaudited quarterly Financial Statements for the Fiscal Quarter ending September 30, 2024.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<a name="_Hlk183177221"></a><b style="font-weight:bold;">IFRS</b>&quot; means the International Financial Reporting Standards, adopted by the International Accounting Standards Board, as in effect from time to time.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Indebtedness</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Person, without duplication:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>all obligations of such Person for borrowed money or with respect to deposits or advances of any kind;</div></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>all obligations of such Person evidenced by bonds, debentures, notes or similar instruments;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>all obligations of such Person under conditional sale or other title retention agreements relating to property acquired by such Person;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>all obligations of such Person in respect of the deferred purchase price of property or services (excluding current accounts payable incurred in the Ordinary Course of Business and obligations in respect of the funding of plans under ERISA);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>all Indebtedness of others secured by (or for which the holder of such Indebtedness has an existing right, contingent or otherwise, to be secured by) any Lien on property owned or acquired by such Person, whether or not the Indebtedness secured thereby has been assumed;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>all Guarantees by such Person;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(g)</font>all Capital Lease Obligations of such Person;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(h)</font>all obligations, contingent or otherwise (including Contingent Obligations), of such Person as an account party in respect of letters of credit and letters of guaranty or as a purchaser counterparty to a put agreement or such other similar agreement relating to the purchase of preferred stock of any of its Subsidiaries;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(i)</font>all obligations, contingent or otherwise, of such Person in respect of bankers&#39; acceptances; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(j)</font>all obligations of such Person to redeem or purchase its preferred stock that are classified as indebtedness under the Designated Standard,</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 35.45pt;"><i style="font-style:italic;">provided</i>, that the Indebtedness of any Person shall include the Indebtedness of any other entity (including any partnership in which such Person is a general partner) to the extent such Person is liable therefor as a result of such Person&#39;s ownership interest in or other relationship with such entity, except to the extent the terms of such Indebtedness provide that such Person is not liable therefor, and provided further, that for the avoidance of doubt, &#8220;Indebtedness&#8221; does not include any obligations in respect of any preferred stock in the Direct Parent outstanding on the Execution Date;</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 35.45pt;">provided further, that, for the avoidance of doubt, the WP Preferred Interest shall not be considered Indebtedness.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<a name="_Hlk183177256"></a><b style="font-weight:bold;">Indebtedness for Borrowed Money</b>&quot; means, as to any Person, without duplication, (a)&#160;all indebtedness (including principal, interest, fees and charges) of such Person for borrowed money or for the deferred purchase price of property or services (other than any deferral (i)&#160;in connection with the provision of credit in the Ordinary Course of Business by any trade creditor or utility, or (ii)&#160;of any amounts payable under the Project Documents); or (b)&#160;the aggregate amount required to be capitalized under any Capital Lease under which such Person is the lessee.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Indemnified Liability</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">11.07</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Indemnification</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Indemnified Party</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">11.07</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Indemnification</i>).</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Indemnity Claims</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">11.07</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Indemnification</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Independent</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Auditor</b>&quot; means has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;5.01(y)(i)</u> <i style="font-style:italic;">(Authorization to Borrower&#39;s Accountant</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Independent Engineer</b>&quot; means NexantECA, or such other Person appointed from time to time by DOE to act as technical advisor engineer in connection with the Project.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Ineligible Project Costs</b>&quot; means Project Costs that do not constitute Eligible Project Costs. For the avoidance of doubt, Ineligible Project Costs shall include those costs set forth in Section 609.10(d) of the Applicable Regulations.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Insolvency Proceeding</b>&quot; means any one or more of the following under any Applicable Law, in any jurisdiction and whether voluntary or involuntary: </p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>any bankruptcy, insolvency, liquidation, restructuring, suspension of payments or scheme of arrangement with respect to the Borrower or any Sponsor, including the Bankruptcy Code; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>any appointment of a provisional or interim liquidator, receiver, trustee, administrative receiver or other custodian for all or any substantial part of the property of the Borrower or any Sponsor; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>any notification, resolution or petition for winding up or similar proceeding with respect to the Borrower or any Sponsor; or </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>any issuance of a warrant or attachment, execution or similar process against all or any substantial part of the property of the Borrower or any Sponsor.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Insurance Consultant</b>&quot; means WTW, or such other Person appointed from time to time by DOE to act as insurance consultant in connection with the Project.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&#8220;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan</b>&#8221; has the meaning given to such term in Section 5.01(h)(2) (<i style="font-style:italic;">Project Milestone Schedule; Integrated Schedule and Spending Plan</i>).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Intellectual Property</b>&quot; means any and all rights, priorities and privileges with respect to intellectual property, whether arising under United States, multinational or foreign laws or otherwise, including any and all of the following, as they exist anywhere in the world, whether registered or unregistered and including all registrations, issuances and applications therefor (whether or not any such applications are modified, withdrawn, abandoned or resubmitted) and all extensions and renewals thereof: &#160;</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>Patents; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>Trademarks; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>Copyrights; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>Software; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>trade secrets and other confidential or proprietary information, including know-how, inventions, processes, procedures, algorithms, Source Code, databases, concepts, ideas, research or development information, techniques, technical information and data, specifications, methods, discoveries, </div></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div lists, in each case, whether or not reduced to a written or other tangible form (collectively, &quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Trade Secrets</b>&quot;); </div><div style="font-family:'Times New specified therein, which date must be a Business Day and shall not be on a Payment Date or the last day of any Fiscal Quarter.<font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;"> </font></p><p Agreement</b>&#8221; means an Intercreditor Agreement substantially in the form attached hereto as <u for any period, total interest expense (including that attributable to Capital Leases) net of total interest income of the Borrower on a consolidated basis for such period with respect to all outstanding Indebtedness of the Borrower (including all commissions, discounts and other fees and charges owed with respect to letters of credit and bankers&#8217; acceptance financing and net costs under Hedging Agreements in respect of interest rates to the extent that such net costs are allocable to such period).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Trade Secrets or Software; (b) rights to sue or otherwise recover for past, present and future infringements or other violations of the foregoing; and (c) income, royalties, damages, claims, style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 5.01(d)(ii)-2</u> (<i style="font-style:italic;">Major Project Documents; Specified Major Project Participant; Feedstock Supplier</i>) underneath the heading &#8220;Major Procurement Contract&#8221;. </p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:0pt;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 36pt;"><a name="_Hlk187179764"></a>&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Major Project Document</b>&quot; means each of: </p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font Project Participant; Feedstock Supplier</i>);</div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>each Additional Project Document, if any, under which (i) the Borrower is reasonably expected to have aggregate obligations or liabilities in excess of five million Dollars ($5,000,000) (as such amount shall be adjusted by inflation) over any rolling twelve (12) month period during its term; or (ii) the breach, non-performance, cancellation or early termination of which has, or could reasonably be expected to materially and adversely affect the Borrower or the Project;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font document shall be treated as a &#8220;Major Project Document&#8221;; and</div><div style="font-family:'Times New preceding.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Major Project Participants</b>&quot; means each party (other than the Borrower) to any Major Project Document.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section 3.05(c)(i)</u> (<i other Person appointed from time to time by DOE to act as market insurance consultant in connection with the Project.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New loss) of the Borrower; as determined in accordance with Designated Standard.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Non-Appealable</b>&quot; means, with respect to any Required Approval, unless otherwise agreed by DOE, (a) such Required Approval is free from unduly burdensome conditions and is not subject to any pending or threatened claim, action, appeal, intervention or similar proceeding or any unsatisfied condition which may result in modification, suspension, termination or revocation, and (b)&#160;all applicable appeal periods have expired (except for any Required Approval which does not have any limit on an appeal period under Applicable Law).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font which shall: </p><div style="font-family:'Times New be received and all Operating Costs (by category) reasonably expected to be incurred; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>reflect Debt Service due during each period, and <i style="font-style:italic;">pro forma</i> Cash Flow Available for Debt Service projections for each period; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>include such other information as may be reasonably requested by DOE or the Independent Engineer; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>be prepared on a basis consistent from period to period and consistent with the Operating Plan, in sufficient detail to permit meaningful comparisons, and shall include a statement of the assumptions on which it is based.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Operating Plan</b>&quot; means the periodic operating plan for the Project prepared by the Borrower in connection with the operation of the Project and included in the O&amp;M Budget, and that shall: </p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>describe the Project&#39;s operating plan for the relevant period; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>summarize any changes in the Major Maintenance Plan for the relevant period, including the Project&#39;s program for spare parts, inventory management and supply management; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>summarize any changes in the Project&#39;s capital plan for the relevant period; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(d)</font>include such other information as may be reasonably requested by DOE or the Independent Engineer; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(e)</font>be prepared on a basis consistent from period to period, and consistent with the Operating Forecast, in sufficient detail to permit meaningful comparisons, and </div></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:0pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(f)</font>include a statement of the assumptions on which it is based.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Operating Revenues</b>&quot; means all cash receipts (or projected receipts) of the Borrower deposited in the Project Accounts, including revenues from: </p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>the sales under the Offtake Contracts any sales in the spot market or merchant sales; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>proceeds from business interruption and delay in start-up insurance policies; </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(c)</font>delay liquidated damages payable under any Construction Contract or any other Project Document; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 35.45pt;"><i style="font-style:italic;">provided, </i>that, Operating Revenues shall not include proceeds (i)&#160;from casualty and Event of Loss insurance; or (ii)&#160;that are subject to a Mandatory Prepayment pursuant to <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section&#160;</u><u Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Opinion of Borrower&#39;s Counsel re: Borrower Instruments</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in the FFB Note Purchase Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Ordinary</b> <b style="font-weight:bold;">Course of Business</b>&quot; means, in respect of any transaction involving any Person, the ordinary course of such Person&#8217;s business, as conducted by any such Person in accordance with past practice (or as contemplated by such Person&#8217;s business plan) and undertaken by such Person in good faith and not for purposes of evading any covenant or restriction in any Financing Document.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Organizational Documents</b>&quot; means, with respect to:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(a)</font>any corporation, its certificate or articles of incorporation or organization, as amended, and its by-laws, as amended;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New partnership agreement, as amended;</div><div style="font-family:'Times New operating agreement, as amended. </div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b and approved by DOE, in connection with the Term Sheet.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Overdue Amount</b>&quot; means any amount owing under the FFB Note that is not paid when and as due. For the avoidance of any doubt, no interest payment prior to the First Interest Payment Date constitutes an &#8220;Overdue Amount&#8221;.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Passive Sponsor</b>&quot; means any Sponsor that both (i) owns less than 20% of the equity interest in the Borrower, directly or indirectly and (ii) does not provide the Phase 2 Equity Instrument or other guarantee of the obligations of the Borrower.</p></div><div style="clear:both;margin-bottom:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div></div><hr style="background-color:#000000;clear:both;color:#000000;height:2pt;line-height:0;margin-bottom:30pt;margin-left:11.76%;margin-right:11.76%;margin-top:30pt;page-break-after:always;width:76.47%;border-width:0;"><div style="max-width:100%;padding-left:11.76%;padding-right:11.76%;position:relative;"><div style="margin-top:30pt;width:100%;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;line-height:1.19;margin:0pt;"><font style="font-size:12pt;visibility:hidden;">&#8203;</font></p></div><div style="clear:both;max-width:100%;position:relative;"><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Patents</b>&quot; means any and all (a) patents, certificates of invention, and other patent or similar industrial property rights, all registrations and recordings thereof, and all applications for patents of the United States or any other jurisdiction, including registrations, recordings and pending applications in the United States Patent and Trademark Office or any foreign equivalent office; (b) reissues, reexaminations, continuations, divisionals, continuations-in-part, renewals, interferences or extensions thereof, and the inventions or designs disclosed or claimed therein (including the right to make, use, offer to sell, sell and/or import such inventions or designs); and (c) other patents as set out in Schedule A of the IP Security Agreement.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Patriot Act</b>&quot; means the Uniting and Strengthening America by Providing Appropriate Tools Required to Intercept and Obstruct Terrorism Act of 2001 (Pub. L. 107-56).</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Payment Date</b><font style="text-decoration-color:#000000;">&quot;</font> means each March 31, June 30, September 30, and December 31, or, in each case, if such day is not a Business Day, the next Business Day.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">PBGC</b>&quot; means the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation or any entity succeeding to any or all of its functions under ERISA.</p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Pension Plan</b>&quot; means an &#8220;employee benefit plan&#8221; (as defined in Section&#160;3(3) of ERISA) other than a Multiemployer Plan that is or was:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0pt;margin-top:12pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:36pt;"><font which any Borrower Entity or ERISA Affiliate has ever made, or was obligated to make, contributions or has or could have any liability; and </div><div style="font-family:'Times New ERISA.</div><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman','Times','serif';font-size:11pt;min-height:13.0pt;text-align:justify;margin:12pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Performance Testing</b>&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;"> </b>has the meaning given to such term in <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Schedule 0pt 0pt 0pt;">&quot;<b style="font-weight:bold;">Performance Testing Plan</b>&quot; has the meaning given to such term in <u Expenditures</b>&quot; means:</p><div style="font-family:'Times New style="display:inline-block;min-width:36pt;text-decoration-line:none;text-indent:0pt;white-space:nowrap;">(b)</font>any Capital Expenditures made from funds on deposit in the Loss Proceeds Account in accordance with <u style="text-decoration-color:#000000;text-decoration-line:underline;text-decoration-style:solid;">Section </u><u
